[\[96a.6\]]brda dang /_mtshan mas phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas lag yig gis spring ba mnos te/_lag yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing /_lag yig gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[96a.7\]]dge slong mas lag yig gis spring ba mnos te/_lag yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing /_spring yig gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas lag yig gis spring ba mnos te/_spring yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing /_
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]lag yig gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas lag yig gis spring ba mnos te/_spring yig gis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing /_spring yig gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[96b.2\]]slong mas lag yig gis spring ba mnos te/_lag yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing /_yul phyogs dang /_brda dang /_mtshan mas phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas chung ma dang po gsum po chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /_
[\[96b.3\]]rin chas nyos pa dang /_btsan phrogs su thob pa 'thab pa'i mod nyid yin la/_'thab pa'i 'og ma yin pa dang /_rtswa ma bcad pa dang /_rde'u gsum gyis ma gtor ba dang /_bye rgya byin nas ma btang ba dang /_chung ma ma yin par dpang ma btsugs pa dang /_
[\[96b.4\]]dril ma bsgrags pa dag gi bsdum byas la/_mthun par gyur na nyes byas gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas chung ma dang po gsum po chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /_rin chas nyos pa dang /_btsan phrogs su thob pa 'thab pa'i 'og yin la/_'thab pa'i mod 
[\[96b.5\]]la ma yin pa dang /_rtswa ma bcad pa dang /_rde'u gsum gyis ma gtor ba dang /_bye rgya byin nas ma btang ba dang /_chung ma ma yin par dpang ma btsugs pa dang /_dril ma bsgrags pa dag gi bsdum byas la/_mthun par gyur na nyes byas gnyis su 
[\[96b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas chung ma dang po gsum po chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /_rin chas nyos pa dang /_btsan phrogs su thob pa 'thab pa'i mod dang /_'thab pa'i 'og dang /_rtswa bcad pa yin la rde'u gsum gyis ma gtor ba dang /_bye rgya byin nas ma 
[\[96b.7\]]btang ba dang /_chung ma ma yin par dpang ma btsugs pa dang /_dril ma bsgrags pa dag gi bsdum byas la/_mthun par gyur na nyes byas gsum du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas chung ma dang po gsum po chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /_rin chas nyos pa dang /_
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]btsan phrogs su thob pa zhes bya ba nas rde'u gsum gtor ba'i bar yin la/_bye rgya byin nas ma btang ba dang /_chung ma ma yin par dpang ma btsugs pa dang /_dril ma bsgrags pa dag gi bsdum byas la/_mthun par gyur na nyes byas 
[\[97a.2\]]gsum dang /_nyes pa sbom po gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas chung ma gsum po chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /_rin chas nyos pa dang /_btsan phrogs su thob pa zhes bya ba nas bye rgya byin nas btang ba zhes bya ba'i bar yin la/_chung ma ma yin par dpang ma 
[\[97a.3\]]btsugs pa dang /_dril ma bsgrags pa dag gi bsdum byas la/_mthun par gyur na nyes byas gsum dang /_nyes pa sbom po gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas chung ma gsum po chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /_rin chas nyos pa dang /_btsan phrogs su thob pa zhes 
[\[97a.4\]]bya ba nas/_chung ma ma yin par dpang btsugs pa'i bar yin la/_dril ma bsgrags pa dag gi bsdum byas te/_mthun par gyur na nyes byas gsum dang /_nyes pa sbom po gsum dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas chung ma gsum 
[\[97a.5\]]po chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /_rin chas nyos pa dang /_btsan phrogs su thob pa zhes bya ba nas/_dril bsgrags pa'i bar dag gi bsdum byas la/_mthun par gyur na nyes byas gsum dang /_nyes pa sbom po bzhi dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[97a.6\]]dge slong mas chung ma de las gzhan pa 'thab pa'i mod dang /_'thab pa'i 'og tu bsdum byas la/_mthun par gyur na thams cad du dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma khyim pa'i khyim du song nas 'di skad ces ci'i phyir khye'u 'di khyim mi dbub ces zer na 
[\[97a.7\]]nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/ci'i phyir bu mo chen mo 'di bag mar mi gtang zhes zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/ci'i phyir khye'u 'di gyos po'i thad du mi gtang zhes zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/ci'i phyir bu mo 'di khyim bdag gi thad du mi bkri zhes zer na 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma khyim bdag gi khyim du song nas tha na 'di skad ces ci'i phyir khyim bdag khyod kyis zhal ta byed pa dag gzhag par mi byed ces zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du khyim bdag mo la yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/las 
[\[97b.2\]]dang po la sogs pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/dge slong ma'i rnam par 'byed pa las dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dang po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe sdig byung na gyad kyi sna chen po 
[\[97b.3\]]rgyal sde zhes bya ba phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa/_gser dang nor mang po 'byor pa zhig gnas so/_/des rigs mnyam pa 
[\[97b.4\]]las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed kyang de dag la bu yang med bu mo yang med do/_/bu med pas bu la mngon par dga' ste/_
[\[97b.5\]]de bu'i don du lha brgya stong du ma la gsol ba 'debs te/_'di lta ste/_tshangs pa dang /_dbang po dang /_nye dbang dang /_gshin rje dang /_nyi ma dang /_lus ngan po dang /_kun 'ged gzhon nu dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang 
[\[97b.6\]]bdag dang /_sa ga dang /_las thams cad pa dang /_tha skar dang /_rlung mar gyi lha dang /_sa'i lha dang /_chu lha dang /_me lha dang /_rlung lha dang /_yul 'khor srung dang /_'phags skyes po dang /_mig mi bzang dang /_rnam thos kyi bu dang /_nor bu 
[\[97b.7\]]bzang po dang /_gang ba bzang po dang /_lngas rtsen dang /_lnga len dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can dang /_kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang /_nags tshal gyi lha dang /_bzhi mdo'i lha dang /_sum mdo'i lha dang /_
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]gtor ma len pa'i lha dang /_lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dang /_chos mthun pa pa dang rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha de dag dang /_gzhan yang lha brgya stong dag la gsol ba 'debs par byed do/_/'jig rten na yang lha la gsol ba btab pa'i rgyu 
[\[98a.2\]]las bu dang bu mo dag skye'o zhes bya ba 'jig rten pa'i gtam de lta bu yod mod kyi de ni de lta ma yin te/_gal te de ltar gyur du zin na dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong yod par 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang gnas drug po mngon du gyur pa las 
[\[98a.3\]]bu dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur te/_drug po gang dag ce na/_pha ma gnyis kyis bu rnyed par 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pa yin/_bus kyang pha ma rnyed par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa yin/_ma yang rung bar gyur cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa 
[\[98a.4\]]yin/_pha ma gnyis chags par gyur cing 'dus pa yin/_dri za yang nye bar gnas pa yin/_dri zas kyang sems gnyis po rjes su chags pa dang ldan pa'am/_khong khro ba dang ldan pa gang yang rung ba'i sems yongs su thob pa ste/_gnas drug po 'di dag mngon 
[\[98a.5\]]du gyur pa las bu dang bu mo dag skye ba yin no/_/de de ltar lha brgya stong la gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len cing 'dug pa na sems can bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pas dbang che bar grags pa/_sngon gyi sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_srid pa tha ma pa/_
[\[98a.6\]]spyod pa tshol ba/_'ching ba nyam smad pa/_thar pa'i tshogs bzung ba/_mya ngan las 'das pa la phyogs pa/_'khor ba las phyir phyogs pa/_srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho dang skye ba'i don du mi gnyer ba lus tha ma 'dzin pa zhig lha'i 'jig rten nas shi 
[\[98a.7\]]'phos nas chung ma de'i mngal du zhugs so/_/'di na bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig shes par bya ba'i gnas lnga rab tu shes te/_skyes pa chags par gyur pa shes shing skyes pa chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang /_dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]dang /_mngal du zhugs pa shes pa dang /_gang las mngal du zhugs pa de yang shes pa dang /_khye'ur shes shing bu mor shes pa ste/_gal te khye'u yin na dku g.yas par rten cing 'dug la/_gal te bu mo yin na dku g.yon par rten cing 'dug pa'o/_/des 
[\[98b.2\]]kyang bdag la sems can zhugs pa de dku g.yas par rten cing 'dug pas na khye'ur 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas dga' zhing mgu la yid rab tu dga' bas khyim thab la smras pa/_rje'i sras khyod la bka' mchid snyan pa zhig gsol lo/_/des smras pa/_bzang mo lha dang 
[\[98b.3\]]mi'i gtam snyan pa thob par gyur cig_/gtam snyan pa ji lta bu zhig_/rje'i sras bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pa ji ltar bdag gi dku g.yas pa mi bde ba las gor ma bkum par bdag gis bu rnyed do/_/de nas gyad kyi sna chen po la gtogs pa rgyal 
[\[98b.4\]]sdes de thos ma thag tu dga' zhing mgu la yid rab tu dga' ste/_bzhin pad ma rgyas pa lta bus dga' ba'i tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzang mo khyod kyi bu de bzhin du skye bar shog shig_/kho bos kyang bu sdug pa'i ngo mthong ba dang /_kho bos yun ring mo zhig 
[\[98b.5\]]nas bsams pa'i bu yin la bsam pa bzhin du 'grub pa dang /_kho bo dang mthun par skye zhing mi mthun par mi skye ba dang /_kho bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang /_gsos pas phyir gso ba dang /_kho bo'i nor rdzas la spyod pa dang /_kho bo'i rigs rgyud kyang yun ring du 
[\[98b.6\]]gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_de yang phyug pa dang /_nor mang ba dang /_longs spyod che ba dang /_yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che bar gyur nas bdag gi dbang phyug kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_bdag cag shi zhing dus las 'das pa na bdag 
[\[98b.7\]]cag gi phyir sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas 'di de gnyis gang du skyes pa der rjes su 'gro bar gyur cig ces yon sngo bar byed par shog shig_/de la sems can zhugs par rig nas de tshun chad chung ma la dga' bar gyur/_bkur sti che bar 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]gyur/_byams par gyur nas steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]thog tu gnod pa med par 'dug tu bcug ste/_grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dag dang /_dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang /_sman pas bstan pa'i kha zas dang /_btung ba'i bye brag ha cang mi 
[\[99a.2\]]bsil ba/_ha cang mi dro ba/_ha cang mi kha ba/_ha cang mi tsha ba/_ha cang lan tshwa mi che ba/_ha cang mi skyur ba/_ha cang mi mngar ba/_ha cang mi bska ba/_ha cang mi snum pa/_ha cang mi rtsub pa/_kha ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_lan tshwa dang /_skyur ba dang /_
[\[99a.3\]]mngar ba dang /_bska ba dang /_snum pa dang /_rtsub pa rnam par spangs pa'i kha zas dang /_btung ba dag gis de la rim gro byed du 'jug go/_/de nas mngal na gnas pa yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir 'di ltar chung ma de gos tshon sna tshogs su spel ba ni bskon/_lag pa 
[\[99a.4\]]ni gser gyi gdu bu dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig gis gtams/_do shal dang /_se mo do rnam par 'phyang ba dang /_gdu bu dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_rna cha gdub kor ni thogs/_mig ni mig sman gyis bris/_bzhin ni dmar rtsi'i thig les mdzes par 
[\[99a.5\]]byas/_so ni me tog ku mu ta dang /_dngul dang /_kha ba dang /_mu tig gi do shal dang /_me tog kun da dang /_zla ba dang /_ngang pa dang /_ba'i 'o ma dang /_dung dang /_pad ma'i rtsa ba ltar dri ma med rked pa ni gser gyi 'og pag gis bcings rkang pa ni rkang 
[\[99a.6\]]rgyan gyis mdzes par byas nas gser gyi mchod sdong me tog gis bklubs pa lta bu de 'di ltar mngal du zhugs pa'i sems can gyis bsod nams byed pa dang dge ba byas pa'i rgyus steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]thog na mthun zhing rjes su mthun pa'i 'khor gling bu dang /_pi bang 
[\[99a.7\]]dang /_rdza rnga dang /_rnga bo che dang /_rol mo'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa rnams kyis lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rgyu ba bzhin du khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed cing de khri bo che legs par btsugs pa'i steng na khri nas khrir dang /_khri'u nas khri'ur rgyu zhing shod kyis 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]gzhir mi 'bab la de la 'ga' yang sgra yid du mi 'ong ba 'byin par mi byed do/_/khyim de yang nor dang /_'bru dang /_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba dang /_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_rkang gnyis pa 
[\[99b.2\]]dang /_rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa dag gis rgyas shing 'phel bar gyur te/_ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po chu klung lnga brgya dag gis nyin gcig bzhin 'gengs par byed pa de bzhin du khyim de yang rgyas par gyur to/_/re zhig na gyad kyi sna chen po la gtogs pa'i blon po lnga brgya 
[\[99b.3\]]rnams kyi chung ma la yang sems can zhugs par gyur to/_/de nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das te btsas pa las khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_pad ma'i rtsa ba'i mdog ltar dkar ba/_mgo gdugs lta bu/_lag pa ring ba/_'phral 
[\[99b.4\]]ba'i dbyes che ba/_smin tshugs kyi rgyun ma chad pa/_sna'i gzangs mtho ba/_thong ka seng ge'i 'dra ba/_ro stod seng ge'i lta bu dpung pa ring ba zhig btsas so/_/nyi ma de nyid la gyad kyi sna chen po la gtogs pa'i blon po chen po lnga brgya'i bu rnams kyang btsas so/_/
[\[99b.5\]]rgod ma lnga brgya yang rte'u 'brangs so/_/de bzhin du rdzas zhes bya ba'i bar du yang rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/de'i nye du rnams 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu zhes bya ba nas/_grong khyer du btsas ston byas te zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_khye'u'i 
[\[99b.6\]]ming cir gdags zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o/_/de dag las kha cig na re nor rnams dang lhan cig skyes la/_gyad kyi sna chen po la gtogs pa'i bu yang yin pas de'i phyir ming gyad bu nor du gdags so zhes zer ro/_/gzhan dag na re 'di nor dang 'dra bar 
[\[99b.7\]]skyes la/_'di'i pha yang gyad kyi sna chen po la gtogs pa yin pas khye'u'i ming gyad bu nor zhes ming du gdags so zhes zer nas/_ming gyad bu nor du btags te zhes bya ba nas/_ma ma brgyad la gtad do zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar sar 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]dang zhes bya ba nas skyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/mngag gzhug ma bu mo zhig gis de phrag pa la blangs te srang du zhugs pa dang /_de na bram ze mtshan mkhan zhig gis mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/rkang gnyis pa bsod nams 
[\[100a.2\]]kyi zhing yin no zhes bya ba nas pha las blangs te zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_til mar dri zhim pos byugs nas zhes bya ba nas mchod pa byas nas phyir khyim du bskyal to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /_rtsis slob tu bcug go zhes bya ba 
[\[100a.3\]]nas rtsis dang /_gzhan dag la de blo rno ba dang /_byang bar gyur to/_/rgyal rigs rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/_glang po che'i gnya' bar zhon pa dang /_rta la zhon pa dang /_shing rta'i thabs dang /_ral gri'i 
[\[100a.4\]]thabs dang /_'phong thabs dang /_phyir bsnur ba dang /_mdun du bsnur ba dang /_lcags kyus bsgyur ba'i thabs dang /_zhags pa gdab pa dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phang ba dang /_'khor lo 'phang ba'i thabs dang /_mda' bo che 'phang ba'i thabs dang /_'dzin 
[\[100a.5\]]stangs dang /_gom stangs dang /_thor tshugs bcing ba dang /_bcad pa dang /_gtub pa dang /_dbug pa dang /_dral ba dang /_gsheg pa dang /_rgyang nas phog pa dang /_sgra grag par phog pa dang /_gnad du snun pa dang /_mi 'chor bar phog pa dang /_
[\[100a.6\]]tshabs cher phog par bya ba la pha rol du phyin par gyur to/_/gnas bzhi rnams dang /_'phen pa lnga rnams dang /_rig pa'i gnas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po rnams la mchog tu blo rno ba dang byang bar gyur to/_/phas kyang de'i skyed mos tshal gsum po dgun gyi dang /_dpyid kyi 
[\[100a.7\]]dang /_dbyar gyi rnams byed du bcug ste/_dgun gyi ni gcig tu dro ba'o/_/dpyid kyi ni gcig tu bsil ba'o/_/dbyar gyi ni ha cang mi dro ha cang mi grang ba'o/_/chung ma'i 'khor gsum po chen ma dang /_bar ma dang /_chun ma yang bzhag go/_/de yang 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]thog na ni'u ldangs rnams dang lhan cig tu gling bu dang /_pi bang dang /_rdza rnga dang /_khar rnga dang /_lcags kyi sil khrol dang /_rol mo'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa rnams kyis longs spyod byed de/_dper na sems can bsod nams byas shing 
[\[100b.2\]]dge ba byas pa dag rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bar byed pa bzhin no/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na de'i grogs po rnams [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du song ngo zhes bya ba nas dris pa/_grogs po dag ga las 'ongs/_de dag gis smras pa/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor 
[\[100b.3\]]song song ngo /_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor ba zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhig_/de dag gis smras pa/_dgon par song nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag bsad de sha khyer te 'ongs nas shas dgos pa'i bya ba byed pa'o/_/des de rnams la smras pa/_dgon pa na gnas shing rtswa za shing chu 'thung ba de dag 
[\[100b.4\]]gis khyed cag la gnod pa ci zhig byas nas gsod par byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_'di ltar kho bo cag la gnod pa cung zad kyang ma byas mod kyi/_'on kyang dga' ba'i slad du 'gums par bgyid do/_/de bas na spro bar mdzod cig dang lhan cig tu bzhud par 
[\[100b.5\]]bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_'di ltar re zhig bdag khyed cag 'gro bar 'dod pa yang med na/_bdag 'gro ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te spyod pa de ni bzang po ma yin no/_/de dag 'di snyam du gal te bdag cag gis ma khrid na bdag cag kyang 'gror mi ster ba'i 
[\[100b.6\]]gnas skabs de lta bu yod par 'ong ngo snyam du bsams nas zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de dag gyad bu nor gyi pha ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab yum dag gang gi phyir gzhon nu gtum pa rtsal che ba/_de lta bu'i nyi 'og gi rgyal po 
[\[100b.7\]]rnams kyis thos na bag 'khums par 'gyur zhing zhes bya ba nas/_slas kyi btsun mo yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/ji tsam na de la pha dang mas song la grogs po rnams kyis bsgo ba bzhin du gyis shig ces smras pa dang zhes bya ba nas 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]legs so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de pha ma la gus pa yin pas des 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag gis de dag gi tshig bzlog par mi nus te/_'di ltar pha mas bsgo ba bzhin du bya dgos pas pha mas bsgo ba bzhin du 'gro bar bya'o snyam du bsams 
[\[101a.2\]]nas de khas blangs so/_/de nas pha mas kyang bu de 'gro ba'i bsam pa rtogs nas bdag nyid kyi grong na gnas pa'i 'bangs dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la gyad bu nor [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du 'gro yis khyed cag kyang song shig ces bsgo'o/_/de dag kyang bsgo ba bzhin 
[\[101a.3\]]du 'ongs nas nyi ma gnyis pa la gyad bu nor gyad kyi sna la gtogs pa'i bu lnga brgyas bskor te zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi dang /_bran g.yog mang pos yongs su bskor nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du song ngo /_/de nas de la grogs po rnams kyis smras pa/_grogs po khyod ci [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[101a.4\]]skong du 'gro 'am/_'on te 'phan kar sdod ces byas pa dang /_des 'di snyam du gal te 'di dag 'phan kar bzhag ste/_bdag gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]btab par gyur na de dag 'phong skyen pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]phal mo che bsad par 'gyur bar bdag gis 'phan kar bsdad na 
[\[101a.5\]]rung ngo snyam du bsams nas/_des de dag lings la song shig ces bsgo ba dang /_de dag kyang yid rab tu dga' bar gyur nas grogs po bdag cag kyang de kho na ltar dad do/_/de dag gis 'di snyam du 'di ni gnas bzhi dang /_'phang ba lnga rnams la byang 
[\[101a.6\]]ba yin pas phal mo che zhig bsad par 'gyur ro/_/snyam du bsams so/_/de yang mda' stong gis bkang ba'i dong pa thogs nas 'phan kar 'dug go/_/de dag gis kyang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]phal mo che kun nas bskongs pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de dag 'jigs skrag bzhin 
[\[101a.7\]]du gzhon nu'i drung du lhags pa dang /_gzhon nu snying rje can gyis brtabs par gyur pa de dag mthong nas yid mi bde bar gyur nas snying rjes mngon par gdungs par gyur te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_sems can kun la byin pa dang /_/sems can gcig 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]la snying brtse gang /_/sems can kun la byin pa bas/_/snying brtse gcig tu khyad par 'phags/_/de dag rlung ltar 'gro zhing gzhan gyis sdug bsngal bar byas pa de dag byer bar gyur kyang mda' ma 'phangs so/_/'di ltar sems can thams cad ni 
[\[101b.2\]]shes pa gcig po kun rdzob shes pa dang ldan pa yin pas de dag gis 'di snyam du bdag nyid chen po 'di ni snying rje can yin no snyam du bsams te/_de dag de la legs par thugs kyang 'jigs pa med par byer ro/_/de nas gyad bu nor 'di snyam du gal te 
[\[101b.3\]]bdag gis mda' ma 'phangs pa grogs po 'ga' zhig gis thos na yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/snyam du bsams shing /_de yang 'di snyam du ma la de dag bdag la gshe bar 'gyur ba yongs su spang ba'i phyir dang /_bdag sbyor ba la goms par shes par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[101b.4\]]mda' 'phang ngo snyam du bsams nas/_des de ltar bsams te/_'di ltar sems can 'ga' la yang gnod pa skyed par mi 'gyur bar mda' 'phangs so/_/des kyang bslabs pas mda' rnams rwa phrag dang rkang lag gi bar dang spu gseb dang rna bar dag tu 'phangs 
[\[101b.5\]]te btang ngo /_/des de ltar mda' stong po de dag sems can gcig la gnod par mi 'gyur bar de ltar 'phangs so/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de dag shin tu thal nas dong ba dang /_de'i grogs po rnams 'ongs nas 'phan kar 'dug ste/_phan tshun du 'di snyam du deng bdag 
[\[101b.6\]]cag gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]phal mo che kun nas bskongs la gyad bu nor 'di yang gnas bzhi dang /_'phang ba rnam pa lnga la byang ba yin pas de ring [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mang po zhig bsad par gyur na/_khur khal dag khyer te ma 'ongs pa ni gcig tu nyes pa byas so/_/snyam du bsams 
[\[101b.7\]]so/_/ji tsam drung du phyin na de dag gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gcig kyang ma bsad par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang gyad bu nor de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de dag gar song /_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/bros te song ngo /_/de dag gis smras pa/_ci khyod 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]kyis mda' ma 'phangs sam/_des smras pa/_'phangs te dong pa stong par 'dug pa la ltos/_de dag gis 'di snyam du 'di ltar gyad bu nor 'phang ba de lta bu dag la de ltar byang bar gyur to zhes bya ba de'i grags pa [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa lta/_rnam pa gcig 
[\[102a.2\]]kyang mi shes na bzhi char shes pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du bsams te/_zhes bya ba nas de'i grogs po rnams smod par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_rang gi khyim du 'ongs nas steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]thog na lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong 
[\[102a.3\]]du chud do zhes bya ba'i bar nas/_pha ma 'ongs nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_bu ci'i phyir khyod kyis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]ma bsad des smras pa/_yab yum khyed cag la bdag sdug lags sam/_bu shin tu sdug go/_/gal te 'ga' zhig gis 
[\[102a.4\]]bdag srog dang phral na khyed cag ji lta bur 'gyur/_de dag gis smras pa/_shin tu sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde bar 'gyur mod/_de smras pa/_khyed cag la yang srog mi phangs lags sam/_de dag gis smras pa shin tu phangs so/_/'o na khyed cag ci'i slad du 
[\[102a.5\]]bdag gzhan gyi srog gcod pa la sbyor bar mdzad gzhan yang yab yum khyed cag gis 'di ltar/_'byung po rnams la phan 'dod snying brtse bas/_/srog gcod pa dang gsod dang 'ching ba spongs/_/ji ltar rang gi srog phangs srung ba ltar/_/de bzhin gzhan rnams 
[\[102a.6\]]kyi yang srog bsrung ngo /_/zhes bgyi ba ci ma gsan tam zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de nas de dag gi bu de'i nges pa khong du chud nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu de lta na phyir yang steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]thog tu btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang lhan cig rtsed mo gyis shig_/
[\[102a.7\]]de nas gyad bu nor gyi steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]thog nas 'di skad ces rkang gnyis pa dang /_rkang med pa dang /_sman dang /_rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags 'chang ba gang gis bdag 'khor ba'i dgon pa las yongs su thar bar byed pa su yod ces smras so/_/de'i tshe 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]yul sdig byung na ston pa drug po thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin par thams cad mkhyen par mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed pa rnams gnas te zhes bya ba nas/_'od srung gi gan du song ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyi chos kyi tshul ni gang yin slob ma la gdams pa ni gang yin/_khyod kyi tshangs 
[\[102b.2\]]par spyod pa la gnas pa'i 'bras bu ni gang yin phan yon ni gang yin/_des smras pa/_gzhon nu kho bo ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad smra ste/_sbyin pa med do/_/mchod sbyin med do/_/sbyin sreg med do/_/legs par spyad pa med do/_/nyes par spyad pa med do/_/legs par spyad 
[\[102b.3\]]pa dang nyes par spyad pa rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa med do/_/'jig rten 'di med do/_/'jig rten pha rol med do/_/ma med do/_/pha med do/_/sems can rdzus te skye ba med do/_/'jig rten 'di na yang dag par song ba dang /_yang dag 
[\[102b.4\]]par zhugs pa'i dgra bcom pa gang dag rang gi mngon par shes pas 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol mngon sum du byas shing bsgrubs nas khong du chud par byas te bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa brten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi 
[\[102b.5\]]shes so zhes go bar byed pa dag med do zhes bya ba nas/_ston pa 'di yang lam gol bar zhugs pa/_lam ngan pa sgrub par byed pa yin te/_mkhas pa rnams kyis lam 'jigs pa dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin spang bar bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i bar dang tshigs su 
[\[102b.6\]]bcad pa smras pa/_lta ngan log par ston byed pa/_/dman pa ston par grags pa ste/_/gang gi chos ni de 'dra ba/_/de yi chos min ci 'dra zhig_/ces bya ba nas/_de bzhin du ston pa drug po rnams snod stong pa bzhin du brdabs te song ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/
[\[102b.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid ni nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum/_nyin mtshan lan drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten rnams la gang ni nyams par gyur/_gang ni sdug bsngal bar gyur/_gang ni nyam nga bar gyur/_gang ni mi 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]bde bar gyur/_gang ni sdug bsngal dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_mi bde bar gyur/_gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya/_gang gi skyed pa rnams ni 'phel bar bya/_gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa 
[\[103a.2\]]rnams ni yongs su smin par bya/_gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa rnams shes rab kyi mtshon gyis dral bar bya/_gang ni sangs rgyas kyis 'dul/_gang ni nyan thos kyis 'dul/_gang ni sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyis 'dul/_gang ni zhe sdang la spyod/_
[\[103a.3\]]gang ni 'dod chags la spyod/_gang ni gti mug la spyod/_gang ni 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug la spyod/_gang ni nyes dmigs gang gis gnod par gyur/_'phags pa'i nor dang bral ba gang ni 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug gi bdag po la 
[\[103a.4\]]rab tu gzhag par bya/_nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba gang gi lag nas drang bar bya/_gang ni ngan song las bslang ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhag par bya zhes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/yang smras pa/_rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/
[\[103a.5\]]dus las 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi/_/gdul bya la byams sangs rgyas ni/_/dus las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis kun du gzigs nas dgongs pa/_gyad bu nor de sngon gyi sangs 
[\[103a.6\]]rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa/_smon lam btab par gyur pa/_'bras smin pa mtshon gyis brtol 'dod pa lta bur thugs su chud nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur/_ci nyan thos kyis 'dul lam/_'on te sangs rgyas kyis 'dul/_
[\[103a.7\]]ci spyod lam gyis 'dul lam/_'on te chos bshad pas 'dul snyam du dgongs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod lam gyis 'dul na gang gi spyod lam gyis 'dul snyam du dgongs na/_zhes bya ba de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul yul sdig byung du phyin nas yul sdig byung na srin bu 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]pad ma'i nags khrod na 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul snga dro sham thabs bgos zhes bya ba nas/_gyad bu nor steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]thog na 'dug pas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul 'gro ba dang /_ldog pa dang /_bskum pa dang /_brkyang ba dang /_snam sbyar dang /_
[\[103b.2\]]chos gos dang /_lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pa de mthong ngo /_/gyad bu nor gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul mthong ba de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_rtags can chos kyis 'tsho byed pa/_/'di na phal cher bdag gis mthong /_/zhi zhing zhi bar gnas gyur pa/_/
[\[103b.3\]]'di 'dra bdag gis ma mthong ngo /_/zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/mi zhig btang nas zhes bya ba nas spyod lam mthong ste slar log nas gzhon nu la smras so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul te lta 'dod de zhes bya ba nas/_yang 
[\[103b.4\]]dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas nas 'dug ste de la smras pa/_ci khyod ston pa yin nam/_'on te nyan thos yin/_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis zhes bya ba nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_ri dbang gangs can dang ni yungs kar nyid kyi khyad par gang yin dang /_/
[\[103b.5\]]rgya mtsho dang ni phyugs rjes chu chung nyid kyi khyad par gang yin dang /_/nyi ma 'od zer dra ba che dang srin bu me khyer khyad gang yin/_/de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gter dang nyan thos khyad par ro/_/zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/pha ma gnyis kyi gan du 'ongs nas gsol 
[\[103b.6\]]ba 'debs par byed de zhes bya ba nas/_ma gnang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_nyin zhag gcig zan bcad pa'i bar dang /_pha ma 'ongs nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyis ni sdug bsngal mi shes te tshangs par spyod par spyad dka'o/_/gcig pu nyid la mngon par 
[\[103b.7\]]dga' bar bya dka'o/_/gnas mal dgon pa dang /_nags 'dab dang /_bas mtha' dag tu gnas dka'o/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gcan gzan gdug pa dag dang lhan cig gnas par bya dgos so/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi rnams kyi dga' ba 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]dang /_rtsed mo dag las mngon par dben par bya dgos so/_/bu khyod tshur shog 'dug la sbyin pa dag byin cig_/'dod pa la yang yongs su spyod cig ces bya ba'i bar du'o/_/rjes su gnang nas zhes bya ba nas/_lus kyi stobs dang /_mthu yang dag par 
[\[104a.2\]]bskyed nas zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_phas gyad bu nor rab tu 'byung bar 'dod kyis gang dag rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa de dag kyang deng shig ces dril bsgrags pa byas pa'i bar du'o/_/de nas de'i ne'u ldangs gang yin pa de dag 'di snyam du gyad bu nor 'di ni bde ba 'dod 
[\[104a.3\]]pa shin tu gzhon pa yin yang /_khyim gyi bde ba spangs nas nges par byung ste rab tu 'byung bar byed na/_bdag cag gis ji ltar bya snyam du bsam pa las/_de las gcig gis 'di skad ces legs su zad de bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bya'o zhes smras so/_/de 
[\[104a.4\]]nas gyad bu nor gzhon nu lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rta thul gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas gyad bu nor gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[104a.5\]]so/_/btsun pas bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gis dngos po thob par mdzad du gsol/_bdag khyod kyi thad du tshangs par spyad par spyod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis gyad bu 
[\[104a.6\]]nor rim gyis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/_/des kyang sde snod gsum po dag kha ton du bton cing bsgoms pas dgra bcom par gyur te/_khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang 
[\[104a.7\]]lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_ste'u dang tsan dan du mnyam pa/_ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral ba/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang /_'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang /_nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis lugs kyis 'di ltar 'dus pa chen po gnyis yod de dbyar zla 'bring 
[\[104b.2\]]po la dbyar nye bar sgrub pa'i tshe dang /_ston zla 'bring po'i nya la'o/_/gang dag dbyar zla 'bring po la dbyar nye bar sgrub pa'i tshe gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mnos pa de dag grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu dbyar 'das par byas pa 
[\[104b.3\]]de dag ston zla 'bring po nya la 'ongs nas ji ltar khong du chud pa dag ni rjod par byed/_gong mar gyur pa dag ni 'dri bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams kyi yang de lta bu yin pas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis lhan 
[\[104b.4\]]cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas gang dag grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang du dbyar gnas par byas pa de dang /_de dag ston zla 'bring po nya la tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gang na ba der lhags pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor 
[\[104b.5\]]gyis mthong ngo /_/tshangs par spyod pa de dag mthong nas kyang bsu ste/_gsong por smra bas yang dag par dga' bar byas te/_chos gos dang /_'khar gsil dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_gtur bu dang /_zhwa dang /_mchil lham dang /_gding ba dag blangs 
[\[104b.6\]]so/_/de dag kyang mkhan po'i drung du song nas bsnyen bkur byas te ji ltar khong du chud pa ni rjod par byed/_gong mar gyur pa ni 'dri bar byed cing rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar 
[\[104b.7\]]byed pa dag gyad bu nor gyis mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang slob dpon gcig pa dang /_mkhan po gcig pa de dag gi drung du song nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed cag gang du dong /_de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag gis mkhan po ni mthong zin pas da ni sangs 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das ltar 'gro'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis 'di snyam du bdag gis mkhan po dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi sku ni mthong na/_gzugs kyi sku ma mthong bas bdag 
[\[105a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro'o snyam du bsams so/_/de ltar bsams nas kyang gyad bu nor gyis mkhan po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mkhan po bdag gis mkhan po dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi sku ni 
[\[105a.3\]]mthong na/_gzugs kyi sku ma mthong bas da ni gzugs kyi sku blta bar 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_rta thul gyis gyad bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 
[\[105a.4\]]dper na u dum bA ra'i me tog ltar shin tu mthong bar dka' ba yin pas/_bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blta bar gyis shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor mkhan pos rjes su gnang bas ne'u ldangs mkhan 
[\[105a.5\]]po gcig pa rnams dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo /_/de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma la chos ston te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gyad bu nor rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ongs pa gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang gyad bu 
[\[105a.6\]]nor la bka' stsal pa/_gyad bu nor tshur shog_/'ongs pa legs so/_/khyod dus su phyin to zhes bka' stsal to/_/de'i tshe na gnas mal mi mthun par 'bogs par byed do/_/mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams su lhan cig mdo sde 
[\[105a.7\]]'dzin pa rnams dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams su lhan cig_/'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams dang /_mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams su lhan cig_/'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams su lhan cig ces bya ba nas de bzhin du mu gsum pa yang sbyar 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du gyad bu nor 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma'o bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas mal 'ged pa dang /_kha zas la bsko ba'i mchog tu gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas zhes bya ba'i bar nas/_bcom 
[\[105b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas mal 'bogs pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_
[\[105b.3\]]'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_gnas mal phog pa dang /_ma phog pa mi shes pa'o/_/dkar po'i phyogs ni de las bzlog par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gyad du nor gnas mal 'bogs par bsko bar 
[\[105b.4\]]bya'o zhes bya ba nas/_gnas mal bsham par byas nas las bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gyad bu nor 'di dge 'dun gyi gnas mal 'bogs par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar 
[\[105b.5\]]mdzod cig dang /_gyad bu nor dge 'dun gyi gnas mal 'bogs par bsko bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar du ste 'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de'i 'og tu las ji lta ba bzhin bya'o gang gi tshe gyad bu nor 'di dge 'dun gyi gnas mal 'bogs par bskos pa de'i tshe/_gnas mal 
[\[105b.6\]]gzhan du bsko bar brtsams te/_des mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams dang /_mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams su lhan cig_/'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams su lhan cig_/ma mo 'dzin pa rnams dang ma mo 'dzin pa rnams su lhan cig_/glo bur pa rnams 
[\[105b.7\]]dang glo bur pa rnams su lhan cig_/rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams dang rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams su lhan cig_/gang dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa de dag ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang lhan cig tu bskos/_gang dag lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]'bras bu thob pa de dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang lhan cig_/phyir mi 'ong ba rnams ni dgra bcom pa rnams dang lhan cig ste/_de ltar dge slong de rnams lhag par phan tshun du 'bel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la dbab pa dang /_dge ba'i phyogs 
[\[106a.2\]]'phel bar 'gyur ba de ltar gnas mal mthun par gzhan dang gzhan du bskos so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor rdzu 'phrul gyis gnas mal 'bogs par byed do/_/gang dag mtshan mo sngar 'ong ba de dag la ni sor mo gcig las 'od sbar te gnas mal 
[\[106a.3\]]'bogs par byed do/_/gang dag mtshan mo ches phyis 'ong ba de dag la ni sor mo gnyis las 'od sbar te 'bogs par byed do/_/de bzhin du gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa las 'od sbar te zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de nas dge slong de dag 'di snyam du 
[\[106a.4\]]'di ni chos dang ldan pas las byas pa yin te zhes bya ba nas/_khong du ma chud pa ni khong du chud par gyur/_khong du chud pa ni lhag par khyad par du khong du chud par gyur to/_/de ltar byas pa nas 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan te 
[\[106a.5\]]gnas mal 'bogs par byed ces phyogs bzhi dag tu de'i sgra grags par gyur to/_/de'i tshe gang dag ngo mtshar du gyur pa de dag gis ni mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir nyin par 'ongs nas 'od ma'i tshal gyi nyen kor du 'dug ste nyi ma nub pa dang mtshan mo 'ong bar byed do/_/de 
[\[106a.6\]]rnams la yang tshe dang ldan pa des de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan nas gnas mal 'bogs par byed do/_/re zhig na rgyal po'i khab de na sbyin pa po dang /_sbyin bdag de dag dge 'dun la zas rnam pa gsum du shom par byed de/_kha cig ni bsod pa sbyin 
[\[106a.7\]]par byed pa'o/_/kha cig ni 'bring dag sbyin par byed pa'o/_/kha cig ni ngan pa dag sbyin par byed pa'o/_/khyim gang na bsod pa dag sbyor ba de dag ni drug sde rnams kyi sngon ngo shes pa yin pas der ni rang 'ba' zhig 'gro bar byed do/_/gang na 'bring sbyin par byed pa 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]der ni grogs po dang /_nye gnas dag go/_/gang na ngan pa dag sbyin pa der ni dge slong phal rnams 'gro bar bshams so/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag dge bzang zhes bya ba bsod pa sbyin par byed pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i bar nas/_drug sde rnams re mos 'gro bar 
[\[106b.2\]]byed de/_nyi ma dang po la ni dga' bo dang /_nye dga' zan za bar byed do/_/nyi ma gnyis pa la ni 'dun pa dang /_'char ka'o/_/nyi ma gsum pa la ni 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so'o/_/khyim bdag des de rnams la dris pa/_'phags pa dag 'od ma'i tshal na dge 
[\[106b.3\]]slong gzhan mi bzhugs sam ci na/_'ga' tsam yang 'dir bshos gsol bar mi mdzad par yang dang yang du khyed cag kho na re mos byon/_de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyis mi shes so/_/'od ma'i tshal de na dge slong dag yod kyang nyin gcig bzhin du 
[\[106b.4\]]bza' ba dang /_bca' ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs spyod par byed pa de dang de dag khyod 'dra ba'i kha zas phul ba de ji ltar za bar byed/_nged cag ni khyod kho na la phan gdags pa'i phyir 'ong bar zad do/_/de nas khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa gal te 'phags 
[\[106b.5\]]pa khyed cag gis bdag la phan gdags par mi mdzad na gzhan su zhig bgyid par 'gyur zhes smras so/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na lho lam nas dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das yang dag par blta ba'i phyir ljongs rgyu zhing rim gyis 'od ma'i tshal du 'ongs so/_/de 
[\[106b.6\]]snga dro chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs te snga dro rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/_de srang na rgyu ba khyim bdag dge bzang gis mthong nas sngon ma byung ba zhig go snyam du bsams te des de la smras pa/_btsun pa ga las byon/_des smras pa/_lho 
[\[106b.7\]]lam nas so/_/ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir ro/_/bsti gnas gang du byas des smras pa/_'od ma'i tshal du'o/_/ci'i phyir bsod snyoms la rgyu/_des smras pa/_ci zan gcod phod dam/_btsun pa ci 'od ma'i tshal na da ltar dge 'dun la 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]sbyin bdag rnams bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_bldag pa'i rnam pa bsod pa bsod pa dag 'bul bar mi bgyid lags sam/_khyim bdag gal te de ltar gyur du zin na/_kho bo khyod kyi yul du bsod snyoms la 'ong re skan/_khyim bdag 
[\[107a.2\]]gis dge slong gi tshig thos nas drug sde rnams la dogs pa skyes te/_de dag ni bdag la gzhan du smra la/_dge slong 'di yang gzhan du smra'o snyam mo/_/des dge slong de la thugs khral skyungs shig dang /_deng khyod kyi gdugs tshod bdag sbyor na bdag rjes su gzung 
[\[107a.3\]]du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar nas des dge slong de khrid de song ngo //_//dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po brgyad pa/_drug sdes bskos pa'i dge slong gnyis kyang 'ongs pa dang /_khyim bdag des de dag bde bar 'dug tu bcug ste/_bza' ba 
[\[107a.4\]]dang /_bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa rab tu mang po dag legs par brims shing bstabs te zan zos zin pa dang /_khyim bdag gis drug sde gnyis la 'phags pa dag gis ni bdag la gdugs gcig bzhin du chos bshad pas de ring ni bdag sngon chad ma byon pa'i dge 
[\[107a.5\]]slong 'di las chos mnyan to zhes smras pa dang /_de gnyis kyis yon bsngo ba byas nas dong ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag dge bzang dge slong de'i mdun du 'dug nas dge slong de la smras pa/_'phags pa khyod la bdag gis de ring ni bshos gsol ba 'di ci bsod pa 
[\[107a.6\]]dag lags sam/_'on te ngan pa dag lags/_des smras pa/_sbyin bdag bdag lho lam nas 'ong bar brtsams pa gang yin pa tshun chad nas da'i bar du bdag gis 'di lta bu'i bsod pa dag za ma myong ngo /_/des yang smras pa/_'phags pa bdag la dge 
[\[107a.7\]]slong 'di dag kha zas 'di ngan no zhes rtag tu smra na de ji lta bu zhig lags/_des smras pa/_de dag gis gdon mi za bar khyim 'dir gzhan 'ga' yang mi 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir byas so/_/btsun pa ci'i slad du dge slong gzhan khyim 'dir mi byon/_khyim bdag 'dir 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]gzhan dag 'ong du glang po ches brdzis na ji ltar bya/_des 'di snyam du de kho na ltar yin no snyam du bsams nas/_des de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa don mjal lags kyis da chos kyi bka' mchid gsungs shig ces bya ba nas/_dge slong des chos kyi 
[\[107b.2\]]gtam gyis yang dag par bstan nas song ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de nas khyim bdag dge bzang gis skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag gis dge 'dun gyi gdugs tshod nar mar bsham pa de la gal te dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i 
[\[107b.3\]]dge slong mchis pas longs spyod par bgyid pa lta na g.yar dam de mi bshig par bgyi'o/_/de lta ma lags na bdag gi sbyin par bya ba'i chos ji ltar bshams pa rnams bzhag ste/_bdag gis gang zag sgo sgor stsal bar mi bgyi'o/_/de nas dge slong de dag gis 
[\[107b.4\]]'di snyam du rnam pa 'di lta bu'i nyes pa gang yin pa de ni zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gyad bu nor zas la bsko ba bsko bar bya'o/_/
[\[107b.5\]]gang gi tshe dge 'dun rnams kyis gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor zas las bsko bar bskos pa de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis sbyin bdag gis khyim de dag thams cad las gang dag ni bsod pa sbyin par byed/_gang dag ni 'bring sbyin 
[\[107b.6\]]par byed/_gang dag ni ngan pa dag sbyin par byed ces brtags so/_/des brtags nas kyang bsod pa dag sbyin par dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag bskos so/_/'bring dag sbyin par dge slong bar ma dag bskos so/_/tha ma dag sbyin par dge slong 
[\[107b.7\]]gzhon rabs dag bskos so/_/nyi ma gnyis pa la ni ngan pa dag sbyin par gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams so/_/'bring dag sbyin par gzhon rabs rnams so/_/bsod pa dag sbyin par bar ma rnams so/_/nyi ma gsum pa la ni bar ma dag sbyin par gnas 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]brtan rnams so/_/ngan pa dag sbyin par bar ma rnams so/_/bsod pa dag sbyin par gzhon rabs rnams te/_de ltar tshul de lta bus dge slong rnams zas la sko bar byed do/_/yang dge slong glo bur ba gang yin pa de dag nyi ma dang po la ni bsod 
[\[108a.2\]]pa sbyin pa dag tu'o/_/nyi ma gnyis pa la ni 'bring sbyin pa dag tu'o/_/nyi ma gsum pa la ni ngan pa sbyin pa dag tu sko bar byed cing /_nyi ma bzhi pa la ni lam srang gi spyod yul la mkhas par byed do/_/des rim par bklags pa de bzhin du dge 'dun rnams zas la 
[\[108a.3\]]bkod pa na rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin dang rim par bklags pa ji lta ba bzhin du thod rgal med par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong rnams gnas mal 'bogs pa rnams 
[\[108a.4\]]dang /_zas la bskos pa rnams kyi nang na gyad bu nor 'di mchog yin no/_/de'i tshe dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis de gnyis kyi gnas mal dang 
[\[108a.5\]]gnas khang yang bskos so/_/de nas nam nangs pa dang mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag zas las bsko ba su yod/_dge slong zhig gis de gnyis la smras pa/_gyad bu nor yin no/_/de gnyis kyis tshe dang 
[\[108a.6\]]ldan pa gyad bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gyad bu nor bdag cag gi zas skos shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis de gnyis nyi ma dang po la zas bsod pa sbyin pa dag tu bskos so/_/de nas mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes snga dro chos 
[\[108a.7\]]gos bgos/_lhung bzed thogs nas sbyin bdag gi khyim gang na bar dong ngo /_/khyim bdag de yang bu gcig pa sdug pa/_yid du 'ong ba shi bas de bu shi ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs pa'i phyir dge slong gi zas bsham pa ma byas so/_/de gnyis kyis kyang 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]ma brtags par 'ongs pa khyim bdag gis mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang khyim gyi mi rnams la smras pa/_dge slong dag gi phyir zas bshams pa cung zad yod dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_ma mchis so/_/des 'di snyam du re zhig bu shi ba 'di yang phung 
[\[108b.2\]]byas pa gcig yin na/_gnyis pa go ci'i phyir bya snyam du bsams so/_/de ltar bsams nas kyang des kha zas ngan pa zhig phul lo/_/de gnyis kyis kyang zos so/_/zos nas kyang de gnyis kyis 'di snyam du bdag cag gis thos pa yang gzhan la/_myong ba yang 
[\[108b.3\]]gzhan du gyur te zas ngan pa dag zos par gyur mod kyi/_'on kyang sang ni zas bsod pa dag bza' bar bya'o snyam du bsams so/_/de gnyis nyi ma gnyis pa la sbyin bdag 'bring dag sbyin par bskos te der dong ba las zhes bya ba nas/_der yang nyes pa de bzhin du gyur 
[\[108b.4\]]to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/nyi ma gsum pa la sbyin bdag ngan pa dag sbyin pa der bskos so/_/dgra bcom pa rnams ni ma dgongs par ye shes gzigs pa mi 'jug pa yin la/_de gnyis kyis kyang kha zas ngan pa dag zos pas de dag lus shin tu rjud par gyur to/_/
[\[108b.5\]]de nas dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis kyis 'di snyam du kye ma'o sdug bsngal lo/_/kye ma'o mi bzad de/_tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis bsams bzhin du bdag cag gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du kha zas ngan pa zar bcug pas tho btsams te lus shin tu 
[\[108b.6\]]rjud par gyur gyis/_brku thabs 'ga' zhig bya'o snyam du bsams so/_/de'i tshe dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis kyi sring mo dge slong ma mdza' mo zhes bya ba rgyal po'i khab na dge slong ma'i dbyar khang rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba na 'dug go/_/de 
[\[108b.7\]]nas dge slong ma mdza' mos dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/dge slong ma mdza' mo phyogs gcig tu 'dug 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]pa na dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis gtam 'dre bar mi byed/_phebs par smra bar mi byed/_lta bar mi byed/_rnam par lta bar mi byed do/_/de nas dge slong ma mdza' mos dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis la 'di 
[\[109a.2\]]skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa dag ci'i slad du bdag la gtam 'dre bar mi mdzad/_phebs par smra bar mi mdzad/_lta bar mi mdzad/_rnam par lta bar mi mdzad sring mo kho bo cag gnyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis lan gsum gyi bar du kha zas ngan pas tho 
[\[109a.3\]]btsams te/_lus shin tu rjud par gyur na/_de khyod kyis yal bar dor ram/_'phags pa dag 'o na de la bdag gis ci zhig bgyi sring mo khyod tshur shog_/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces btsun pa 'di ltar 'phags 
[\[109a.4\]]pa gyad bu nor bdag dang lhan cig mi tshangs par spyad de/_phas pham pa byung ba de ni mi mdzes shing tshul dang mthun pa ma lags so zhes smros shig dang /_kho bo cag gnyis kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/_bdag 
[\[109a.5\]]cag gnyis kyi sring mos ji skad gsol pa de kho na bzhin du bdag cag gnyis kyis kyang 'tshal to zhes smra bar bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_dge slong ma mdza' mos de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa dag bdag gis dge slong dag pa ltung ba ma 
[\[109a.6\]]mchis pa la gzhi ma mchis par phas pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis ji ltar skur pa gdab/_sring mo khyod ci srid du de skad mi zer ba de srid kyi bar du kho bo cag gnyis khyod la gtam 'dre bar mi byed/_phebs par smra bar mi byed/_lta bar mi byed/_rnam par lta bar mi 
[\[109a.7\]]byed do/_/de nas dge slong ma mdza' mo yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug nas/_dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa de lta na bdag gis bgyi ba gang lags pa de bgyi'o/_/sring mo khyod de'i phyir ji srid du kho bo 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]cag gnyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der ma son pa de srid du sdod la/_de'i 'og tu khyod shog shig_/de nas dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 
[\[109b.2\]]'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas dge slong ma mdza' mos dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis dong nas ring po ma lon par rig pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 
[\[109b.3\]]te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong ma mdza' mos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di ltar 'phags pa gyad bu nor bdag dang lhan cig mi tshangs par spyad de phas pham pa byung ba de ni mi mdzes shing tshul dang 
[\[109b.4\]]mthun pa ma lags so/_/dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa de de bzhin no/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/_bdag cag gnyis kyi sring mos ji skad gsol pa de kho na bzhin du bdag cag gnyis 
[\[109b.5\]]kyis kyang 'tshal to/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la bka' stsal pa/_gyad bu nor khyod kyis de thos sam/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis thos lags so/_/
[\[109b.6\]]gyad bu nor khyod kyi de ji lta bu yin/_bdag ji lta bu lags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen to/_/bdag gi ji lta bu lags pa de bde bar gshegs pas mkhyen to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gyad bu nor khyod kyi dran na dran no zhes smros shig_/
[\[109b.7\]]khyod mi dran na mi dran no zhes smros shig_/bcom ldan 'das mi dran lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mi dran lags so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na rnga ma'i bsil yab thogs te bcom ldan 'das la g.yob 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]cing 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di ltar dge slong ma mdza' mo bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der mchis te phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces btsun pa 'di 
[\[110a.2\]]ltar 'phags pa gyad bu nor bdag dang lhan cig mi tshangs par spyad de phas pham pa byung ba de ni mi mdzes shing tshul dang mthun pa ma lags so zhes mchi la/_dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis kyang 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no/_/bde bar 
[\[110a.3\]]gshegs pa de de bzhin te/_bdag cag gnyis kyi sring mos ji skad gsol pa de kho na bzhin bdag cag gnyis kyis kyang 'tshal to zhes mchi na/_tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la smra ci 'tshal/_sgra can zin de'i phyir na de khyod nyid la dris/_khyod kyis ji ltar 
[\[110a.4\]]bzod pa de kho na bzhin du lan thob shig_/gal te dge slong ma mdza' mo nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas 'di skad ces btsun pa 'di ltar 'phags pa sgra can zin bdag dang lhan cig mi tshangs par spyad de phas pham pa byung ba de ni mi mdzes shing tshul dang mthun pa 
[\[110a.5\]]ma lags so zhes zer la/_dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis kyis kyang 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/_bdag cag gnyis kyis kyang sring mos ji skad gsol pa de kho na bzhin du 'tshal to 
[\[110a.6\]]zhes zer na/_de la sgra can zin khyod kyis ji skad lan gdab par bya/_btsun pa bdag gis 'di skad ces dran na yang dran no zhes gsol lo/_/mi dran na yang mi dran no zhes gsol lo/_/re zhig skyes bu blun po khyod kyis kyang don de smra bar gyur na/_dge slong 
[\[110a.7\]]gyad bu nor dag pa ltung ba med pas ci'i phyir smra bar mi bya/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong gyad bu nor ni dran pa dang ldan par zung shig_/dge slong ma mdza' mo ni rang gis khas blangs pas 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]bsnyil bar gyis shig_/dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis la ni ci zhig mthong /_ji ltar mthong /_gang du mthong /_gang na mthong /_khyed gnyis ci'i phyir der son ces legs par rab tu smra zhing brtag pa gyis shig ces bka' 
[\[110b.2\]]stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs te nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gtsug lag khang du gshegs so/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs nas ring po ma lon par rig nas/_tshe dang 
[\[110b.3\]]ldan pa gyad bu nor ni dran pa dang ldan par bzung /_dge slong ma mdza' mo ni rang gis khas blangs pas bsnyil dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis la ni ci zhig mthong /_ji ltar mthong /_gang du mthong /_gang na mthong /_khyed gnyis ci'i 
[\[110b.4\]]phyir der son ces legs par rab tu smras shing brtags so/_/legs par rab tu smras shing brtags pa na de gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la mi tshangs par spyod pa'i phas pham pa ma byung mod kyi/_'on kyang 
[\[110b.5\]]bdag cag tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis lan gsum gyi bar du kha zas ngan pa zar bcug pas tho btsams te/_lus shin tu rjud par gyur te zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de gnyis kyis 'di snyam du kye ma'o sdug bsngal lo/_/kye ma'o mi bzad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[110b.6\]]gyad bu nor gyis bsams bzhin du zhes bya ba nas lan gsum gyi bar du kha zas ngan pa zar bcug pas lus shin tu rjud par gyur pas brku thabs 'ga' zhig bya'o zhes bsams te/_bdag cag gis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la 'dun pas smras pa/_zhe sdang dang /_
[\[110b.7\]]gti mug dang /_'jigs pas smras par zad kyi/_tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la mi tshangs par spyad pa'i phas pham par ma byung ste/_'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor dag pa ltung ba med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mi gti mug can de dag gnyis kyis 'di ltar zang zing cung zad tsam gyi rgyus shes bzhin du [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig smras par gyur to/_/de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de nyid las tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[111a.2\]]gnyis bka' stsal pa/_lus can [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba yi/_/chos gcig las ni 'das gyur cing /_/'jig rten pha rol bshig pa yis/_/'di na sdig pa mi bya med/_/lcags sgong me lce 'dra ba dag_/zos par gyur pa ches bla yi/_/tshul 'chal 
[\[111a.3\]]yang dag sdom med pas/_/yul 'khor bsod snyoms za ba min/_/de nas nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis kye ma'o/_/a la la rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'di ni mi bzad pa'o/_/mchog tu mi bzad pa'o zhes bya ba nas/_zang zing cung zad 
[\[111a.4\]]tsam gyi rgyus dge slong la skur pa 'debs par byed pa ni ngan pa'o ngan pa'o zhes smras so/_/de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_nyes med srid gsum 'gro ba yi/_/nor la'ang skur pa btab pa'i phyir/_/'jig rten dag na blo ldan 
[\[111a.5\]]gang /_/'khor ba la ni dga' bar byed/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gang zag gsum po 'di dag ni 'di dag ma spangs na ngan song du 'gro ba/_sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba dag yin no/_/
[\[111a.6\]]gsum gang zhe na/_dge slong dag 'di la gcig ni 'dod pa rnams la sten cing sdig pa mi dge ba dag byed pa ste/_dge slong dag de ma spangs na gang zag 'di ni ngan song du 'gro ba/_sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba dang po yin no/_/gzhan yang dge slong 
[\[111a.7\]]dag 'di la gang zag gcig ni 'dod pa rnams ni gtsang ba'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni bsod pa'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni longs spyad par bya ba'o/_/'dod pa rnams la nyes pa med do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba ste/_dge slong dag de ma spangs na gang zag 'di ni 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]ngan song du 'gro ba/_sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba gnyis pa yin no/_/gzhan yang dge slong dag 'di la gang zag gcig ni bdag nyid mi tshangs par spyod pa byed la/_gzhan dag la yang gzhi med par mi tshangs par spyod pa'i chos kyis skur pa 'debs par byed 
[\[111b.2\]]pa ste/_dge slong dag de ma spangs na gang zag 'di ni ngan song du 'gro ba/_sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba gsum pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_ston pas gzhan yang 
[\[111b.3\]]'di skad bka' stsal to/_/skyes bu skyes pa'i kha nas ni/_/ngag gis tshig ngan rjod byed pa'i/_/sta re 'byung zhing de yis ni/_/bdag nyid gcod par byed par 'gyur/_/gang zhig smad bya stod byed cing /_/bstod bya rnams la smod byed pa/_/de yi kha 
[\[111b.4\]]nas phung khrol skyed/_/phung khrol can gyis bde mi myong /_/gang 'dir cho los rang nor zad byed pa/_/de ni phung khrol cung zad tsam du zad/_/gang zhig bde bar gshegs la yid rab 'khrug_/de 'dir phung khrol shin tu chen po yin/_/gang yid 'phags 
[\[111b.5\]]pas smad pa'i sdig gnas na/_/bye ba brgya phrag stong phrag dung phyur phrag_/sum bcu drug dang lnga po ji snyed par/_/sems dmyal chu bur chu bur rdol bar 'gro/_/gang gi tshe dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma mdza' mo ni rang gis khas blangs pas bsnyil/_
[\[111b.6\]]mdza' bo dang sa las skyes la ni legs par rab tu dris pa de'i tshe/_dge slong ma rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyi bsngags pa ni smra bar byed/_dge slong ma mdza' mo la ni bsngags pa ma yin pa rjod par byed do/_/de nas dge slong 
[\[111b.7\]]ma mdza' mo'i phu nu mo dge slong ma mdza' can ma zhes bya ba dge slong ma mdza' mo'i bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa de'i tshe dge slong ma rnams la khros 'khrugs rngam pas dge slong ma rnams la yang gzhi med par phas pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skur pa 'debs shing 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]dge slong ma rnams spa 'gong bar byed do/_/skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis kyang /_bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_
[\[112a.2\]]dngos po 'di dang /_skabs 'di la zhes bya ba nas bslab pa bcas pa'i bar du rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhig khros shing zhe sdang ma spangs pas ci nas kyang 'di tshangs par spyod pa dang dbral lo snyam nas dge slong ma dag pa ltung ba med pa la 
[\[112a.3\]]gzhi med par phas pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skur pa las de dus gzhan zhig na dris kyang rung ma dris kyang rung rtsod pa de yang gzhi med pa yin la/_dge slong ma zhe sdang la gnas pas zhe sdang gis smras so zhe na yang chos 'di dang po nyid kyi ltung bar 'gyur la/_nges 
[\[112a.4\]]par 'byung ba dang bcas pa dge 'dun lhag ma'o/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni mdza' mo'o/_/khros shing zhes bya ba ni 'khrugs pa dang /_rngam pa dang /_ngan pa dang /_yi ma rangs pa'o/_/zhe sdang ma spangs pas zhes bya ba ni 'khrugs pa ma 
[\[112a.5\]]bsal bar ro/_/ci nas kyang 'di tshangs par spyod pa dang dbral lo zhes bya ba ni ci nas kyang 'di dge sbyong gi tshul dang dbral lo snyam nas so/_/dge slong ma dag pa ltung ba med pa la zhes bya ba ni gzhi de'i ltung ba med pa'o/_/gzhi med par zhes bya ba ni gzhi gsum 
[\[112a.6\]]po mthong ba'i gzhi dang /_thos pa'i gzhi dang /_dogs pa'i gzhi med par ro/_/phas pham par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni brgyad po gang yang rung bas so/_/chos kyis zhes bya ba ni chos ma yin pa la chos kyi sgrar gsungs pa yin no/_/skur pa las zhes bya 
[\[112a.7\]]ba ni skur pa btab pa las so/_/de dus gzhan zhig na zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan na'o/_/dris kyang rung zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag gis so/_/ma dris kyang rung zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid 'gyod pa dang /_cung zad 'gyod pa dang /_rnam par 'gyod pa dang /_yid la gcags pa 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]skyes nas so/_/rtsod pa de yang zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa bzhi po 'gyod pa'i phyir rtsod pa dang /_mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod pa dang /_ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa dang /_bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa'o/_/gzhi med pa yin la zhes bya ba ni gzhi gsum po dag med pa yin pa la'o/_/dge 
[\[112b.2\]]slong ma zhe sdang la gnas pas zhes bya ba ni dge sbyong gi tshul dang dbral bar 'dod pas so/_/zhe sdang gis smras so zhes bya ba ni lhag par yang dge sbyong gi tshul dang dbral bar 'dod pas so/_/chos 'di zhes bya ba 'di ni chos ma yin pa la chos kyi sgrar bstan pa'o/_/dang 
[\[112b.3\]]po nyid kyis ltung bar 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni mod la ltung bar 'gyur ba'o/_/nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni rton pa dang bcas pa'o/_/dge 'dun lhag ma zhes bya ba ni ltung ba de gnyi ga'i dge 'dun la rag las pa dang /_gnyi ga'i dge 'dun dang 'brel ba dang /_
[\[112b.4\]]gnyi ga'i dge 'dun la rton pa yin te/_ltung ba de gnyi ga'i dge 'dun las ldang bar 'gyur gyi gang zag las ni ma yin pa'o/_/yang na phas pham par gyur pa brgyad po ni lhag ma med pa yin la/_ltung ba 'di ni lhag ma dang bcas pa yin pa de'i phyir lhag ma

[\[112b.6\]]thos pa dang /_mi dogs par 'du shes bsgyur cing /_bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces bdag gis mthong ngo /_/bdag gis thos so/_/bdag dogs so zhes zer na brjod do cog dge 'dun 
[\[112b.7\]]lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/de thos la de yang brjed pa dang /_de dogs la de yang brjed bzhin du des 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang lta ba bsgyur te/_'di skad ces bdag gis thos te de yang ma brjed do/_/bdag dogs te 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]de yang ma brjed do zhes zer na brjod do cog dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/thos pa la yid ches nas bdag gis mthong ngo zhes zer ba dang /_thos pa la yid ma ches par bdag gis mthong ngo zhes zer ba dang /_thos pa la dogs pa na bdag gis mthong 
[\[113a.2\]]ngo zhes zer ba dang /_thos pa la mi dogs pa na bdag gis mthong ngo zhes zer ba dang /_dogs pa la dogs pa na bdag gis mthong ngo zhes zer ba na brjod do cog dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur te/_de ltar gzhi bcus ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar gzhi lngas ltung bar

[\[113a.4\]]zer na ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/des thos la de yang brjed pa dang /_de dogs la de yang brjed pa la des 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces bdag gis thos te de yang ma brjed do/_/
[\[113a.5\]]bdag dogs te de yang ma brjed do zhes zer na ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar gzhi lngas ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar gang zag dag pa la skur pa 'debs pa la gzhi bcus ltung bar 'gyur la/_gzhi lngas ltung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du gang zag dag pa ma dag pa

[\[113a.7\]]gcig gis ltung bar 'gyur zhe na/_des ma mthong ba dang /_ma thos pa dang /_mi dogs pa la des 'du shes bsgyur cing /_bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces bdag gis mthong ngo /_/bdag gis 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]thos so/_/bdag dogs so zhes zer na brjod do cog dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/des mthong ba de la yang brjed pa dang /_des thos la de yang brjed pa dang /_des dogs la de yang brjed pa la des 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_

[\[113b.5\]]pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces bdag gis mthong ngo /_/thos so/_/dogs so zhes zer na ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/des mthong la de yang ma brjed pa dang /_des thos la de yang ma brjed pa dang /_

[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]gang zag ma dag pa dag pa ltar bcos pa la skur pa 'debs pa la yang gzhi bcu gcig gis ltung bar 'gyur la/_gzhi drug gis ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[114a.2\]]ldan 'das la zhus pa/_las ci zhig bgyi na zhes bya ba'i bar nas sngon gyi rabs rnams rgya cher brjod par bya'o/_/las ci zhig bgyis nas gnas mal 'bogs pa dang /_zas la sko ba gang lags par gyur cing dgra bcom pa nyid thob kyang skur pa btab par

[\[114a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o/_/dge slong yid ches pa rnams ni de tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la bdag nyid chen po 'di ni rang gi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dag spangs te dge slong rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i 
[\[114a.6\]]zhal ta'i las la brtson par byed pa la ltos zhes lhag par yang dad pa skyes par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri dang ha cang yang mi ring ba na rdzing bu rdo rtsigs can zhes bya ba'i 'gram na nyin mo gnas par byed do/_/de 
[\[114a.7\]]nas dge slong ma ut+pa la'i mdog tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor ga la ba der song ste/_phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyi chos gos snam sbyar tshon dmar 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]por gsar du btsos shing dge slong ma ut+pa la'i mdog kyang skra bregs nas ring po ma lon par gyur to/_/de nas chos gos snam sbyar rlung gis khyer nas de'i mgo la 'khris so/_/de'i tshe na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]zhig kyang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo dang rung ba'i chos ma yin pa byed do/_/de na 
[\[114b.2\]]mdza' bo dang sa las skyes kyang rdzing bu rdo rtsigs can na phyag dar khrod pa 'khru bar byed do/_/mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes kyis dge slong ma ut+pa la'i mdog tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyi rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal ba na/_chos gos kyi mtha' ma rlung gis khyer bas 
[\[114b.3\]]mgo la 'khris pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]zhig kyang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo dang rung ba'i chos ma yin pa byed pa yang mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang mdza' bos sa las skyes la smras pa/_sa las skyes ut+pa la'i mdog dang gyad bu nor la ltos/_de'i tshe ni bdag cag gis cha med pa las brgal 
[\[114b.4\]]gyi/_da ni bdag cag gis cha rnyed do zhes smras nas/_de gnyis kyis cha des tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la brgal to/_/dge slong rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed cag gcig tu lha dang mi rnams yongs su btang nas gcig kho nar sems can dmyal bar 
[\[114b.5\]]gnas par byed dam ci/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_bdag cag gis ni ma nyes na bdag cag gi mig gis nyes grang zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la ci zhig mthong ngo /_/ji ltar mthong /_gang du mthong /_gang na mthong /_khyed gnyis ci'i phyir der

[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad pa de'i tshe dge slong ma rnams kyis cha des ut+pa la'i mdog la brgal to/_/skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras so/_/dge slong rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan

[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]zer na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la phas pham par 'gyur ba'i lta ba thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing zhes bya ba nas/_bdag gis dge slong ma phas pham

[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing zhes bya ba nas/_bdag gis dge slong ma phas pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes zer na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma ltung byed kyi ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la dge 'dun lhag

[\[116b.3\]]de de la ltung byed kyi lta ba nyid thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing zhes bya ba nas/_bdag gis dge slong ma phas pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes zer na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma ltung byed kyi ltung ba 
[\[116b.4\]]'byin pa mthong zhing de de la so sor bshags par bya ba'i lta ba thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing zhes bya ba nas/_bdag gis dge slong ma phas pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes zer na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas 
[\[116b.5\]]dge slong ma ltung byed kyi ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la nyes byas kyi lta ba thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing zhes bya ba nas/_bdag gis dge slong ma phas pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes zer na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[116b.6\]]slong mas dge slong ma so sor bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la ltung ba med pa'i lta ba thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing zhes bya ba nas/_bdag gis dge slong ma phas pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes zer na dge 'dun 
[\[116b.7\]]lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma so sor bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la phas pham pa'i lta ba thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing zhes bya ba nas/_bdag gis dge slong ma phas pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]pa mthong ngo zhes zer na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma so sor bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la dge 'dun lhag ma'i lta ba thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing zhes bya ba nas bdag 
[\[117a.2\]]gis dge slong ma phas pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes zer na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma so sor bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la ltung byed kyi lta ba thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing 
[\[117a.3\]]zhes bya ba nas/_bdag gis dge slong ma phas pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes zer na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma so sor bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la so sor bshags par bya ba nyid kyi 
[\[117a.4\]]lta ba thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing zhes bya ba nas/_bdag gis dge slong ma phas pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes zer na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma so sor bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de 
[\[117a.5\]]de la nyes byas kyi lta ba thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing zhes bya ba nas/_bdag gis dge slong ma phas pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes zer na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma nyes byas kyi ltung ba 'byin pa mthong 
[\[117a.6\]]zhing de de la ltung ba med pa'i lta ba thob nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing zhes bya ba nas/_bdag gis dge slong ma phas pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes zer na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma nyes byas kyi ltung ba 'byin 
[\[117a.7\]]pa mthong zhing de de la phas pham par lta ba thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing zhes bya ba nas/_bdag gis dge slong ma phas pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes zer na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma nyes byas kyi 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la dge 'dun lhag ma'i lta ba thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing zhes bya ba nas/_bdag gis dge slong ma phas pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes zer na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma 
[\[117b.2\]]nyes byas kyi ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la ltung byed kyi lta ba thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing zhes bya ba nas/_bdag gis dge slong ma phas pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes zer na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma 
[\[117b.3\]]nyes byas kyi ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la so sor bshags par bya ba'i lta ba thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing zhes bya ba nas/_bdag gis dge slong ma phas pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes zer na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[117b.4\]]slong mas dge slong ma nyes byas kyi ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la nyes byas kyi ltung ba nyid kyi lta ba thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing zhes bya ba nas/_bdag gis dge slong ma phas pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes zer na dge 'dun lhag mar 
[\[117b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma'i rnam par 'byed pa las dge 'dun lhag ma gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe sbom dga' mo spos 'tshong 
[\[117b.6\]]gi khye'u zhig la chags so/_/de nas sbom dga' mo spos 'tshong gi khye'u ga la ba der song ste phyin nas des ji ltar de yang chags par 'gyur ba de lta bur byas so/_/de chags pas chags pa las cung zad bdag gir byed cing de yang dang yang du song nas zong cung zad cig byin 
[\[117b.7\]]nas rin mang du len to/_/de nas spos 'tshong gi khye'u de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis ji srid cig na nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo/_/de nas spos 'tshong gi khye'u des dus gzhan zhig na sbom dga' mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]bdag dang nam zhig mjal bar 'gyur/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod glang po che mo dang phrad par 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong ma des sbom dga' mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma mi 'di chags par mi mkhyen tam/_
[\[118a.2\]]des 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes so/_/ci'i slad du khyod skyes pa chags pa las cung zad bdag gir mdzad pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis thos so/_/thos nas dge slong dag la smras so/_/dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas 
[\[118a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas bslab pa bcas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_yang dge slong ma gang chags nas skyes pa chags pa la cung zad bdag gir byed na chos 'di yang dang po nas ltung bar 'gyur zhing nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa ste dge 'dun 
[\[118a.4\]]lhag ma'o/_/dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/chags pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags pa dang /_kun du 'dod chags pa dang /_kun nas dkris pa'o/_/skyes pa chags pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags pa dang /_kun du 'dod chags pa dang /_kun 
[\[118a.5\]]nas dkris pa spos 'tshong gi khye'u'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/las zhes bya ba ni thad nas so/_/cung zad ces bya ba ni bza' ba lnga dang bca' ba lnga'o/_/bdag gir byed ces bya ba ni blangs nas mgrin par mid pa'o/_/chos 'di zhes bya ba 'di ni 
[\[118a.6\]]chos ma yin pa la chos kyi sgrar gsungs pa'o/_/dang po nas ltung bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni mod la ltung bar 'gyur ba'o/_/nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni rton pa dang bcas pas bya ba'o/_/dge 'dun lhag ma zhes bya ba ni ltung ba 'di gnyi 
[\[118a.7\]]ga'i dge 'dun la rag las pa dang /_gnyi ga'i dge 'dun dang 'brel ba dang /_gnyi ga'i dge 'dun la rton pa dang /_ltung ba 'di gnyi ga'i dge 'dun las ldang bar 'gyur gyi gang zag las ma yin pa dang /_gzhan yang phas pham par 'gyur ba brgyad ni 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]lhag ma med pa yin gyi/_ltung ba 'di ni lhag ma dang bcas pa yin te/_de bas na dge 'dun lhag ma zhes bya'o/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong ma gang chags pas skyes pa chags pa las cung zad bdag gir byed na dge 'dun 
[\[118b.2\]]lhag ma'o/_/chags pas skyes pa ma chags pa las na nyes byas so/_/ma chags pas chags pa las na sbom po'o/_/las dang po pa la sogs pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/dge slong ma'i rnam par 'byed pa las dge 'dun lhag ma bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[118b.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la bslab pa bca' ba mdzad pa dang /_de phyin chad nam yang dge slong ma rnams 
[\[118b.4\]]nyo tshong mi byed do/_/de dag phongs pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dran pa nye bar bzhag la nyo bar bya'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mos gtsug dga' mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye phu nu mo re zhig khyod ma chags par gyis la khyod ma 
[\[118b.5\]]chags par gyur nas skyes pa chags pa las cung zad zhig long shig_/des song nas ji ltar skyes pa chags pa las cung zad bdag gir byed pa de ltar byas so/_/de nas gtsug dga' mos sbom dga' mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma skyes pa 'di 
[\[118b.6\]]ni chags so/_/des 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci'i phyir chags/_de de ltar bdag gir byed pa na dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa/_ci'i phyir de ltar byed/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/der zad mod skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras 
[\[118b.7\]]pa nas bslab pa bcas pa'i bar du ste/_yang dge slong ma gang dge slong ma la 'di skad ces phu nu mo re zhig khyod ma chags par gyis la khyod ma chags par gyur nas skyes pa chags pa las cung zad bdag gir gyis shig ces zer na chos 'di yang dang po nas ltung bar 'gyur 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]zhing nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa ste dge 'dun lhag ma'o/_/dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/dge slong ma la zhes bya ba ni gtsug dga' mo la'o/_/re zhig khyod ma chags par gyis la zhes bya ba ni 'dod ma chags pa dang /_kun du 
[\[119a.2\]]'dod ma chags pa dang /_kun nas ma dkris par gyis la'o/_/skyes pa chags pa las zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags pa dang /_kun du 'dod chags pa dang /_kun nas dkris pa las so/_/cung zad bdag gir gyis zhes bya ba ni bza' ba lnga dang /_bca' ba lnga long 
[\[119a.3\]]la bdag gir gyis shig pa ste 'di ni snga ma bzhin no/_/'di skad du zer na zhes bya ba ni smra na'o/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_gang cung zad ji tsam du dge slong mas dge slong ma la 'di skad ces khyod tshur ma chags par gyur nas skyes pa chags pa las cung 
[\[119a.4\]]zad long la bdag gir gyis shig ces zer na thams cad du dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma'i rnam par 'byed pa las dge 'dun lhag ma lnga pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po dgu pa/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[119a.5\]]ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe dge slong ma mdza' mo rang gis khas blangs pas bsnyil ba de'i tshe skyes pas blangs nas khyim gyi 'tsho tshis byed du bcug cing de dang rtse bar byed pa na bu dang bu mo dag kyang skyes so/_/
[\[119a.6\]]de dus gzhan zhig na nad kyis thebs pa dang /_de'i phu nu mo dge slong ma mdza' can ma zhes bya bas de nad kyis thebs par thos nas blta ba'i phyir gcig pu song ste des de la bltas nas slar log go/_/de nas mdza' mos phu nu mo la 'di skad ces 'phags ma gal te 
[\[119a.7\]]na bdag do mod 'gum yang gdas ma bzhud par 'dir bzhugs shig ces smras pa dang /_de yang der 'dug go/_/de nas mdza' mo yang de nyid kyi nub mo dus las 'das so/_/de nas mdza' mo'i khyos mya ngan bya bar brtsams pa dang /_de'i grogs po zhig gis 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]smras pa/_'di ni de'i phu nu mo mdza' can ma zhes bya ba yin gyis de nyid blang bar gyis shig_/de nas mdza' mo'i khyos mdza' can ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te mdza' can ma spro na khyim 'di dang /_mdza' mo'i bu dang /_bu mo dag yongs su skyongs 
[\[119b.2\]]shig_/mdza' can mas 'di snyam du gal te 'dir cung zad cig smras na de nyid du bdag brtul zhugs dang phral bar 'gyur bas mi smra bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas nam nangs pa dang de 'gro bar byas so/_/de nas skyes pa des mdza' can ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[119b.3\]]'phags ma khyim 'di khyod kyi lags kyis ma bzhud cig_/des 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyi khyim btson rar gyur cig_/khyod kyi khyim mes tshig par gyur cig smras nas song ngo /_/de la dge slong ma rnams kyis khyod mdang sum ga la nyal nyal zhes 
[\[119b.4\]]dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_bdag gi phu nu mo dus las 'das pa'i de na'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_gal te 'ga' zhig gis khyod brtul zhugs dang phral na khyod kyis ci byar yod/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te bdag gis kha rog par ma 
[\[119b.5\]]'dug na deng nyid du bdag brtul zhugs dang bral bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras so zhes bya ba nas bslab pa bcas pa'i bar du'o/_/yang dge slong ma gang mtshan mo gcig pu phyi rol du gnas par byed na chos 'di yang
