[\[141a.3\]]par 'byung ba dang bcas pa ste zhes bya ba ni ston pa dang bcas pa'o/_/gzhan ni snga ma ji lta ba bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas dge 'dun gyis dbyen gyi rjes su phyogs par zhugs na gang ci yang rung ste/_thams cad du nyes byas 
[\[141a.4\]]kyi ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhams te bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/gzhan ni snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong ma'i rnam par 'byed pa las dge 'dun lhag ma [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa 
[\[141a.5\]]rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe re lde ri la 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis dang /_dge slong dmar ser can rnams khyim sun 'byin 
[\[141a.6\]]pa'i sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod cing 'khod do/_/de rnams bud med dang lhan cig tu co 'dri bar byed/_kun du rtse bar byed/_ca co 'don par byed/_dgod pa dang /_rtse ba dang /_lus kyis rtsab hral byed cing /_de rnams bud med dang lhan cig tu stan gcig 
[\[141a.7\]]dang /_mal gcig la 'khod par byed/_snod gcig tu bza' ba rnam pa du ma za bar byed/_snod gcig nas btung ba du ma 'thung bar byed/_me tog dag 'thog par byed/_'thog tu 'jug par byed/_rna rgyan du byed/_rna rgyan du byed du 'jug_/me 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]tog phreng rgyud par byed/_rgyud du 'jug par byed/_bro rdung bar byed/_glu len par byed/_rol mo'i sgra yang 'byin par byed cing /_ci bro legs par brdungs sam/_glu legs par blangs sam/_rol mo'i sgra legs par phyung ngam zhes bya ba nas rgyug 
[\[141b.2\]]par byed/_snyegs par byed/_mchong bar byed pa'i bar dang /_chos gos bzhag ste/_brang gis 'gro bar byed/_nya 'phar ba dang /_rus sbal 'gre ba dang /_'bur log kyang byed do/_/lag pa rdob par byed/_dpung pa rdob par byed/_brla sgyur bar 
[\[141b.3\]]byed/_rdob par byed cing kha nas rnga pa Ta ha'i sgra dag kyang 'byin par byed/_kha nas rnga man du ka dang /_kha nas rnga'i sgra dag 'byin par byed la/_khyu mchog gi nga ro 'byin par byed/_ma he'i skad 'byin par byed/_glang po che'i bzhin du skad 'don par byed/_rma 
[\[141b.4\]]bya'i skad 'byin par byed/_khu byug gi skad 'don par byed cing /_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_shing rta dang /_dpung bu chung gi dmag kyang 'gyed cing /_'gyed du 'jug par byed/_bud med kyi dmag dang /_skyes pa'i dmag dang /_khye'u'i dmag dang /_bu mo'i 
[\[141b.5\]]dmag kyang 'gyed par byed/_'gyed du 'jug par byed la/_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo'i dmag kyang 'gyed par byed/_'gyed du 'jug par byed cing /_bya gag gi 'thab mo dang /_lug gi 'thab mo dang /_bya la ba ka'i 'thab mo dang /_thi 
[\[141b.6\]]ba'i 'thab mo dang /_bya gag dang /_lug dang /_bya la ba ka dang /_thi ba'i 'thab mo dag kyang 'gyed par byed/_'gyed du 'jug par byed do/_/'di dag dang gzhan yang dge sbyong gis bya ba ma yin pa byed cing byed du 'jug par byed do/_/de'i tshe grogs byed pa 
[\[141b.7\]]bcu gnyis sde yang dgod pa dang /_rtse ba dang /_lus kyis rtsab hral byed de/_de rnams spyod pa de dang /_spyod tshul de dang /_spyod lam des gnas pa na dge slong sdig pa can gnas pa'i phyir dge slong ma lhags pa rnams kyang mi 'ong zhing /_lhags pa'i rnams kyang 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]slar 'dod par byed/_skra 'greng ba dang /_skra 'phyar ba rnams kyang mi 'khod do/_/de rnams kyi spyod lam des re lde ri la 'khod pa'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams yid ma rangs shing ma dad par gyur nas dge slong gnyug ma rnams la yang 
[\[142a.2\]]bsod snyoms mi sbyin zhing mi bya'o snyam du sems na glo bur du 'ongs pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams dang re lde ri la dong ste/_dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis bskrad pa'i las byas 
[\[142a.3\]]so/_/de nyid kyi tshe dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams kyang khyim sun 'byin pa byas pa'i phyir bskrad pa'i las byas so/_/dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams kyi lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas rnams kyis ni mnyan yod du lhags nas bshags par bya ba gang yin pa 
[\[142a.4\]]de bshags shing /_bsdam par bya ba gang yin pa bsdams te/_rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong ma rnams dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong dang dgag dbye dang /_gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las dag nyams su myong bar byed 
[\[142a.5\]]do/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la bzod pa gsol du 'dong ngo snyam mo/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde rnams mnyan yod ga la ba der rgyu zhing song ste/_mthar 
[\[142a.6\]]gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /_dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bcu gnyis sde 'di rnams bskrad pa'i las bgyis na bdag cag gis 
[\[142a.7\]]ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_mi smra bar bya zhing lag brdas gtsug lag khang tha ma bstan par bya'o/_/de rnams kyis de bzhin du byas so/_/de nas de dag gi lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas de rnams kyang smra bar mi byed/_kun du smra bar mi byed/_kun du 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]dga' bar mi byed pa dang /_de rnams kyis lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/phu nu mo dag gang khyed kyis ma smras ma brjod ma bskyod pa las nged kyis smras/_brjod bskyod pa ci zhig yod kye dge slong ma'i gnas 
[\[142b.2\]]brtan gnas brtan rnams mi smra zhing kun du mi smra ba ni rung ste/_der zer na khyed ko ci'i phyir mi smra/_de rnams kyis dge slong ma dag bar du bzhag nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji skad zer ba de ni de lta yang yin na 'on kyang bdag cag gis ni bshags par bya ba 
[\[142b.3\]]gang yin pa de yang bshags/_bsdam par bya ba gang yin pa de yang bsdams nas bdag cag gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyi bar nyams su myong ngo /_/de nas dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde de dag gis dge slong ma rnams gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la 'di skad ces 
[\[142b.4\]]smras so/_/'di na dge slong ma kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dag yod de/_gang du ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong ma kha cig ni skrod par byed/_kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do/_/
[\[142b.5\]]de nas dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde la smras pa/_su la 'dun pas 'gro ba'o zhes gshe/_de dag gis smras pa/_dge slong ma gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la'o/_/skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras so/_/
[\[142b.6\]]dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma khyed kyis dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde la bzhams te/_dge slong ma khyed dge slong ma gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la 'di skad ces 'di na 
[\[142b.7\]]dge slong ma kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba yod de/_gang du ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong ma kha cig ni skrod par byed la/_kha cig ni skrod par mi byed de zhes ma zer 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong ma 'di dag ni 'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin gyi/_'on kyang dge slong ma khyed nyid khyim sun 'byin pa/_sdig pa'i chos 
[\[143a.2\]]kun du spyad pa yin te/_khyed kyis khyim sun phyung bar yang mthong ngam/_thos sam/_rab tu shes/_khyed sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod par yang mthong ngam/_thos sam/_rab tu shes kyis/_phu nu mo dag 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam 
[\[143a.3\]]nas 'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i bar gyi tshig gi lam de lta bu thong shig ces bya'o/_/de dag la bzhams te bsgo ba na gzhi de nyid la nan gyis zhes bya ba nas gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la 
[\[143a.4\]]smras so/_/dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma khyed kyis bcu gnyis sde la gsol ba dang /_bzhi'i las kyis sgo shig bsgo ba yang 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams pa 
[\[143a.5\]]byas nas dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya'o/_/'phags ma'i dge 'dun phu nu mo dag bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde 'di dag khyim sun 'byin pa/_sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa lags te/_'di dag gis khyim sun phyung bar 
[\[143a.6\]]yang mthong ngam/_thos sam/_rab tu shes/_'di dag sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod par yang rab tu shes pa'i bar du ste/_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis re lde ri la de dag bskrad pa'i las byas pa dang /_de dag dge slong ma rnams la 'dun 
[\[143a.7\]]pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba nas 'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gshe bar bgyid nas de dag la dge slong ma rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo ba dang /_de dag bzhams te bsgo ba na gzhi de nyid la nan gyis zhes bya ba nas gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba'i bar du 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]ste/_gal te 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde la gsol ba dang /_bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad de/_phu nu mo khyed 'di skad ces 'di na dge slong ma kha 
[\[143b.2\]]cig 'dun pas 'gro ba nas/_'jigs pa'i bar gyis 'gro ba yod do zhes ma zer cig_/'on kyang khyed nyid khyim sun 'byin pa/_sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa yin te zhes bya ba nas khyed sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa yang mthong ngam/_thos sam/_rab tu 
[\[143b.3\]]shes so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_phu nu mo dag 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam de lta bu thong shig ces bya ste/_'di ni gsol ba'o/_/
[\[143b.4\]]las kyang 'di ltar bya ste/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun phu nu mo dag bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde 'di dag khyim sun 'byin pa/_sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa lags te/_de dag gis khyim sun phyung bar yang mthong ngam/_thos sam/_rab tu 
[\[143b.5\]]shes nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis re lde ri la song ste/_bskrad pa'i las bgyis pa dang /_de dag dge slong ma rnams la 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba nas 'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyis gshe bar bgyid na de dag la dge slong ma 
[\[143b.6\]]rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo ba dang /_de dag bzhams te bsgo ba na gzhi de nyid la nan gyis zhes bya ba nas gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde la gsol ba dang /_bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba 
[\[143b.7\]]mdzad de/_phu nu mo khyed 'di skad ces 'di na dge slong ma kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba nas 'jigs pa'i bar gyis 'gro ba yod do zhes ma zer cig_/'on kyang khyed nyid khyim sun 'byin pa/_sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa yin te zhes bya ba nas/_khyed sdig pa'i chos 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]kun du spyod par yang mthong ngam/_thos sam/_rab tu shes kyis phu nu mo dge 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam 
[\[144a.2\]]de lta bu thong shig ces bya ba'i bar du ste/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun gang dag bcu gnyis sde 'di dag la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang 
[\[144a.3\]]po'o/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du yang don de nyid brjod par bya ste/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis bcu gnyis sde 'di dag la gsol ba dang /_bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi 
[\[144a.4\]]gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//_//dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bcu gcig pa/_de rnams la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis zhes bya ba nas/_gzhan ni gti mug go 
[\[144a.5\]]zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad do/_/dge slong ma rab tu 
[\[144a.6\]]mang po grong ngam grong rdal zhig tu nye bar rten cing gnas la de dag kyang khyim sun 'byin pa/_sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod par gyur cing /_de dag gis khyim sun phyung ba mthong ngam/_thos sam/_rab tu shes sam/_sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod par yang mthong 
[\[144a.7\]]ngam/_thos sam/_rab tu shes na dge slong ma de dag la dge slong ma rnams kyis 'di skad ces 'phags ma dag khyim sun 'byin pa/_sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa yin te/_khyed kyis khyim sun phyung bar mthong ngam/_thos sam/_rab tu shes/_khyed kyis sdig 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]pa'i chos kun du spyod par yang mthong ngam/_thos sam/_rab tu shes kyis/_'phags ma dag gnas 'di na gnas pas chog gis/_gnas 'di nas deng shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong ma de dag dge slong ma rnams la 'di skad ces 'di na dge 
[\[144b.2\]]slong ma kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dag yod de/_gang du ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong ma kha cig ni skrod par byed la/_kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes zer na dge slong 
[\[144b.3\]]ma de dag la dge slong ma rnams kyis tshig 'di skad ces kye 'phags ma dag khyed cag 'di skad ces 'di na dge slong ma kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba yod/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dag yod de/_gang du ltung 
[\[144b.4\]]ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong ma kha cig ni skrod par byed la/_kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes ma zer cig_/'on kyang phu nu mo dag kho na khyim sun 'byin pa/_sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa yin te/_khyed kyis khyim sun phyung bar mthong ngam/_thos sam/_
[\[144b.5\]]rab tu shes/_khyed sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod par mthong ngam/_thos sam/_rab tu shes kyis/_'phags ma dag 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam 'di lta 
[\[144b.6\]]bu 'di thong shig ces dge slong ma de dag la dge slong ma rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na/_gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na zhes bya ba nas/_lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya/_yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i 
[\[144b.7\]]bar du'o/_/gzhi de gtong bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo/_yang dag par bstan pa na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na chos 'di yang lan gsum gyi bar gyis nges par 'byung bar 'os pa'i dge 'dun lhag 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]ma'o/_/dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa dag gi'o/_/rab tu mang po zhes bya ba ni gnyis las lhag pa rab tu mang po dag go/_/grong ngam/_grong rdal zhig na zhes bya ba ni re lde ri la'o/_/de dag khyim sun 'byin ces bya ba la/_khyim 
[\[145a.2\]]zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_khyim bdag gi khyim dag go/_/sun 'byin pa zhes bya ba ni rgyu gnyis kyis khyim dag tu sun 'byin par rab tu shes te/_'grogs pa dang /_longs spyod pas so/_/ji ltar 'grogs pas she na/_bud med 
[\[145a.3\]]dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo rnams dang lhan cig dgod pa dang /_rtse ba dang /_lus kyis rtsab hral byed cing de nyid na gnas pa ste/_de ltar 'grogs pas so/_/ji ltar longs spyod pas she na/_khyim de dag nyid du me tog gam/_'bras bu'am/_so shing 
[\[145a.4\]]dag stobs par byed pa ste/_de ltar longs spyod pas so/_/mthong ngam zhes bya ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pas so/_/thos sam zhes bya ba ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas so/_/rab tu shes zhes bya ba ni de las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs 
[\[145a.5\]]dag gis so/_/dge slong ma de dag gis zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag gis so/_/dge slong ma rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams kyis so/_/'di skad ces bya ba ni 'di skad ces yang dag par bsgo ba na'o/_/dge slong ma dag 'di skad ces 'dun 
[\[145a.6\]]pas 'gro ba'o zhes ma smra shig ces bya ba ni gshe ba'o/_/ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las zhes bya ba ni ltung ba mtshungs pa las so/_/dge slong ma kha cig ni skrod par byed la zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/kha cig ni skrod par mi byed ces bya ba ni de dag nyid 
[\[145a.7\]]kyis lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag go/_/dge slong ma rnams kyis tshig 'di skad ces bya ba ni phu nu mo dag 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam dang zhes bya ba nas/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i bar gyi tshig gi lam 'or cig ces bya ba'o/_/
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]dge slong ma de dag la dge slong ma rnams kyis de skad ces bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni de lta na bzang ba'o/_/gal te mi gtong na bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni ji skad sngar bsgo ba bzhin bya ba'o/_/de dag la bzhams te bsgo ba na 
[\[145b.2\]]gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni ji skad sngar bsgo ba bzhin bya ba'o/_/yang dag par bsgo ba de ni de yin/_yang dag par bstan pa de ni de yin no/_/chos 'di yang zhes bya ba ni chos 
[\[145b.3\]]ma yin pa 'di chos kyi sgrar gsungs pa'o/_/lan gsum gyi bar gyis 'byung bar 'os pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa dang bcas pa'o/_/gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad dge slong ma la 'di skad ces 'di 
[\[145b.4\]]na dge slong ma kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba yod/_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba yod do zhes smra na thams cad du nyes byas kyi ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhams te bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na sbom por 
[\[145b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/gzhan ni gong ma ji lta ba de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong ma'i rnam par 'byed pa las dge 'dun lhag ma bcu dgu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kau shAm+bI'i gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i 
[\[145b.6\]]tshe kau shAm+bI na shAkya'i bu mo dge slong ma 'dun ma zhes bya ba la ltung ba byung nas/_de la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa/_don 'dod pa/_phan par 'dod pa/_bde bar 'dod pa/_reg par 'dod pa/_grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa rnams kyis smras pa/_'dun ma khyod la 
[\[145b.7\]]ltung ba byung gis shogs shig_/des de dag la 'di skad ces khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung kho mo la ci yang ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar khyed cag ni rigs sna tshogs dang /_rus sna tshogs dang /_rgyud sna tshogs las rab tu byung ba dag yin 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]te/_ji ltar ston ka'i dus na shing rnams kyi lo ma skya bo dag rlung gis bsdus nas gcig tu sogs shing 'jog pa de bzhin du khyed cag kyang rigs sna tshogs dang /_rus sna tshogs dang /_rgyud sna tshogs las rab tu byung ba dag yin gyi/_kho mo'i 
[\[146a.2\]]'phags pas ni byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas so zhes smras pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma dag khyed kyis dge 
[\[146a.3\]]slong ma 'dun ma la bzhams te bsgo bar bya ste/_'dun ma khyod la dge slong ma don 'dod pa/_phan par 'dod pa/_bde bar 'dod pa/_reg par 'dod pa/_grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa rnams kyis smras pa na/_bdag nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin par ma 
[\[146a.4\]]byed par bdag nyid brjod par gyis shig_/dge slong ma rnams kyang 'dun ma la chos dang mthun pa dang /_'dul ba dang mthun par smras/_khyod kyang dge slong ma rnams la chos dang mthun pa dang /_'dul ba dang mthun par smros shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di 
[\[146a.5\]]lta ste/_gcig la gcig rjod par byed pa dang /_gcig la gcig 'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang /_gcig gis gcig ltung ba las slong ba de lta bus/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i 
[\[146a.6\]]'khor 'phel bar 'gyur gyis/_'dun ma khyod bdag nyid rjod par byed pa ma yin pa'i las kyi mtha' thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/de la dge slong ma rnams kyis bsgo ba na gzhi de nyid ces bya ba nas gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skabs de dge slong ma rnams 
[\[146a.7\]]kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma dag khyed kyis dge slong ma 'dun ma la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o/_/bsgo ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]mal bshams pa byas la zhes bya ba nas/_dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/bya ba ni 'di lta bu yin te/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun phu nu mo dag bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma 'dun ma 'di la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 
[\[146b.2\]]pa don 'tshal ba/_phan par 'tshal ba/_bde bar 'tshal ba/_reg par 'tshal ba/_grub pa dang bde bar 'tshal ba rnams kyis ltung ba shogs shig ces smras na/_de 'di skad ces phu nu mo dag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung kho mo la ci yang ma smra shig_/kho 
[\[146b.3\]]mo yang khyed cag la dge yang rung sdig kyang rung ci yang mi smra'o zhes mchi nas/_de la dge slong ma rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na/_gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 
[\[146b.4\]]'dogs par bgyid na/_gal te 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge slong ma 'dun ma la 'dun ma khyod la dge slong ma rnams kyis chos dang mthun pa dang /_'dul ba dang 
[\[146b.5\]]mthun par smras pa na/_bdag nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin par ma byed par bdag nyid brjod par bya bar gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong ma rnams kyis khyod la chos dang mthun pa dang /_'dul ba dang mthun par smras pa na/_khyod kyis dge 
[\[146b.6\]]slong ma rnams la chos dang mthun pa dang /_'dul ba dang mthun par smra ba yin no/_/'di lta ste/_gcig la gcig rjod par byed pa dang /_gcig la gcig rjes su ston pa dang /_gcig gis gcig ltung ba las slong ba de lta bus bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[146b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i 'khor 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun phu nu mo dag bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma 'dun ma 'di la tshangs 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]pa mtshungs par spyod pa/_don 'tshal ba/_phan par 'tshal ba/_bde bar 'tshal ba/_reg par 'tshal ba/_grub pa dang bde bar 'tshal ba rnams kyis ltung ba shogs shig ces smras na/_de 'di skad ces phu nu mo dag dge yang rung sdig kyang 
[\[147a.2\]]rung kho mo la ci yang ma smra shig_/kho mo yang khyed cag la dge yang rung sdig kyang rung ci yang mi smra'o zhes mchi nas/_de la dge slong ma rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo ba na gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas/_'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni 
[\[147a.3\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid kyis/_de'i slad du 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma 'dun ma la 'dun ma khyod la dge slong ma rnams kyis chos dang mthun pa dang /_'dul ba dang mthun par smras pa na/_bdag nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin par ma 
[\[147a.4\]]byed par bdag nyid brjod par gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong ma rnams kyis khyod la chos dang mthun pa dang /_'dul ba dang mthun par smras pa na/_khyod kyis dge slong ma rnams la chos dang mthun pa dang /_'dul ba dang mthun par smra ba yin no/_/
[\[147a.5\]]'di lta ste/_gcig la gcig rjod par byed pa dang /_gcig la gcig rjes su ston pa dang /_gcig gis gcig ltung ba las slong ba de lta bus/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i 'khor 
[\[147a.6\]]'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad na/_dge slong ma gang dag dge slong ma 'dun ma 'di la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/
[\[147a.7\]]'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du don 'di nyid lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du bzlas so/_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma 'dun ma la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad lags te/_'di ltar 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o/_/de la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba na gzhi de nyid la nan gyis zhes bya ba nas/_'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skabs de dge 
[\[147b.2\]]slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_'di na dge slong ma kha cig bka' blo mi bde 
[\[147b.3\]]ba'i rang bzhin du gyur la/_de la gdon par gtogs pa bslab pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_bde bar gshegs pa'i mdor gtogs pa rnams dge slong ma rnams kyis chos dang mthun pa dang /_'dul ba dang mthun par smras pa na/_bdag nyid brjod par bya ba 
[\[147b.4\]]ma yin par byed de/_'phags ma dag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung kho mo la ci yang ma smra shig_/kho mo yang dge yang rung sdig kyang rung 'phags ma dag la ci yang mi smra'o/_/'phags ma dag gis bdag la tshig gi lam thong shig_/khyed la yang bdag gis 
[\[147b.5\]]smras pas ci zhig bya zhes zer ba na/_dge slong ma de la dge slong ma rnams kyis 'di skad ces 'phags ma khyod la gdon par gtogs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_bde bar gshegs pa'i mdor gtogs pa rnams dge slong ma rnams kyis chos dang mthun 
[\[147b.6\]]pa dang /_'dul ba dang mthun par smras pa na/_bdag nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin par ma byed par 'phags ma bdag nyid brjod par bya ba kho nar gyis shig_/'phags ma la dge slong ma rnams chos dang mthun pa dang /_'dul ba dang mthun par smra ba na/_'phags 
[\[147b.7\]]mas kyang dge slong ma rnams la chos dang mthun pa dang /_'dul ba dang mthun par smros shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gcig la gcig rjod par byed pa dang /_gcig la gcig 'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang /_gcig gis gcig ltung ba las 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]slong ba de lta bus/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i 'khor 'phel bar 'gyur gyis/_'phags ma khyod kyis bdag nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin par byed pa'i las kyi mtha' de lta bu 
[\[148a.2\]]thong shig ces gal te dge slong ma de la dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na chos 'di yang lan gsum gyi bar gyis 'byung bar 'os pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma'o/_/dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni 'dun ma'o/_/bka' 
[\[148a.3\]]blo mi bde ba zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lam mthun pa rjes su mnyan par bya ba 'tsham pa drung por 'jug pa mi 'dzin pa dang /_mi mthun par 'dzin pa'o/_/gdon pa zhes bya ba ni so sor thar pa'i mdor bstan pa'o/_/bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o/_/mdo 
[\[148a.4\]]zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'am/_nyan thos kyis smras pa ste/_bslab pa'i gzhi phas pham par 'gyur ba brgyad dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma nyi shu dang /_spang ba sum bcu rtsa gsum dang /_ltung byed brgya brgyad bcu dang /_so sor bshags par 
[\[148a.5\]]bya ba bcu gcig dang /_bslab pa mang po dang /_rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun dang /_'dul ba'i gzhi bcu bdun dang /_phran tshegs dang /_sil bu dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_'dul ba ma mo dang /_'dul ba gcig las 'phros pa dang /_'dul ba lnga pa dang /_'dul 
[\[148a.6\]]ba bcu drug pa dang /_bram ze'i bu mo dang /_nye ba 'khor gyis zhus par gtogs pa dag legs par sbyar ba'o/_/dge slong ma rnams kyis chos dang mthun pa dang /_'dul ba dang mthun pas zhes bya ba ni chos ji lta ba dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba dang /_ston pa'i bstan pa ji lta 
[\[148a.7\]]ba de lta bu'i las gang yin pas so/_/smras pa na zhes bya ba ni bde ba la sbyar ba na'o/_/bdag nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin par byed na zhes bya ba ni de'i gdams ngag dang /_bstan pa las bdag nyid gzhan du sel ba'o/_/phu nu mo dag_/kho mo la ci yang ma smra shig ces bya ba ni 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]bdag nyid phyir zhing lhag par bka' blo mi bde ba la 'jog pa'o/_/dge yang rung zhes bya ba ni mi dge ba la 'jog pa'o/_/sdig kyang rung zhes bya ba ni sdig pa las mi slong ba'o/_/kho mo yang phu nu mo rnams la ci yang mi smra'o zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid phyir zhing lhag par 
[\[148b.2\]]gcig la gcig 'doms shing rjes su ston pa spong ba'o/_/dge yang rung bdag kyang phu nu mo dag la zhes bya ba ni dge ba la mi 'jog pa'o/_/sdig kyang rung bdag kyang phu nu mo dag la zhes bya ba ni sdig pa las mi slong ba'o/_/'phags ma dag thong shig ces bya ba ni ring 
[\[148b.3\]]du 'or cig ces bya ba ste/_ci khyod cag ces bya ba ni rgyu 'di dag gis bdag gi rjes su ston par bskos sam zhes bya ba'o/_/dge slong ma de la zhes bya ba ni 'dun ma la'o/_/dge slong ma rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa dag gis so/_/gzhi de gtang bar bya ba'i 
[\[148b.4\]]phyir zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du'o/_/de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni de lta na bzang ba'o/_/gal te mi gtong na zhes bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo bas ji ltar snga ma bzhin du bsgo ba na'o/_/de la bzhams te bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/
[\[148b.5\]]de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni de lta na bzang ba'o/_/gal te mi gtong na zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bas ji ltar snga ma bzhin du bsgo ba na'o/_/yang dag par bsgo ba de ni de yin no/_/chos 'di yang zhes bya ba ni chos ma yin pa 'di chos kyi sgrar 
[\[148b.6\]]gsungs pa'o/_/lan gsum gyi bar gyis 'byung ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'os pa'o/_/dge 'dun lhag ma zhes bya ba ni ltung ba 'di dge 'dun sde gnyis la rag las pa yin/_dge 'dun sde gnyis la rton pa yin/_dge 'dun sde gnyis kyis de ltung ba 
[\[148b.7\]]las slong bar 'gyur gyis gang zag las ni ma yin pa'o/_/'di ltar phas pham par 'gyur ba brgyad po dag ni lhag ma med pa yin la 'di ni lhag ma dang bcas pa yin pas de bas na dge 'dun lhag ma zhes bya'o/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]ji tsam cung zad dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa na 'di skad ces phu nu mo dag kho mo la ci yang ma smra shig ces/_smra na thams cad du nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/bzhams te bsgo ba na gzhi de mi gtong na sbom po'o/_/las brjod pa dang po brjod pa na 
[\[149a.2\]]gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na sbom po'o/_/las brjod pa gnyis pa brjod pa na ma rdzogs par gal te gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na brjod pa rdzogs na sbom po'o/_/las brjod pa gsum pa brjod pa na ma rdzogs par chos 
[\[149a.3\]]ma yin pas mthun par byed pa dang /_chos kyis mi mthun par byed de/_chos ji lta ba dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba dang /_ston pa'i bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin mi byed na ltung ba med do/_/las brjod pa bzhi pa brjod pa na rdzogs nas chos ji lta ba dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba dang /_
[\[149a.4\]]ston pa'i bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'di skad ces 'phags ma dag bdag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ngo zhes brjod par bya'o/_/brjod na de lta na legs/_gal te ma rjod 
[\[149a.5\]]na des ltung ba bshags shing de so sor ma bshags par des de'i 'og tu gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang gsol ba dang bzhi'i las nyams su myong bar byed na thams cad du nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa la sogs pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/dge 'dun 
[\[149a.6\]]lhag ma nyi shu pa rdzogs te/_dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa las dge 'dun lhag ma rnams rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sdom la/_zhag bcu bcang dang 'bral mi bya/_/zla ba nye du min mi bslang /_/bla gos mthang gos bcas pa dang /_/pags pa gnyis 
[\[149a.7\]]dang pho nya bskur/_/mon dar sar pa gser dngul dang /_/sna tshogs nyo tshong byed pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe dge slong ma rnams la chos gos mang po 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_chos gos gzhan gyis ni mkhan mo dang /_slob dpon dag la blta ba'i phyir 'gro bar byed/_chos gos gzhan gyis ni gtsug lag khang du chag chag 'debs par byed/_phyag dar 'phyag par byed/_chos gos gzhan gyis ni ba'i lci ba sar pa'i 
[\[149b.2\]]byug pas skur par byed/_chos gos gzhan gyis ni bshang ba'i sa dang /_gci ba'i sa dag 'phyag par byed/_chos gos gzhan gyis ni so shing 'dor bar byed/_chos gos gzhan gyis ni gnas mal dang /_snod spyad 'brim par byed/_chos gos gzhan gyis ni grong 
[\[149b.3\]]du bsod snyoms la 'jug par byed/_chos gos gzhan gyis ni zas kyi gral du bkad par byed/_chos gos gzhan gyis ni nyin par chos nyan par byed/_chos gos gzhan gyis ni mtshan mo chos nyan par byed/_chos gos gzhan gyis ni ston pa'i spyan snga nas/_gdams ngag dang /_
[\[149b.4\]]rjes su bstan pa dag so sor nyams su myong bar byed pa na/_dge slong ma don nyung ba dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_
[\[149b.5\]]gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong ma'i dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de/_nga'i nyan thos ma rnams rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi yang legs par bcas par 'gyur ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed 
[\[149b.6\]]par mdzad pa ste/_mkhyen bzhin du rmed kyi mi mkhyen par ni ma yin/_dus su yin gyi dus ma yin par ma yin/_don dang ldan par yin gyi don dang mi ldan pa ni ma yin gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chu lon gyis zlog par mdzad pa yin pas/_'di lta ste/_don dang 
[\[149b.7\]]ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la rma ba rmed par mdzad de/_dge slong ma dag khyed cag la chos gos mang po 'di lta bu 'di byung ba bden nam/_bcom ldan 'das mad lags so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gso dka' ba dang /_
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]dgang dka' ba dang /_'dod pa che ba dang /_chog mi shes pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan can ma yin pa dang /_tshod mi shes pa'i rnam par smad pas rnam par smad pa mdzad nas/_dge slong ma rnams la gso sla ba dang /_dgang sla ba dang /_'dod 
[\[150a.2\]]pa chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_tshod shes pa'i bsngags pa gsungs te/_dge slong ma rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad de/_dge slong ma chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na zhag bcu'i bar du gos lhag pa rung bar ma byas 
[\[150a.3\]]pa bcang bar bya'o/_/de las lhag par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/chos gos zin pa zhes bya ba la chos gos zin la sra brkyang ma  phyung ba yang yod/_sra brkyang phyung la chos gos ma zin pa yang yod/_chos gos zin la sra brkyang phyung ba yang yod/_chos gos ma zin 
[\[150a.4\]]cing sra brkyang ma  phyung ba yang yod do/_/chos gos zin la sra brkyang ma  phyung ba ji lta bu zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dge slong mas chos gos dag bkru ba dang /_dra ba dang /_drub pa dang /_kha bsgyur zin la/_dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang ma  phyung ba yin te/_de lta bu ni chos gos 
[\[150a.5\]]zin la sra brkyang ma  phyung ba yin no/_/sra brkyang phyung la chos gos ma zin pa ji lta bu zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang phyung zin la/_dge slong mas chos gos dag bkru ba dang /_dra ba dang /_drub pa dang /_kha bsgyur ma zin pa ste/_de lta 
[\[150a.6\]]bu ni sra brkyang phyung la chos gos ma zin pa yin no/_/chos gos zin la sra brkyang phyung ba ji lta bu zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dge slong mas chos gos dag bkru ba dang /_dra ba dang /_drub pa dang /_kha bsgyur ba zin la/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis kyang sra brkyang phyung ba yin 
[\[150a.7\]]te/_de lta bu chos gos zin la sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/chos gos ma zin cing sra brkyang ma  phyung ba ji lta bu zhe na/_rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o/_/dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa dag gi'o/_/zhag bcu'i bar du zhes bya ba ni nyin zhag bcu'o/_/gos lhag pa 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlabs pa lnga las lhag pa'o/_/rung bar ma byas pa zhes bya ba ni gang zhig su'i ming gis kyang rung bar ma byas la bdag nyid kyi'o zhes bcangs pa'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya 
[\[150b.2\]]ba'o/_/ltung ba zhes bya ba ni dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro log par ltung ba rnams su ste/_de bas na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dge slong mas tshes 
[\[150b.3\]]la gos rnyed na dge slong ma des gos de zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_rung bar bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_rung bar mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_
[\[150b.4\]]gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/ji ltar tshes la gos rnyed la/_de bzhin du tshes gnyis dang /_gsum dang zhes bya ba nas bcu'i nang du zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_dge slong ma des gos de zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang 
[\[150b.5\]]du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_rung bar bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rung bar mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas tshes la gos gcig 
[\[150b.6\]]rnyed la/_phyi de nyin par gcig rnyed na dge slong ma des gos snga ma byin gyis brlab par bya zhing /_phyi ma shos rung bar bya ba'am/_byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/yang na gos phyi ma shos byin gyis brlab par bya zhing snga ma rung bar bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi 
[\[150b.7\]]byed dam/_rung bar mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed na/_nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du dge slong mas tshes dgu la gos shig rnyed la/_tshes bcu la gcig rnyed na dge slong ma des gos snga ma byin gyis brlab par bya 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]zhing /_phyi ma shos rung bar bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya'o zhes bya ba nas spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/dge slong mas tshes gcig la gos gnyis rnyed la/_tshes gnyis la yang gnyis rnyed na dge slong ma des gos snga ma gnyis byin 
[\[151a.2\]]gyis brlab par bya zhing /_gos phyi ma shos gnyis rung bar bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya'o/_/rung bar mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas tshes dgu la gos gnyis rnyed la/_tshes 
[\[151a.3\]]bcu la yang gnyis rnyed na zhes rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong mas tshes gcig la gos rab tu mang po rnyed la/_tshes gnyis la yang rab tu mang po rnyed na dge slong ma des snga ma'i gos rab tu mang po dag byin gyis brlab par bya zhing /_phyi ma shos kyi gos rab tu 
[\[151a.4\]]mang po dag rung bar bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya'o/_/yang na phyi ma shos kyi gos rab tu mang po dag byin gyis brlab par bya zhing /_snga ma'i gos rab tu mang po dag rung bar bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_rung bar mi byed dam/_gtong 
[\[151a.5\]]bar mi byed na/_nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas tshes dgu la gos rab tu mang po rnyed la/_tshes bcu la yang gos rab tu mang po rnyed na zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/dge slong ma'i 
[\[151a.6\]]gos spang bar gyur na de ma spangs shing bral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gos gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i shan gyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma'i gos spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar ma byas la/_ltung ba ma bshags par 
[\[151a.7\]]gos gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i shan gyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma'i gos spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gos gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i shan gyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma'i gos 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba bshags nas gos gzhan zhig rnyed na ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor bas nyen pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/dge slong ma'i rnam par 
[\[151b.2\]]'byed pa las/_spang ba'i ltung byed dang po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/dge slong ma dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa dbyar mthar phyin par gnas pa 'ga' zhig gis chos gos dag rnyed par gyur nas/_des de dag bkrus shing kha bsgyur te/_
[\[151b.3\]]gtur bu bkang nas bam por bsgres te/_bla gos dang /_mthang gos dang bcas pas ljongs rgyu zhing song nas/_de ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na ma sbas shing sbed du ma bcug par gyur to/_/dge slong ma gnas na gnyug mar gnas pa dag kyang chos gos de dag 
[\[151b.4\]]skems pa dang /_sprug pas bya ba mang ba dang /_byed pa mang bar gyur cing /_lung mnod pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la byed pa dang /_nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtong bar byed pa nas dge slong ma don nyung ba dag smod 
[\[151b.5\]]par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_dge slong ma chos gos 
[\[151b.6\]]zin pas sra brkyang phyung nas chos gos lnga las gang yang rung ba zhig dang /_mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/zhes de ltar bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab tu gnas 
[\[151b.7\]]brtan chen po 'od srung la brten nas snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin nas/_yang bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de'i tshe dge slong ma gnas brtan gnas brtan dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag gis bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ji ltar gdon par bgyi/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la bslab 
[\[152a.2\]]pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa gsungs nas dge slong ma rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma dag snga ma ni bcas pa'o/_/'di ni gnang ba yin pas nga'i nyan thos ma rnams kyis yang 'dul ba 
[\[152a.3\]]la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong ma chos gos zin te sra brkyang phyung nas chos gos lnga las gang yang rung ba zhig dang nub gcig mtshams kyi phyi rol du bral na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/chos gos zin pa 
[\[152a.4\]]zhes bya ba ni gong ma ji lta ba bzhin no/_/chos gos lnga zhes bya ba ni snam sbyar dang /_bla gos la sogs pa chos gos byin gyis brlabs pa gang yang rung ba dag go/_/mtshams kyi phyi rol du bral na zhes bya ba ni skya rengs 'char bar byed na'o/_/dge 'dun gyis 
[\[152a.5\]]gnang ba ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyis gnang ba bzhag ste'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na//_//ltung ba'i bar sdom la/_khyim gcig pa dang khyim gnyis dang /_/tshogs dang sa bar 
[\[152a.6\]]rtsig pa dang /_/'obs kyi nyen kor dag dang ni/_/khyim dang tshong khang tshong rdal dang /_/yang thog kun rgyu g.yul dang ni/_/g.yul tshogs mu stegs shing rta dang /_/gru dang kun dga' ra ba dang /_/ljon shing dang ni zhus pa'o/_/khyim gcig pa'i grong 
[\[152a.7\]]ni gang /_khyim gnyis pa'i grong ni gang /_khyim gyi tshogs ni gang /_rib mas bskor ba'i grong ni gang /_rtsig pas bskor ba'i grong ni gang /_de bzhin du 'obs kyis bskor ba'i grong dang /_grong nyen kor gcig pa dang /_grong nyen kor tha dad pa 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]dang /_grong rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_grong rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_khyim nyen kor gcig pa ni gang /_khyim nyen kor tha dad pa ni gang /_khyim rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_khyim rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad 
[\[152b.2\]]pa dang /_de bzhin du tshong khang nyen kor gcig pa dang /_nyen kor tha dad pa yang yod/_rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_de bzhin du tshong rdal nyen kor gcig pa dang /_tshong rdal nyen kor tha dad pa yang yod/_tshong 
[\[152b.3\]]rdal rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_de bzhin du yang thog nyen kor gcig pa dang /_yang thog nyen kor tha dad pa yang yod/_yang thog rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_
[\[152b.4\]]de bzhin du g.yul nyen kor gcig pa dang /_nyen kor tha dad pa yang yod/_g.yul rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_de bzhin du g.yul tshoms nyen kor gcig pa dang /_g.yul tshoms nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_
[\[152b.5\]]g.yul tshoms rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa yang yod/_rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_de bzhin du mu stegs can gyi khyim nyen kor gcig pa dang /_nyen kor tha dad pa yang yod/_rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_rab tu mang po nyen kor tha 
[\[152b.6\]]dad pa dang /_de bzhin du kun du rgyu'i khyim nyen kor gcig pa dang /_nyen kor tha dad pa yang yod/_rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_de bzhin du shing rta nyen kor gcig pa dang /_nyen kor tha dad pa yang yod/_rab 
[\[152b.7\]]tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_de bzhin du gru nyen kor gcig pa dang /_nyen kor tha dad pa yang yod/_rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_de bzhin du kun dga' ra ba nyen kor 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]gcig pa dang /_nyen kor tha dad pa yang yod/_rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_de bzhin du ljon shing nyen kor gcig pa dang /_nyen kor tha dad pa yang yod/_rab tu mang po nyen kor 
[\[153a.2\]]gcig pa dang /_rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa ste/_ltung ba de yi bstan pa ni 'di yin no/_/da ni bshad par smra bar bya ste/_de la khyim gcig pa'i grong gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bod dang /_ri khrod pa dang /_kla klo bzo la 
[\[153a.3\]]rag las pa rnams kyi grong gang yin pa ste/_grong 'di ni khyim gcig pa yin no/_/khyim gcig pa ji lta bar khyim gnyis pa'ang de bzhin no/_/khyim gyi tshogs kyi grong gang zhe na/_mi'i gtso bo sna tshogs gnas par gyur pa'i grong gang yin pa ste/_
[\[153a.4\]]'di ni khyim gyi tshogs kyi grong zhes bya'o/_/sab ras bskor ba'i grong gang zhe na/_sab ras bskor ba'i grong gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam gang du skas gdang bu bcu gnyis pas khyab cing 'dug pa'am/_
[\[153a.5\]]yul ma ga d+hA'i shing rta smyig mas bkang bar gyur pa'o/_/dge slong mas nang du chos gos dag bzhag nas nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam 
[\[153a.6\]]phyi rol du chos gos dag bzhag ste/_gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed cing skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/rtsig pas bskor ba gang zhe na/_ra bas bskor ba'i grong gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang 
[\[153a.7\]]ngam/_gang du rdung bar byed pa dang /_rngo bar byed pa dang /_za bar byed pa dang /_khye'u sus byed pa'am/_gang du mi rang bzhin gyis ngo tsha dang ldan pa bshang bar 'gro ba'am/_bya gag 'phur stabs kyis mchod pa ste/_de'i nyen kor ni de yin no/_/dge slong 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]mas nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/_nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/_nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste/_gzhan du skya rengs 'char 
[\[153b.2\]]bar byed cing /_skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/'obs kyis bskor ba'i grong gang zhe na/_'obs kyis bskor ba'i grong gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang zhes bya ba nas/_khye'u sus byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar ram gang du ba lang dang /_
[\[153b.3\]]lug dag 'gro ba'i rdul langs pa rlung gis ma bskyod pa'am/_phyag dar bor ba'i bong ba 'dril bas slebs pa yin te/_dge slong mas nang du chos gos dag ces bya ba nas/_spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/grong nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_grong 
[\[153b.4\]]gang na skyed mos tshal lam/_'dun sa'am/_lha'i gnas gcig yod pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang zhes bya ba nas/_khye'u sus byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/dge slong mas nang du chos gos dag ces bya ba 
[\[153b.5\]]nas/_spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/grong nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_grong gang na skyed mos tshal lam/_'dun sa'am/_lha'i gnas mang po yod pa'o/_/de rnams kyi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so ba'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin 
[\[153b.6\]]zhe na sgo'o/_/gal te dge slong mas nang ngam/_phyi rol du chos gos dag bzhag la skya rengs 'char na dge slong ma nyen kor dang bral bas sgor 'dug nas skya rengs 'char bar bya'o/_/gal te gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/grong 
[\[153b.7\]]rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_grong rab tu mang po dag la skyed mos tshal lam/_'dun sa'am/_lha'i gnas gcig yod pa'o/_/de rnams kyi nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang zhes bya ba nas gzhan du 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/grong rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_de rnams kyi skyed mos tshal mang po yod pa'o/_/de rnams kyi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so ba'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe 
[\[154a.2\]]na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/khyim nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba'i khyim gang yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngo zhes bya ba nas gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed 
[\[154a.3\]]na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/khyim rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi khyim gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngo zhes 
[\[154a.4\]]bya ba nas gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/khyim rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba'i khyim gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so ba'o/_/
[\[154a.5\]]ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/tshong khang nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi tshong khang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du 'bru 
[\[154a.6\]]spung bar byed pa dang /_gle ba dang /_bre'u cung 'jog par byed pa dang /_'jal bar byed pa'i snod dag 'jog par byed pa ste/_de'i nyen kor ni de yin no/_/dge slong mas nang du chos gos dag ces bya ba nas/_gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i 
[\[154a.7\]]ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/tshong khang nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_mi tha dad pa'i'am/_spun sgo bye ba'i tshong khang gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so ba'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_zong gi mdzod do/_/tshong khang 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba'i tshong khang gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang zhes bya ba nas spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/
[\[154b.2\]]tshong khang rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_mi tha dad pa'i'am/_spun sgo bye ba'i tshong khang gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so ba'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/tshong rdal nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe 
[\[154b.3\]]na/_mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi tshong rdal gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag gi spang leb dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_dri dag 'thag par byed pa dang /_thum 
[\[154b.4\]]bu dag 'ching bar byed pa dang /_'dra bar byed pa dang zhes bya ba nas khye'u sus byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/dge slong mas nyen kor du chos gos dag ces bya ba nas spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/tshong rdal nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_mi tha 
[\[154b.5\]]dad pa'i'am/_spun sgo bye ba'i tshong rdal gang dag yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so ba'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_'dug stegs so/_/tshong rdal rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag 
[\[154b.6\]]gi tshong rdal gang yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang zhes bya ba nas spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/tshong rdal rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_mi tha dad pa'i'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi tshong 
[\[154b.7\]]rdal gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so ba'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/yang thog nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi yang thog go/_/de'i nyen kor 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngo /_/gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no/_/yang thog nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi tha dad pa'i'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi yang thog go/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_
[\[155a.2\]]so so ba'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_skas so/_/yang thog rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi yang thog go/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so ba'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin 
[\[155a.3\]]zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/kun du rgyu'i khyim gyi nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi kun du rgyu'i khyim mo/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gnas gang 
[\[155a.4\]]du de dag gi smyig ma gsheg par byed pa dang /_gle ba byed pa dang /_gdugs kyi sgo dag ces bya ba nas/_skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/kun du rgyu'i khyim nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_mi tha dad pa'i'am/_spun sgo bye 
[\[155a.5\]]ba dag gi kun du rgyu'i khyim gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so ba'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_rgyal mtshan gyi shing ngo /_/kun du rgyu rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi kun du rgyu'i 
[\[155a.6\]]khyim rab tu mang po gang yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gnas gang du smyig ma dag gshag par byed pa dang /_zhes bya ba nas spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/kun du rgyu rab tu mang 
[\[155a.7\]]po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_mi tha dad pa'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi kun du rgyu rab tu mang po'i khyim gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so ba'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/g.yul nyen kor gcig pa 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]gang zhe na/_mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi g.yul gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gnas gang du sog ma dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_bre ba dang /_phyags ma dang /_gzhal 
[\[155b.2\]]snod dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_'phyar bar byed pa dang /_'bru dag phyar ba na phub ma rags pa dag gang du rlung gis ma bdas par phyin pa ste/_de'i nyen kor ni de yin no/_/dge slong mas nyen kor du chos gos dag ces bya ba nas gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no/_/
[\[155b.3\]]g.yul nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_mi tha dad pa'i'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi g.yul gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba nas ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_g.yul gyi dbus so/_/g.yul rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo 
[\[155b.4\]]ma bye ba dag gi g.yul gang yin pa'o/_/gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no/_/g.yul rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_g.yul gang zhig mi tha dad pa'i'am zhes bya ba nas ci zhig thun mong zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/g.yul tshogs 
[\[155b.5\]]nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi g.yul tshogs gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du glang dag 'dogs par byed pa dang /_lci ba dag 'dor bar 
[\[155b.6\]]byed pa'o/_/gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no/_/g.yul tshogs nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_mi tha dad pa'i'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi g.yul tshogs gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na zhes bya ba nas/_ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_sgo zhes bya ba'i 
[\[155b.7\]]bar ro/_/g.yul tshogs rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_g.yul gang zhig mi gcig gi'am/_zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin no/_/g.yul rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_g.yul tshogs gang zhig mi tha dad pa'i'am zhes bya 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]ba nas/_ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/mu stegs can gyi khyim nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_mu stegs can lta ba gcig pa/_bzod pa gcig pa/_'dod pa gcig pa/_bsam pa gcig pa 
[\[156a.2\]]dag gi gang yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_gnas gang du de dag me'i sbyin sreg sreg par byed pa dang /_rtswa dang /_lci ba dang /_yam sreg shing dang /_blugs gzar dag 'jog pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_
[\[156a.3\]]phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du gcod par byed pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/mu stegs can gyi khyim nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_mu stegs can lta ba sna tshogs dang zhes bya ba nas/_bsam pa sna tshogs gang 
[\[156a.4\]]yin pa'o/_/zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so ba'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_lha'i gnas so/_/mu stegs can gyi khyim rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_dang po pa ji lta ba de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[156a.5\]]mu stegs can gyi khyim rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_mu stegs can gyi khyim gang dag mi tha dad pa'i'am zhes bya ba nas ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/shing rta nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shing 
[\[156a.6\]]rta mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_'gro ba'am/_'dug kyang rung nyen kor 'dom gang ngam/_gnas gang du glang 'dogs par byed pa dang /_rtswa mun dza dag rdung bar byed pa dang /_thag gu dag 'khal bar 
[\[156a.7\]]byed pa'am/_yang na gang du gcod par byed pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/shing rta nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_mi tha dad pa'i'am/_spun sgo bye ba'i shing rta gang yin pa zhes bya ba nas/_ci zhig thun mong yin 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]zhe na/_kha lo sgyur ba'i stan no zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/shing rta rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_dang po pa ji lta ba de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/shing rta rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_shing rta gang dag mi tha dad pa'i'am zhes bya ba 
[\[156b.2\]]nas/_ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ro//_//dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bcu gnyis pa/_gru nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi gru gang yin 
[\[156b.3\]]pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_'gro ba'i nyen kor 'dom gang ngam/_gnas gang du phur pa 'debs par byed pa dang /_gru rtod par byed pa/_rtswa mun dza dag rdung bar byed pa dang /_thag pa dag 'khal bar byed pa dang /_ru skya dag 'jog par byed 
[\[156b.4\]]pa'am/_gang du gcod par byed pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_khye'u sus byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/dge slong mas nang du chos gos dag ces bya ba nas spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/gru nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_gru gang dag mi tha dad 
[\[156b.5\]]pa'i'am zhes bya ba nas/_ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_gru gdang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/gru rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_dang po pa ji lta ba de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/gru rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_gru gang dag mi 
[\[156b.6\]]tha dad pa'i'am zhes bya ba nas/_ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/kun dga' ra ba nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi kun dga' ra ba gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_
[\[156b.7\]]gnas gang du lo ma sngon mo dag 'khru bar byed pa dang /_thum bu dag 'phur bar byed pa dang /_me tog dag rgyud par byed pa dang /_zhes bya ba nas khye'u sus dag byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/dge slong mas nang du chos gos dag ces bya ba nas/_skya rengs 'char 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/kun dga' ra ba nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_kun dga' ra ba gang mi tha dad pa'i 'am zhes bya ba nas/_ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_khron pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/kun dga' ra ba rab tu 
[\[157a.2\]]mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_kun dga' ra ba gang dag mi gcig gi'am zhes bya ba nas dang po pa ji lta ba de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/kun dga' ra ba mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_kun dga' ra ba mang po gang dag mi tha dad pa'i'am zhes bya 
[\[157a.3\]]ba nas/_ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/shing ljon pa'i nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shing ljon pa'i yal ga'i lo 'dab 'byor pas gcig tu stug pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams 
[\[157a.4\]]cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_so ga rnams kyi zla ba tha ma la bab pa'i nyi ma phyed kyi grib mas khyab cing 'dug pa'am/_lo ma skya bo dag rlung gis ma bdas par lhung ba'am/_char bab pa na chu'i thigs pa dag 'bab pa ste de'i nyen kor ni de yin no/_/dge 
[\[157a.5\]]slong mas nang du zhes bya ba nas spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/shing ljon pa nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shing ljon pa yal ga'i lo ma 'dab ma 'byor pa'am zhes bya ba nas/_thun mong ci zhig yin zhe na/_shing drung ngo zhes bya ba'i 
[\[157a.6\]]bar ro/_/shing ljon pa rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shing ljon pa rab tu mang po yal ga'i lo ma 'dab ma 'byor pa grib ma tha dad pa zhes bya ba nas/_ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/
[\[157a.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong ma shul du zhugs pa'i nyen kor gang lags/_'gro ba na 'dom gang /_'greng ba na 'dom gang /_'dug pa na 'dom gang /_khor khor yug yin no/_/
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]btsun pa gal te dge slong ma dag shul du zhugs nas lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag la chos gos dag gtad de de slad bzhin mchis na de dag gi nyen kor gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas ji skad bram ze gro bzhin skyes 
[\[157b.2\]]kyi rigs la bar 'dom bdun bdun gyis bcad de a mra bskyed na/_shin tu me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /_yal ga phun sum tshogs par 'gyur bar gsungs pa'i a mra gang dag yin pa de dag gi bar ni 'dom bzhi bcu 
[\[157b.3\]]rtsa dgur 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig gtsug lag khang gnyis kyi mtshams su mchis nyal bar bgyid na mtshams gang lags/_ji tsam chos gos kyi grwa lus dang ma bral ba de srid du chos gos dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe de'i chos gos kyi grwa lus 
[\[157b.4\]]dang bral ba de'i tshe chos gos dang bral bar 'gyur te/_dge slong ma'i chos gos spangs par gyur te de ma spangs par zhes bya ba nas/_dang po ji lta ba de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i 
[\[157b.5\]]tshe dge slong ma rnams la gos kyi rnyed pa mang po 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_gang su yang rung bas gos sngon po zhig rnyed nas des de byed du mi 'jug par gang gi tshe 'di 'dra ba'i gos bdag gis rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gis langs par byas la bcang bar bya'o/_/snyam du 
[\[157b.6\]]re ba yod cing des de 'jog par byed do/_/sngon po la ji lta ba de bzhin du ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_stug po dang /_srab mo la yang brjod par bya'o/_/skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[157b.7\]]gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_zhes bya ba nas bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_dge slong ma chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na dus ma yin par gos shig rnyed la 'dod na dge slong ma des gos de blang bar bya'o/_/blangs nas 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]gal te langs na myur ba kho nar byas te bcang bar bya'o/_/gal te chos gos la re ba yod pa'am/_kha ma langs pa kha skong bar byed na dge slong ma des gos de zla ba gcig gi mtha'i bar du bcang bar bya'o/_/de las 'das par 'jog na spang ba'i 
[\[158a.2\]]ltung byed do/_/dge slong ma chos gos zin pas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/_/rnyed la zhes bya ba ni gzhan las so/_/dus ma yin pa'i gos zhes bya ba la/_gos kyi dus ni gang yin/_dus ma yin pa'i gos ni gang yin zhe na/_sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas na ni 
[\[158a.3\]]ston zla 'bring po'i nya nas bzung ste/_dpyid zla ra ba nya'i bar gyi zla ba lnga po de dag ni gos kyi dus yin no/_/lhag ma zla ba bdun po dag ni dus ma yin no/_/gos bdun po gang yang rung ba zhes bya ba la/_bdun po de dag gang zhe na/_bal gyi dang /_ras dang /_ras 
[\[158a.4\]]bal gyi dang /_mon dar dang /_du gu la'i ras dang /_ko tam pa'i ras dang /_nyi 'og gi gos so/_/'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o/_/blangs nas gal te langs na myur ba na kho nar byas te bcang bar bya'o/_/gal te mi langs na zhes bya ba ni 
[\[158a.5\]]lnga po gang yang rung ba'o/_/dge slong ma des gos de zla ba gcig gi mthar bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni nyin zhag sum bcu'i mthar ro/_/gos de'i re ba zhes bya ba la gos kyi re ba gang zhe na/_bdag la mas sbyin par 'gyur ba'am/_bdag la phas sbyin par 'gyur 
[\[158a.6\]]ba'am/_bdag la ming po dang phu nu mos sbyin par 'gyur ba'am/_lo lnga'i dus ston chen po'i tshe 'thob pa'o/_/kha ma langs pa kha skong bar byed na zhes bya ba ni gos de'i kha skong bar byed na'o/_/de las 'das par zhes bya ba ni de las thal bar ro/_/
[\[158a.7\]]'jog na zhes bya ba ni 'chang na'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas zhes bya ba nas/_ngan 'gro log par ltung ba rnams so zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na//_//ltung ba'i bar sdom la/_re bcas re ba 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]med pa dang /_/nyams par gyur la gsum dag dang /_/ma grub pa la rgyun chad dang /_/gos ni gnyis po nyid dag dang /_/de nas gos ni lnga dag dang /_/phyag dar khrod la gnyis dang yang /_/snam phran tshad dang glan pa dang /_/rngul gzan mthang gos nyid 
[\[158b.2\]]dang yang /_/'khor gsum khebs pa dag dang ni/_/khor yug phyi mar byas pa yin/_/dge slong mas tshes la gos sngon po zhig rnyed nas/_des de byed du mi 'jug par gang gi tshe bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i gos rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe bya'o/_/snyam du gos kyi 
[\[158b.3\]]re ba yod pas des de 'jog par byed cing de gos kyi re ba yod pa las des tshes de nyid kyi nyin par re ba yod pa rnyed na dge slong ma des gos de nyi ma bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya ba'am/_rung bar bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi 
[\[158b.4\]]byed dam/_rung bar mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas tshes nyid la gos ma rnyed dam/_tshes gnyis la yang ma rnyed mod kyi tshes dgu la re ba dang bcas pa zhig rnyed na dge slong ma des nyi ma 
[\[158b.5\]]bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_rung bar bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_rung bar mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/gzhan yang dge 
[\[158b.6\]]slong mas tshes nyid la gos ma rnyed cing /_tshes gnyis la yang ma rnyed de/_'on kyang zhag nyi shu rtsa dgu'i nyin par re ba dang bcas pa zhig rnyed na dge slong ma des gos de nyi ma sum bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_rung bar bya ba'am/_gtang 
[\[158b.7\]]bar bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_rung bar mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed na nyi ma sum bcu pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/sngon po la ji lta ba de bzhin du ser po dang /_stug po dang /_srab mo yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong mas 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]tshes la gos sngon po zhig rnyed la des de byed du mi 'jug par gang gi tshe bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i gos rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe bya'o snyam du gos kyi re ba yod pas des de 'jog par byed cing /_des tshes de nyid la re ba med pa gzhan zhig rnyed na dge 
[\[159a.2\]]slong ma des gos de nyi ma bcu po de nyid kyi nang du zhes bya ba nas/_spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/dge slong mas tshes nyid la yang ma yin/_tshes gnyis la yang ma yin zhes bya ba nas tshes dgu dang bcu'i nang du yang ma yin na zhes bya ba nas/_spang 
[\[159a.3\]]ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/gzhan yang dge slong mas tshes nyid la yang ma yin zhes bya ba nas/_tshes nyi shu dgu'i nyin par re ba med pa zhig rnyed na zhes bya ba nas spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/sngon po la ji lta ba bzhin du srab mo'i bar 
[\[159a.4\]]la yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong mas tshes la gos sngon po zhig rnyed la/_des de byed du mi 'jug par gang gi tshe bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i gos rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe bya'o snyam du gos kyi re ba yod pa las/_de'i gos kyi re ba de nyams par gyur/_'gyangs par 
[\[159a.5\]]gyur/_shas chung bar gyur la/_des tshes de nyid la re ba med pa'i gos gzhan rnyed na zhes bya ba nas/_de bzhin du tshes dgu la yang zhes bya ba nas/_spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/gzhan yang dge slong mas tshes la gos gzhan zhig rnyed 
[\[159a.6\]]na zhes bya ba nas/_tshes nyi shu dgu'i nyin par zhes bya ba nas spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/sngon po la ji lta ba bzhin du srab mo'i bar la yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong mas tshes la gos sngon po zhig rnyed la/_des de byed du mi 'jug par gang gi 
[\[159a.7\]]tshe bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i gos rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe bya'o/_/snyam du gos kyi re ba yod cing des de 'jog par byed pa na/_de'i gos kyi re ba yod pa de grub par ma gyur/_rgyun chad par ma gyur par des tshes de nyid la re ba med pa'i gos gzhan rnyed na zhes bya ba 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]dang /_de bzhin du tshes la ma yin zhes bya ba nas tshes dgu'i bar dang /_tshes nyi shu dgu'i nyin mo zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/sngon po la ji lta ba bzhin du srab mo'i bar la yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong mas tshes la gos sngon po zhig rnyed la/_
[\[159b.2\]]des de byed du mi 'jug par gang gi tshe bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i gos rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe bya'o snyam du gos kyi re ba yod pa las de'i gos kyi re ba de thams cad kyi thams cad du rgyun chad par gyur pa dang /_des tshes de nyid la re ba med pa'i gos gzhan zhig rnyed na zhes 
[\[159b.3\]]bya ba dang /_de bzhin du tshes la yang ma yin zhes bya ba nas/_tshes dgu'i bar dang /_de bzhin du tshes nyi shu dgu'i nyi ma la re ba med pa'i zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/sngon po la ji lta ba de bzhin du srab mo'i bar la yang de bzhin no/_/gos 
[\[159b.4\]]ni gnyis te/_sar pa dang /_dus tshigs su spyad pa'o/_/de la sar pa ni tha ga pas gsar du btags pa'o/_/dus tshigs pa ni dus tshigs gsum po gang yang rung ba'i dus tshigs su spyad par gyur pa'o/_/gos lnga po dag la lnga gang zhe na/_gos bdag 
[\[159b.5\]]po yod pa dang /_bdag po med pa dang /_bor ba blangs pa dang /_dur khrod pa dang /_lnga pa ni phyag dar khrod pa'o/_/de la gos bdag po yod pa ni skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_ma ning sbyin pa por btags pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag po med pa ni ma 
[\[159b.6\]]ning gi bar du sbyin pa po med pa gang yin pa'am/_yang na lam kar lhung ba rnyed pa'o/_/bor ba blangs pa ni shi ba'i nye dus gos kyi gdugs dag bsgreng ste dur khrod du bskyal nas/_de nas blangs pa dag dge slong ma rnams la 'bul bar byed pa ste/_'di ni 
[\[159b.7\]]bor ba blangs pa'i gos zhes bya'o/_/dur khrod pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i dur khrod nas blangs pa gang yin pa'o/_/lnga pa nyid ni phyag dar khrod pa'o/_/gzhan yang phyag dar khrod pa ni lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_phyag dar khrod pa lam po che pa dang /_
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]chu 'gram pa dang /_dgon par bor ba dang /_ral rul dang /_lnga pa nyid ni phyag dar khrod pa'o/_/gzhan yang phyag dar khrod pa ni lnga ste/_be'u yis zos pa dang /_sril gyis zos pa dang /_byi bas zos pa dang /_mes tshig pa 
[\[160a.2\]]dang /_lnga pa nyid ni sa la lhung ba'i gos so/_/dge slong mas gos sar pa rnyed la gal te nus na des gos de las snam sbyar ni nyi rim du bya/_gding ba yang nyi rim du bya/_bla gos ni chig rkyang du bya/_mthang gos kyang chig rkyang du bya'o/_/de bzhin du rngul gzan 
[\[160a.3\]]dang /_shing dpung chad kyang chig rkyang du bya'o/_/dge slong mas sar pa la snam sbyar nyi rim la rim pa gsum pa glon par byed na de glon par byed pa na nyes byas so/_/zhag bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas sar pa la snam sbyar nyi rim byas pa las 
[\[160a.4\]]gzhan du glan no snyam nas rim pa gcig 'bogs par byed na de 'bogs par byed pa na nyes byas so/_/zhag bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/gal te 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/_bkogs la bkrus shing kha bsgyur te/_'di nyid la glan no 
[\[160a.5\]]snyam pas de 'bogs par byed na ltung ba med do/_/zhag bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du gding ba la yang brjod par bya'o/_/bla gos chig rkyang la rim pa glon par byed na de glon pa la nyes byas la/_zhag bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung 
[\[160a.6\]]byed do/_/bla gos la ji lta ba bzhin du mthang gos la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/chos gos lnga'i bar du yang brjod par bya ste/_thams cad la spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong mas dus tshigs su bcas pa'i gos zhig rnyed 
[\[160a.7\]]la/_gal te nus na des de las snam sbyang ni bzhi rim du bya'o/_/gding ba dang /_bla gos dang /_mthang gos ni nyi rim du bya'o/_/rngul gzan dang /_shing dpung chad kyang de bzhin no/_/dge slong mas snam sbyar bzhi rim la rim pa lnga pa glon par byed na de 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]glon par byed pa na nyes byas la/_zhag bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/'bogs par byed na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma ji lta ba bzhin no/_/de bzhin du gding ba la yang brjod par bya'o/_/bla gos dang mthang gos kyang de bzhin no/_/rngul gzan dang /_shing 
[\[160b.2\]]dpung chad la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/rim pa gnyis pa la zhes bya ba nas/_'bogs shing rim pa gsum pa glon par byed na de glon par byed pa na nyes byas la/_zhag bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/phog la gzhan du glan no 
[\[160b.3\]]snyam pa nas de glon par byed na nyes byas la/_zhag bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/bkogs la bkrus shing kha bsgyur te zhes bya ba nas/_'di nyid la glan par bya'o snyam na ltung ba med la/_zhag bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes 
[\[160b.4\]]bya ba'i bar ro/_/phyag dar khrod pa'i tshem bu rnams la ni ji tsam 'dod par glan par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa snam sbyar dag gi snam phran du lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[160b.5\]]stsal pa/_nye ba 'khor dgu ste/_dgu gang zhe na/_dgu pa dang /_bcu gcig pa dang /_bcu gsum pa dang /[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa dang /_bcu bdun pa dang /_bcu dgu pa dang /_nyi shu rtsa gcig pa dang /_nyi shu rtsa gsum pa dang /_nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o/_/
[\[160b.6\]]nye ba 'khor snam phran can dgu po 'di dag ni snam sbyar zhes bya'o/_/nye ba 'khor de la dgu pa gang yin pa dang /_bcu gcig pa gang yin pa dang /_bcu gsum pa gang yin pa de dag ni glegs bu phyed dang gsum par byas te bcang bar bya'o/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa gang yin 
[\[160b.7\]]pa dang /_bcu bdun pa gang yin pa dang /_bcu dgu pa gang yin pa de dag ni glegs bu phyed dang bzhi par bya ste bcang bar bya'o/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig pa gang yin pa dang /_nyi shu rtsa gsum pa gang yin pa dang /_nyi shu rtsa lnga pa gang yin pa de dag ni glegs bu phyed 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]dang lnga par byas te bcang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du glan par bya'o/_/de yan chad ni tshem bu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das chos gos kyi tshad ji tsam lags/_nye ba 'khor gsum ste/_chos gos chen po dang /_'bring dang /_chung ngu'o/_/de la 
[\[161a.2\]]snam sbyar chen po gang yin pa'i srid du ni khru lnga'o/_/zheng du ni khru gsum mo/_/snam sbyar chung ngu gang yin pa'i srid du ni khru phyed dang lnga'o/_/zheng du ni khru phyed dang gsum mo/_/'bring ni de'i bar ma'o/_/de bzhin du bla gos la yang rnam pa gsum mo/_/mthang 
[\[161a.3\]]gos la yang rnam pa gsum mo/_/de bzhin du rngul gzan dang /_shi nga dpung chad la yang rnam pa gsum mo/_/gzhan yang mthang gos kyi srid du ni khru lnga'o/_/zheng du ni khru do'o/_/gzhan yang mthang gos kyi srid du ni khru bzhi'o/_/zheng du ni khru do'o/_/mthang 
[\[161a.4\]]gos kyi tha ma ni khor gsum khebs pa'i tshad do/_/spang ba rnams kyi tha ma ni khru gang khor yug go/_/dge slong mas gos spang bar gyur pa zhes bya ba nas/_dang po ji lta ba bzhin du spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/spang ba'i ltung byed gsum pa 
[\[161a.5\]]rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' las brten te mgon med zas sbyin gyis gsol nas nye du ma yin pa las bslab 
[\[161a.6\]]pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa dang /_dge slong dag chom rkun pas btogs nas/_dge slong chom rkun pas btogs pa las brten te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ngo zhes/_dge slong ma gnas brtan gnas brtan rab tu mang pos thos nas bcom ldan 
[\[161a.7\]]'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong ma gnas brtan gnas brtan rab tu mang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das bslab pa'i gzhi 'di la bdag cag gis ji ltar bgyi/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong ma'i dge 
[\[161b.2\]]'dun la bka' stsal pa/_yang dge slong ma gang khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i drung du song ste gos slong na dus ma gtogs te de las 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/de la dus ni 'di yin te/_dge slong ma gos phrogs sam/_gos rlag 
[\[161b.3\]]gam/_gos tshig gam/_gos chus khyer bar gyur na khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i drung du song nas gos bslang bar bya ste/_de la dus ni de yin no/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'i'o/_/nye du ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang /_
[\[161b.4\]]mes po'i phrugs bdun tshun chad ni nye du yin la/_de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no/_/khyim bdag gam zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'o/_/khyim bdag gi chung ma zhes bya ba ni bud med do/_/song ste zhes bya ba ni song nas so/_/slong na zhes bya ba ni dus ma gtogs par bdag 
[\[161b.5\]]nyid dam/_gzhan slong du 'jug na'o/_/de la dus ni 'di yin te zhes bya ba ni de la 'di ni chos dang mthun pa yin pa'o/_/gos phrogs sam zhes bya ba ni chom rkun nam/_/g.yon can gyis de'i gos dag phrogs par gyur pa'o/_/gos rlag gam zhes bya ba ni de'i gos 
[\[161b.6\]]dag rlag pa'am/_'khyams par gyur pa'o/_/gos chus khyer ram zhes bya ba ni de'i gos dag chus khyer bar gyur pa'o/_/gos tshig gam zhes bya ba ni de'i gos dag mes tshig par gyur pa'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar te/_de la ltung 
[\[161b.7\]]bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_rin thang dang /_kha dog dang /_khru tshad las te/_ji ltar rin thang las zhe na/_yang dge slong ma gang khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i drung du song nas gos kAr ShA pa Na lnga ri ba bslangs na slong ba na 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]de la nyes byas so/_/thob na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/gal te ches lhag par thob na ltung ba med do/_/de bzhin du kAr ShA pa Na bcu dang nyi shu ri ba la yang brjod par bya ste/_de lta bu ni rin thang las so/_/ji ltar kha dog las zhe na/_dge slong ma 
[\[162a.2\]]khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i drung du song ste gos sngon po bslangs na slong ba na de la nyes byas so/_/thob na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/gal te ser po thob na ltung ba med do/_/de bzhin du sngon po dang /_de bzhin du dmar po la sngon po dang /_
[\[162a.3\]]dkar po nyid rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong ma khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i drung du song nas gos ser po bslangs na slong ba na de la nyes byas so/_/thob na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/gal te sngon po thob na ltung ba med do/_/de 
[\[162a.4\]]bzhin du ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po la yang brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong ma khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i drung du song nas gos dmar po bslangs na slong ba na de la nyes byas so/_/thob na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/gal 
[\[162a.5\]]te sngon po thob na ltung ba med do/_/de bzhin du ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po la yang brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong ma khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i drung du song nas gos dkar po bslangs na slong ba na de la nyes byas so/_/thob 
[\[162a.6\]]na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/gal te sngon po thob na ltung ba med do/_/de bzhin du dkar po dang /_ser po dang dmar po la yang brjod par bya ste/_de lta bu ni kha dog las so/_/ji ltar khru tshad las she na/_yang dge slong ma gang khyim bdag gam/_khyim 
[\[162a.7\]]bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i drung du song ste/_gos khru lnga pa bslangs na slong ba na de la nyes byas so/_/thob na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/khru lnga pa'i gos gang yin pa bslangs pa na khru drug pa thob na ltung ba med do/_/de bzhin du khru bcu pa dang /_khru bcu 
[\[162b\]]
