[\[183b.6\]]ces smras so/_/'phags ma gos de btags lags sam/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/de la gla yang dgos so/_/de dag gis gla yang byin pa dang /_de yang zos so/_/de bzhin du 'drub pa'i dang /_tshon rtsi'i gla yang zos so/_/de nas sbom dga' mo la 
[\[183b.7\]]yang khyim bdag gi chung ma de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags ma khyod ci'i slad du na bza' mi mnabs/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig_/de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma khyod kyis ci zhig tu bgyis/_des 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/gter du sbas so/_/de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/re zhig bdag cag ni bu dang khyo'i ched du gter du sbed na/_khyod mun di ta dang rgya shug ltar gcig pu lags na/_su'i slad du gter du sbas/_des 'di 
[\[184a.2\]]skad ces smras so/_/khyed cag ci dong brkos nas gter du sbas snyam mam/_'on kyang kho mos ni kha zas kyis g.yos kyi sna grangs [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa dang /_nyi shu pa dag byas te lag mthil nas lkog mar brdzangs so/_/lkog ma nas sa'i 'og tu bor ro/_/de dag gis 
[\[184a.3\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma re zhig bdag cag la bu dang /_sdum thab las bgyid pa mchis kyang bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i kha zas mi 'tshal na/_ci'i slad du khyod rab tu byung bar gyur pa kha zas kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu la longs spyod lags/_des 'di skad ces kho 
[\[184a.4\]]mo ni shAkya'i bu mo shin tu gzhon pa sde snod gsum pa yin te/_kha zas ngan pas 'tsho bar mi nus so zhes smras pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis thos nas dge slong ma rnams smod par byed do zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong 
[\[184a.5\]]ma gang gos kyi rnyed pa so so ba dag bdag gi kha'i bza' bar byin gyis rlob par byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa'o/_/so so ba zhes bya ba ni dngos po gzhan dag go/_/gos zhes bya ba 
[\[184a.6\]]ni bdun po gang yang rung ba'o/_/bdag rang gi kha'i sgor zhes bya ba ni lkog mar mid pa'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad gos kyi rnyed pa kha'i sgor byin gyis rlob par byed na thams 
[\[184a.7\]]cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/spang ba'i ltung byed nyi shu lnga pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe sbom dga' mo spos 'tshong gi khye'u zhig la chags pas de de'i tshong khang du song ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]sge'u gsher 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]gyi thum po chings shig_/ji tsam na 'ching ba la zhugs pa dang /_des kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/ma yin ma yin pi pi ling gi thum po chings shig_/ma yin ma yin na le sham gyi thum po chings shig_/bud med ni brjed ngas pa yin pas bu ram gyi thum po 
[\[184b.2\]]chings shig_/ma yin ma yin sha kha ra'i thum po chings shig_/ma yin ma yin btsag yug snam gyi thum po chings shig_/gang gi tshe de gzhan 'grol zhing gzhan 'ching ba de'i tshe spos 'tshong gi khye'u khros nas thum po de brdabs so/_/brdabs nas 'di skad ces 
[\[184b.3\]]mgo reg mo ngan pa zhes smras so/_/de la phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge slong mas smras pa/_khyod nus pa 'dis sde snod gsum po dag legs par ston nam/_des blun mo kho mo brjed snyam mam/_de lta mod kyi kho mo tshig tsam rang gir byed do/_/des 'di skad 
[\[184b.4\]]ces smras so/_/khyod 'dod chags kyis brdegs na mi 'gas shing /_shing zhugs ji lta ba bzhin du mi 'bar ba ngo mtshar che'o zhes smras pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/
[\[184b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zhes bya ba nas bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang thum po bcings shing /_bcings shing yang dang yang du 'grol du 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' 
[\[184b.6\]]mo'o/_/thum po bcings shing bcings shing zhes bya ba ni zong ngo /_/yang dang yang du 'grol du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni gzhan dang gzhan no/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung 
[\[184b.7\]]zad chags pas thum po bcings shing bcings shing 'grol du 'jug na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/spang ba'i ltung byed nyi shu drug pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mo snga dro sham thabs bgos 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i pho brang gang na ba der song ba dang /_btsun mo phreng ldan mas rgyang ring po kho na nas sbom dga' mo 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang stan shom du bcug go/_/de nas sbom dga' mo 
[\[185a.2\]]stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug ste/_'dug nas btsun mo phreng ldan ma la chos snyan cing snyan pa bshad do/_/de'i tshe sbom dga' mo'i chos gos smad lnga rnyings shing /_snam sbyar yang dengs so/_/de nas dge slong ma sbom dga' mo la btsun mo phreng ldan mas 'di skad ces smras 
[\[185a.3\]]so/_/'phags ma khyod kyi chos gos rnams rnyings so/_/des 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun mo ci bdag la gsus po che kha da bgyid dam/_'on te yul ka shi dang /_ko sa la bdog_/gzhan yang btsun mo bud med ni rnyed pa chung ba lags so/_/de nas 
[\[185a.4\]]btsun mo phreng ldan mas dge slong ma sbom dga' mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma la bdag gis chos gos lnga dbul lo/_/des 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyis dge slong ma'i chos gos dag 'tshem mi mkhyen te/_de lta mod kyi bdag nyid kyis btsem 
[\[185a.5\]]mo/_/des de la chos gos lnga'i rgyur rin che ba'i ras yug po che dag byin no/_/des de blangs te tshong pa'i drung du song nas btsongs te zhes bya ba nas/_kha zas kyi rnam grangs [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa dang /_nyi shu pa dag byas nas zos te slar yang song ba dang zhes bya ba nas 
[\[185a.6\]]'drub pa'i dang /_tshon rtsi'i gla yang zos so/_/de nas sbom dga' mo la btsun mo phreng ldan mas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma khyod ci'i slad du chos gos de dag mi mnabs/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun mo gter du sbas lags kyis/_/rjes 
[\[185a.7\]]su yi rang ba mdzod cig_/de nas sbom dga' mo la btsun mo phreng ldan mas 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho mo yul ka shi dang /_ko sa la yod kyang gter mi 'cha'o zhes bya ba nas/_rnam grangs [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa dang /_nyi shu pa dag bgyis te lag mthil 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]nas lkog mar brdzangs so zhes bya ba nas/_bdag ni sde snod gsum pa lags so zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang gos kyi phyir dngos po gzhan 
[\[185b.2\]]rnyed pa rang gi kha'i sgor byin gyis rlob par byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/dngos po gzhan zhes bya ba ni gzhan du bsngos pa'o/_/gos kyi rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni bdun po gang yang rung ba'o/_/kha'i sgo zhes bya ba ni 
[\[185b.3\]]lkog mar mid pa'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_ji tsam dge slong mas dngos po gzhan rnyed pa de kha'i sgor byin gyis rlob par byed na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/spang ba'i ltung byed 
[\[185b.4\]]nyi shu bdun pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe sbom dga' mo rang gi dbyar khang gi gnas mal grugs shing chag pa dang /_de la bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gi chung ma rnams kyis smras pa/_khyod kyis gnas mal grugs shing 
[\[185b.5\]]chag pa dag ci'i slad du ma bcos/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci kho mo la bu dang khyim thab las byed pa yod snyam mam/_de dag gis gnas mal bcos pa'i phyir kAr ShA pa Na mang po byin no/_/zhes bya ba nas des kha zas kyi rnam grangs [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa dang /_
[\[185b.6\]]nyi shu pa dag byas te zos so zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/yang grugs shing chag pa mthong nas zhes bya ba nas/_'di skad ces kho mo ni sde snod gsum pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar smras pa na/_don nyung ba'i dge slong dag smod par byed pa'i zhes bya ba nas/_bslab 
[\[185b.7\]]pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang dbyar khang gi gnas mal gyi rnyed pa rang gi kha'i bza' bar byin gyis rlob par byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/gnas mal gyi rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]gding ba dang /_g.yog pa btags pa'am rin no/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad dbyar khang gi rnyed pa kha'i sgor byin gyis rlob par byed na spang 
[\[186a.2\]]ba'i ltung byed do/_/spang ba'i ltung byed nyi shu brgyad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe tshes brgyad dang /[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga dag la khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po chos nyan pa'i phyir dbyar khang du 'ongs pa dang /_de nas mtshan mo char bab pas 
[\[186a.3\]]dbyar khang thams cad thigs pa 'dzag par gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma de rnams kyis sbom dga' mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma khyod kyis ci'i slad du dbyar khang mi bcos/_des 'di skad ces ci kho mo'i khyim na yang bu dang khyim thab yod 
[\[186a.4\]]snyam zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis dbyar khang bcos pa'i phyir kAr ShA pa Na dag byin te/_des kha zas kyi rnam grangs [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa dang /_nyi shu pa dag byas nas zos so zhes bya ba nas/_yang thigs pa 'dzag pa mthong nas zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de dag gis smras 
[\[186a.5\]]pa/_'phags ma dbyar khang ma bcos sam zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_des 'di skad ces kho mo ni sde snod gsum pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du smras pa na/_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zhes bya ba nas 
[\[186a.6\]]bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang dbyar khang bcos pa'i rnyed pa bdag nyid kyi kha'i sgor byin gyis rlob par byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/dbyar khang zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag khang ngo /_/
[\[186a.7\]]rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni gser dang dngul lam/_gzhan ci yang rung ba'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad dbyar khang bcos pa'i rnyed pa kha'i sgor byin gyis rlob par byed na 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/spang ba'i ltung byed nyi shu dgu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe ljongs shig nas dge slong ma rab tu mang po mnyan yod du lhags pa dang /_de dag gi phyir bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi chung mas rnyed pa mang du gtad 
[\[186b.2\]]nas de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma gdugs tshod mdzod cig_/des 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di ltar nyungs kyis yang dang yang du snon cig_/de dag gis yang dang yang du byin nas kyang de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma gdugs 
[\[186b.3\]]tshod bgyi ba'i dus ni 'di lags so/_/des 'di skad ces smras so/_/da dung zan bya ba'i dus la ma bab bo/_/gang gi tshe dge slong ma de rnams ljongs dag tu dong ba de'i tshe des rnyed pa de las rnam grangs [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa dang /_nyi shu pa'i bar dag byas te zos so zhes bya ba 
[\[186b.4\]]nas/_kho mo ni sde snod gsum pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong 
[\[186b.5\]]ma rnams kyi phyir rnyed pa bslangs te/_gcig pu za na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong ma rnams kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ma rnams so/_/rnyed pa zhes bya ba la rnyed pa ni 
[\[186b.6\]]gnyis te/_zas kyi rnyed pa dang /_gos kyi rnyed pa'o/_/don 'di la ni zas kyi rnyed pa yin par dgongs so/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_ji tsam dge slong mas glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong ma rnams 
[\[186b.7\]]kyi phyir rnyed pa yod pa gcig pu za bar byed na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/spang ba'i ltung byed sum bcu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas dge slong ma sbom dga' mos dge 'dun ma'i phyir zas dag yang dag par skul 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]bar byed pa na/_de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung ma de rnams kyis sbom dga' mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma ci'i slad du dge 'dun ma'i zas kyi rnyed pa mi bgyi/_'di ltar nyungs so zhes yang dang yang du blangs nas gcig pus 
[\[187a.2\]]kun du g.yos pa dang /_legs par g.yos pa nas/_rnam grangs [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa dang /_nyi shu pa dag gi bar dag byas te zos so zhes bya ba nas/_rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig ces bya ba dang /_kho mo ni sde snod gsum pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/don 
[\[187a.3\]]nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i zhes bya ba nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang dge 'dun gyi phyir rnyed pa bslangs te bdag nyid kyi kha'i bza' bar byin gyis rlob par byed na spang ba'i ltung byed 
[\[187a.4\]]do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/dge 'dun ma'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ma'i 'o/_/rnyed pa zhes bya ba la rnyed pa ni gnyis te/_zas kyi rnyed pa dang /_gos kyi rnyed pa'o/_/don 'di la ni zas 
[\[187a.5\]]kyi rnyed pa yin par dgongs so/_/bslangs te zhes bya ba ni pha rol las so/_/kha'i zhes bya ba ni kha'i bza' bar ro/_/byin gyis rlob par byed na zhes bya ba ni lkog mar mid par ro/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji 
[\[187a.6\]]ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad dge 'dun ma'i rnyed pa bdag nyid kyi kha'i sgor byin gyis rlob par byed na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/spang ba'i ltung byed sum bcu gcig pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/
[\[187a.7\]]de'i tshe yul lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos la ba rin po che zhig rgyal po gsal rgyal la skyes su bskur ba las/_des rgyal rigs nyams pa'i dmag mi rnams la byin no/_/de rnams kyis kyang chos sbyin ni bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no zhes la ba rin 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]po che de de la byin no/_/des kyang la ba rin po che chos gos kyi gdang la gzar te bzhag go/_/gtsug dga' mo gnas khang du zhugs pas mthong nas/_des chos sbyin la dris pa/_'phags ma la ba rin po che 'di su'i lags/_des 'di skad ces smras 
[\[187b.2\]]so/_/kho mo'i yin no/_/de nas gtsug dga' mos 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod nams dag ni bya ba ste/_bsod nams ma byas sdug bsngal 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/_/bsod nams byas pa dga' 
[\[187b.3\]]bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa ni thog tu bab ste/_khyod ni bsod nams bgyis pas lha dang mis mchod par gyur to/_/de nas chos sbyin gyis gtsug dga' mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te 'dod na khyer cig_/des 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di ni lha'i 
[\[187b.4\]]pham phabs lags so zhes byas nas la ba rin po che de blangs te bgos nas lag pa gnyis bsgyur ba byas te/_lam po che dang srang du 'khyam pa na/_de bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/pha bi su zhig yin ci nor can gyi 
[\[187b.5\]]chung ma'am/_tshong dpon gyi chung ma'am/_ded dpon gyi chung ma zhig yin/_gzhan dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/gtsug dga' mo yin no/_/bltas nas shes ldan dag bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung ma gang yin pa de dag kyang lci la rin che ba'i gos dag 
[\[187b.6\]]gyon la/_shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong ma 'di dag kyang lci la rin che ba'i gos dag gyon na khyad par ni ci yod/_bsam pa ni ci yod/_tha dad du bya ba ni ci yod/_ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed do/_/zhes bya ba'i skabs 
[\[187b.7\]]de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug dga' mo la rmad par mdzad 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]de/_dge slong ma khyed kyis 'di lta bu mdzes pa ma yin pa byas pa bden nam/_bcom ldan 'das mad lags so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug dga' mo la dge sbyong ma'i tshul ma yin pa dang /_rung ba ma yin pa 
[\[188a.2\]]dang /_mdzes pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/_/zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas gnyi ga'i dge 'dun la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bud med ni kha zas dang 'dra ste/_
[\[188a.3\]]re zhig gos bzang po med na yang 'dod par bya ba yin na/_gos bzang po bgos na lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba thams cad ni lci la rin che ba'i gos 'chang ba las gyur to snyam nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[188a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_yang dge slong ma gang lci la rin che ba'i gos 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni gtsug dga' mo'o/_/lci la zhes bya ba ni dgun gyi bgo ba'o/_/rin che ba zhes bya ba ni kAr ShA pa Na nyi shu'am/_nyi shu rtsa lnga ri ba'o/_/
[\[188a.5\]]'chang na zhes bya ba ni gyon na'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad lci la rin che ba'i gos 'chang na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/spang ba'i ltung byed sum bcu 
[\[188a.6\]]gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe yul ka ling ka'i rgyal pos seng ras rin che ba zhig rgyal po gsal rgyal la skyes su bskur ba las/_des rgyal rigs nyams pa'i dmag mi rnams la byin no/_/de rnams kyis kyang 
[\[188a.7\]]chos sbyin ni bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no zhes de la byin no/_/des de blangs te chos gos kyi gdang la gzar te bzhag go/_/gtsug dga' mo yang gnas khang du zhugs pa na mthong nas des 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma seng ras 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]'di su'i lags/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho mo'i yin no/_/de nas gtsug dga' mos chos sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod ni bsod nams bgyis pas lha dang mis mchod par gyur te/_khyod la dpyid ka'i bgo ba 'di lta bu mnga'o/_/des 
[\[188b.2\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te 'dod na khyer cig_/de nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i pham phabs su mi 'tshal/_de nas chos sbyin gyis seng ras gtsug dga' mo la byin no/_/des de bgos te bgos nas srang du zhugs na de'i lus g.yogs kyang sgren 
[\[188b.3\]]mo 'dra bar snang ngo /_/de nas bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyis gtsug dga' mo rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/pha bi su zhig yin/_nor can gyi'am/_tshong dpon gyi'am/_ded dpon gyi bu mo zhig 'ongs par 
[\[188b.4\]]gyur tam/_gzhan dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge slong ma gtsug dga' mo yin no/_/de rnams kyis bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di lta ste/_seng ras gyon pa 'di ni dge slong ma rnams la mdzes pa ma yin no zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka 
[\[188b.5\]]gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa na don nyung ba'i dge slong ma rnams smod par byed pa'i skabs de/_dge slong ma rnams kyis rgyas par dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung 
[\[188b.6\]]ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la nga'i nyan thos ma rnams kyis rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang /_ngas bslab pa'i gzhi legs par bcas par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir gnyi ga'i dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[188b.7\]]'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa/_mi mkhyen par ma yin gyi mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas zhes bya ba nas/_dge slong ma khyod kyis mdzes pa ma yin pa 'di lta bu byas pa bden nam zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis smad par mdzad de/_dge slong ma dag bud med ni legs par sbas kyang mdzes pa ma yin na/_ma sbas na lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong ma rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[189a.2\]]ma dag ngas phan yon bcu yang dag par rjes su gzigs nas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad de/_'di lta ste/_dge 'dun yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir dang /_zhes bya ba nas lha dang mi'i bar la yang dag par legs par rab tu bshad 
[\[189a.3\]]par 'gyur ba'i bar ro/_/yang nga'i nyan thos ma rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di skad ces gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong ma gang yang la rin che ba'i gos gyon na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni gtsug dga' mo'o/_/
[\[189a.4\]]gos yang la zhes bya ba ni seng ras so/_/rin che ba zhes bya ba ni kAr ShA pa Na nyi shu ri ba'am/_kAr ShA pa Na nyi shu rtsa lnga ri ba'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong ma seng ras gyon na spang ba'i 
[\[189a.5\]]ltung byed do/_/sna tshogs su bkra ba gyon nam/_srab mo gyon na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa la sogs pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/spang ba'i ltung byed sum bcu gsum pa rdzogs so/_/dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed 
[\[189a.6\]]pa las spang ba'i ltung byed rnams rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa/_da ni ltung byed rnams smra bar bya ste/_bsdus pa'i sdom ni/_shes bzhin dang ni sa bon dang /_/de bzhin khur ba nyid dang ni/_/
[\[189a.7\]]thal mo rdebs dang ched bsams dang /_/rkun ma bang chen nyid dang ngo /_/sdom ni/_shes bzhin dang ni skyon nas 'dru/_/phra ma dang ni skyo sngogs dang /_/skyes pa la ston chos dang ni/_/yid 'ong bslab pa khyad gsod pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis shes bzhin du dge slong ma rnams la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra bas mtho 'tsham par byed pa na/_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma rnams smod par 
[\[189b.2\]]byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_shes bzhin du [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra na ltung byed do/_/shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rnam par dpyad nas 
[\[189b.3\]]so/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra na zhes bya ba la/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba rnam pa brgyad kyang yod/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba rnam pa bdun yang yod/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba rnam pa drug kyang yod/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba rnam pa lnga yang yod/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba rnam pa bzhi yang yod/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba 
[\[189b.4\]]rnam pa gsum yang yod/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba rnam pa gnyis kyang yod do/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/_gzhi med par phas pham par 'gyur ba dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma dang /_ltung byed dang /_so sor bshags par bya ba dang /_nyes byas dang /_
[\[189b.5\]]gzhi med par mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_dogs pa ste/_'di ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba rnam pa brgyad yin no/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba rnam pa bdun gang zhe na/_gzhi med par tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_lta ba nyams pa dang /_cho ga nyams pa dang /_'tsho 
[\[189b.6\]]ba nyams pa dang /_gzhi med par mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_dogs pa ste/_'di ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba rnam pa bdun yin no/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba rnam pa drug gang zhe na/_dge slong ma [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra bar 'dod pa 'di snyam du [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra bar bya'o 
[\[189b.7\]]snyam pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra'o snyam pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smras so snyam pa dang /_gzhi med par mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_dogs pa ste/_'di ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba rnam pa drug yin no/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/_gzhi med par phas 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]pham par 'gyur ba dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma dang /_ltung byed dang /_so sor bshags par bya ba dang /_nyes byas kyis te/_'di ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba rnam pa lnga yin no/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba rnam pa bzhi gang zhe na/_gzhi med par tshul

[\[190a.5\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba rnam pa gnyis yin no/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba la rnam pa gcig pu 'ba' zhig ni med do/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba phas pham par 'gyur ba yang yod/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ba yang yod/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba sbom por 'gyur ba yang yod/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]

[\[190a.7\]]ba yin no/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dge slong mas gzhi med par dge slong ma dag pa la phas pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skur pa 'debs pa ste/_'di ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ba yin no/_/
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba sbom por 'gyur ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dge slong mas ched du bsams te dge 'dun gyi nang du chos ma yin pa la chos dang /_chos la chos ma yin pa dang /_'dul ba ma yin pa la 'dul ba dang /_'dul ba la 'dul ba ma yin par ston pa ste/_

[\[190b.3\]]no/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba nyes byas su 'gyur ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dge slong mas gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la so so thar pa'i mdo 'don pas ci 'di ni yongs su dag gam zhes dris pa na de yongs su ma dag bzhin du cang mi smra bas dang du len pa ste/_'di ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du

[\[192a\]]

[\[192b.7\]]dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces ngas ma rtogs te 'on kyang mthong ngo /_/thos so/_/rnam par shes so zhes zer na smras so cog ltung byed do/_/'di rnam par shes mod kyi ma mthong ma thos/_ma rtogs pa las des 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]bsgyur te zhes bya ba nas/_'di skad ces ngas rnam par ma shes te 'on kyang ngas mthong ngo /_/ngas thos so/_/ngas rtogs so zhes zer na smras so cog ltung byed do/_/bdag gis mthong la ma brjed cing bdag gis thos pa dang /_rtogs pa dang /_rnam

[\[193a.6\]]brjed do zhes zer na smras so cog ltung byed do/_/bdag gis rnam par shes la ma brjed do/_/bdag gis mthong la ma brjed/_bdag gis thos la ma brjed/_bdag gis rtogs la ma brjed pa las des 'du shes dang /_bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog 
[\[193a.7\]]pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces ngas rnam par shes te brjed do/_/ngas mthong ste brjed do/_/ngas thos te brjed do/_/ngas rtogs te brjed do zhes zer na smras so cog ltung byed do/_/bdag gis mthong la yid gnyis mi za/_bdag gis thos la yid gnyis mi za/_
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]bdag gis rtogs la yid gnyis mi za/_bdag gis rnam par shes la yid gnyis mi za ba las des 'du shes dang /_bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces ngas mthong ste yid gnyis za'o/_/ngas thos te yid

[\[193b.5\]]des bsgyur te zhes bya ba nas ngas rtogs te yid gnyis za'o/_/ngas mthong /_thos/_rnam par shes te yid gnyis za'o zhes zer na smras so cog ltung byed do/_/bdag gis rnam par shes la yid gnyis mi za zhing mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_rtogs la
