[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]rnam par shes par 'du shes pa las ngas thos kyi mthong ngo /_/ma rtogs so/_/rnam par ma shes so zhes zer na smras so cog ltung byed do/_/ma rtogs pa la rtogs par 'du shes shing mthong ba la mthong bar 'du shes/_thos pa la thos par 'du shes rnam 
[\[194a.2\]]par shes pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes pa las des bsgyur te zhes bya ba nas/_ngas rtogs kyi ma mthong ngo /_/ma thos so/_/rnam par ma shes so zhes zer na smras so cog ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes la rnam par shes par 'du shes shing bdag gis 
[\[194a.3\]]mthong ba dang /_bdag gis thos pa dang /_bdag gis rtogs pa las 'du shes dang /_bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces ngas rnam par shes kyi/_ma mthong ngo /_/ma thos so/_/ma rtogs so zhes zer na smras 
[\[194a.4\]]so cog ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed dang po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis 'di skad ces zhar ma/_theng mo/_sgur mo/_mi'u thung mo/_mchu 'phyangs mo/_mgo mo che/_lag zha mo zhes bud 
[\[194a.5\]]med kyi skyon nas 'dru zhing smra ba'i kun du spyod pas kun du spyod par byed pa na/_de rnams de ltar bud med kyi skyon nas 'dru zhing smra ba'i kun du spyod pas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba mang bar gyur te/_lung mnod pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_
[\[194a.6\]]yid la byed pa gtong zhing /_chos 'dul ba 'di la chos dang ldan pa'i snum bag nyung ngu dag byung ba yang bar chad du gyur pa na/_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[194a.7\]]'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma dag sngon byung ba ljongs shig na khyim bdag zhing pa zhig yod pa'i drung du khye'u zhig 'ongs te zhes bya ba nas/_des de'i sems mgu bar byas so zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/des 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]khye'u de la bu mo byin no zhes bya ba nas/_zhing pa des chung ma'i tshig mnyan nas yang ma byin no zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/des de'i glang de dag brdegs pa las glang de gnyis kyis khye'u de la dris pa dang /_des kyang smras so/_/de na de dag las glang gnyis shig gis rgyal 
[\[194b.2\]]po'i pho brang du song shig dang /_kho bo cag gis dpang bya'o zhes bya ba nas/_des yang dang yang du rwa chag mjug rdum/_zhar ba zhes kun du smras pa gcig cig yod pa de ma btub po zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa'i zhes bya ba nas/_mon sran 
[\[194b.3\]]gre'u'i zhing phun sum tshogs pa la nyi ma bdun du ma gzan par skye yang cung zad kyang ma zos so zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/dge slong ma dag re zhig dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags de dag kyang mi'i skyon nas smra bas kun du spyod pa na gnod par bya bar sems par byed na 
[\[194b.4\]]mir gyur pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba nas/_sngon gyi sbyor ba 'di rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma dag sngon byung ba 'das pa na shing rtas spyod pa'i mi zhig la dga' byed ma dang /_sa 
[\[194b.5\]]ri mo zhes bya ba'i ba bzhon gnyis shig yod pa las zhes bya ba nas/_be'u gnyis yod pa'i bar ro/_/de gnyis 'thab pa las gcig gi ni rwa ni chag par gyur to/_/cig shos ni gdengs par gyur nas des ru rdum dang /_ru 'di la zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/shing rtas spyod 
[\[194b.6\]]pas 'dren pa na zhes bya ba nas skugs yal lo zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/dga' byed dang /_sa ri zhes smras nas zhes bya ba nas/_nyis 'gyur thob bo zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_gang tshe lam ni ches dma' la/_/gang tshe khal ni ches lci ba/_/de 
[\[194b.7\]]tshe khal dag khyer byed cing /_/de tshe sna la 'dren par byed/_/yid du 'ong ba smras pa na/_/khur lci ba yang sgrol bar byed/_/ces bya ba'i bar du'o/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags dag kyang mi'i skyon nas smras pa na gnod par bya bar sems par byed na mir 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]gyur pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_dge slong ma dag de lta bas na bud med kyi skyon nas smra na ltung byed do/_/bud med kyi skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pa can gyi ngag dang /_tshig dang /_tha snyad dang /_brjod pa dang /_skad dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_tshig gi 
[\[195a.2\]]lam dang /_tshig gi sgra dang /_rjod byed dang /_rjod pa'i las dang /_ngag gi rnam par rig byed gang yin pa dag go/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na//_//bar sdom ni/_rigs dang bzo dang las dang ni/_/rtags nang ltung ba sde lnga dang /_/nye ba'i nyon mongs 
[\[195a.3\]]rnams dang ni/_/spyo bar byed pa tha ma yin/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces 'phags ma khyod ni bram ze mo las rab tu byung ba yin na dge sbyong gi tshul gyis ni ci zhig bya/_tshangs pa'i tshul gyis ni ci zhig bya zhes smras na/_dge slong ma spa gong ba nyid 
[\[195a.4\]]du gyur kyang rung /_ma gyur kyang rung zhes bya ba nas/_ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces khyod ni rgyal rigs mo las rab tu byung ba yin na khyod la dge sbyong gi tshul lam tshangs pa'i tshul gyis ci zhig bya zhes smras na 
[\[195a.5\]]dge slong ma spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces khyod ni rje'u rigs mo las rab tu byung ba yin na/_khyod la dge sbyong gi tshul lam/_bram ze'i tshul gyis ci zhig bya zhes smras na/_dge slong ma 
[\[195a.6\]]spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma'i drung du song ste/_'di skad ces khyod ni dmangs rigs mo las rab tu byung ba yin na/_dge sbyong gi tshul lam/_tshangs pa'i tshul gyis ci zhig bya zhes smra na/_dge slong ma spa gong ba 
[\[195a.7\]]nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung ltung byed du 'gyur te/_'di ni rigs zhes bya ba yin no/_/de la bzo las brjod pa ni//_//bar sdom la/_bram ze'i rigs dang rgyal rigs dang /_/rje'u rigs dmangs rigs bzo dag dang /_/thag pa dang skud ris mkhan/_/bzang 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]mkhan mgar ba lcags mgar dang /_/lham mkhan rdza mkhan 'dreg mkhan dang /_/shing mkhan smyig mkhan bran rigs so/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces/_khyod ni bram ze las rab tu byung ba yin pas rang gi gzhung lugs 'di lta ste bram ze 
[\[195b.2\]]rnams kyi spyod tshul dang /_spyod pa dang /_gtsang sbra dang /_kun du spyod pa dang /_thal ba blang ba dang /_bya ma bum blang ba dang /_sa blang ba dang /_rab bsngags bya ba dang /_kye zhes bya ba dang /_rgyal bar gyur cig ces bya ba dang /_kun du bzlas brjod dang /_bzlas 
[\[195b.3\]]brjod dang /_dus kyi bsnyen pa dang /_nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /_snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /_srid srung gi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin byed pa dang /_mchod sbyin byed du 'jug pa dang /_klog pa dang /_klog tu 'jug pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_
[\[195b.4\]]len pa kho na bslab dgos te/_las drug la brtson pa'i bram ze mo ni tshangs pa yin no zhes smras na/_dge slong ma spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung /_ma gyur kyang rung ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces khyod ni rgyal rigs las 
[\[195b.5\]]rab tu byung ba yin pas rang gi gzhung lugs 'di lta ste/_bro dang glu dang /_pi bang dang /_pi bang rgyud gcig pa dang /_ba b+his ke zhes bya ba dang /_ma ni ka pre ba ne zhes bya ba dang /_dri btag pa dang /_mgo'i byi dor dang /_gos bltab pa dang /_byi dor bslab dgos so 
[\[195b.6\]]zhes smras na/_dge slong ma spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung /_ma gyur kyang rung ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces khyod ni rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba yin pas rang gi gzhung lugs 'di lta ste/_yi ge dang /_rtsis dang /_grangs 
[\[195b.7\]]dang /_lag rtsis bslab dgos so zhes smras na/_dge slong ma spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung /_ma gyur kyang rung ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces khyod ni dmangs rigs las rab tu byung ba yin pas rang gi gzhung lugs 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]'di lta ste/_'dru ba dang /_'thag pa dang /_gtun dang /_gtun shing dang zhes bya ba nas/_sel ba dang /_rmel ba dang /_'khal ba'i bar bslab dgos so zhes smras na/_dge slong ma spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung /_ma gyur kyang rung ltung byed 
[\[196a.2\]]du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces/_khyod ni tha ga ma las rab tu byung ba yin pas khyod kyis rang gi gzhung lugs 'di lta ste/_dar dang /_ras yug chen dang /_gos dang /_dar la dang /_mon dar dag bslab dgos so zhes smras na/_dge 
[\[196a.3\]]slong ma spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung /_ma gyur kyang rung ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces khyod ni skud ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin pas khyod kyis rang gi gzhung lugs 'di lta ste/_klam dang /_par tang dang /_rgyab rten 
[\[196a.4\]]dang /_gor chen nang tshangs dang /_zhwa drub pa dang /_lgo to dag bslab dgos so zhes smras na/_dge slong ma spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung /_ma gyur kyang rung ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bzang mkhan las rab tu byung ba la bus pa'i gos dang /_zhwa dang /_yan lag lnga 
[\[196a.5\]]khebs pa dang /_'thab ber dag ces bya ba nas ltung byed do/_/zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du mgar ba las rab tu byung ba la lhung bzed dang /_lhung bzed chung ngu dang /_mtshon cha dang /_khab dang /_gsor bu dang /_zhes bya ba nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de 
[\[196a.6\]]bzhin du lcags mgar las rab tu byung ba la zhugs gling dang /_gri gu dang /_phor bu dang /_kha gzar dang zhes bya ba nas/_ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du lham mkhan las rab tu byung ba la lham dang /_lham yu chad dang /_mchil lham dang /_srab dang /_sga 
[\[196a.7\]]zhes bya ba nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du rdza mkhan las rab tu byung ba la rdza ma dang /_ril ba dang /_bya bo dang /_kham phor dang /_lhung bzed dang /_lhung bzed chung ngu dag ces bya ba nas/_ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du 'dreg 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]mkhan las rab tu byung ba la kha spu breg pa dang /_byin spu breg pa dang /_sen mo breg pa dang /_skra breg pa dang /_zhes bya ba nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du shing mkhan las rab tu byung ba la khri dang /_khri'u dang /_mal khri dang /_'dug khri dang /_
[\[196b.2\]]sgo cha dang /_sgo 'phar dang zhes bya ba nas ltung byed do/_/zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du smyug ma mkhan las rab tu byung ba la gdugs dang /_bsil yab dang /_dir dang /_skon bu dang /_ngud gzeb dang /_sba khri'u dang /_zhes bya ba nas ltung byed do zhes bya 
[\[196b.3\]]ba'i bar ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma'i drung du song nas 'di skad ces khyod ni bran mo las rab tu byung ba yin pas khyod kyis rang gi gzhung lugs 'di lta ste/_bsku mnye dang /_khrus dang /_dril phyi dang /_bang chen du 'gro ba dang /_'ong ba dang /_mngag gzhug 
[\[196b.4\]]dag bslab dgos so zhes smras na/_dge slong ma spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung ltung byed du 'gyur te/_'di ni bzo zhes bya ba yin no/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma'i drung du song nas 'di skad ces khyod ni bram ze las rab tu byung ba yin pas khyod kyis rang 
[\[196b.5\]]gi gzhung lugs 'di lta ste/_blugs gzar dang /_zangs bu dang /_sbyin sreg dang /_yam sreg shing dang /_rtswa dang /_me dang /_ba'i lci ba dag gi las bya dgos so zhes smras na/_dge slong ma spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[196b.6\]]dge slong mas dge slong ma'i drung du song nas 'di skad ces khyod rgyal rigs las rab tu byung ba yin pas khyod kyis rang gi gzhung lugs 'di lta ste/_pi bang dang /_pi bang rgyud gcig pa dang /_ba b+his ke'i las bya dgos so zhes smras na/_dge slong ma spa gong ba 
[\[196b.7\]]nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba la zhes bya ba nas yi ge dang /_rtsis dang /_zhes bya ba nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du dmangs rigs las rab tu byung ba la zhes bya ba nas sel ba 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]dang /_rmel ba dang /_'khal ba zhes bya ba nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du tha ga pa las rab tu byung ba la zhes bya ba nas 'di lta ste/_thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_son ma dang /_dru bu dang /_snas dang /_snas gri dang /_skud pa dang /_
[\[197a.2\]]'bras thug tu gzhug dang /_brgyang thag gi las bya dgos so zhes smras na ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du skud ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba la rgyang shing dang /_thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_spun gyi smyug ma dang /_so [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang zhes bya ba nas ltung byed do 
[\[197a.3\]]zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du bzang mkhan las rab tu byung ba la dra gri dang /_khab dang /_lcib mo dang /_mtheb lcib dang /_zhes bya ba nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du mgar ba las rab tu byung ba la sbud ru dang /_so mal dang /_gri 
[\[197a.4\]]dang /_the'u dang /_tho chen dang /_sbud pa dang /_skam pa dang zhes bya ba nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du rdza mkhan las rab tu byung ba la 'khor lo dang /_dbyug gu dang /_'khor lo'i rten ma dang /_gzhag pa dang /_dra ba'i the gu dang /_chu 
[\[197a.5\]]snod dang zhes bya ba nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du 'dreg mkhan las rab tu byung ba la chan pa dang /_spu gri dang /_smang tsher dang /_sen mo breg pa dang /_gdar dang zhes bya ba nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du shing mkhan las 
[\[197a.6\]]rab tu byung ba la ste'u dang /_gzhi dang /_gzong dang /_sta re dang /_sog le dang /_sog chung dang /_gsor bu dang zhes bya ba nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du smyug mkhan las rab tu byung ba la smyug ma dang /_skud pa dang /_gsheg gri dang /_tshon 
[\[197a.7\]]rtsi dang /_lhang tsher dang zhes bya ba nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du bran mo'i rigs las rab tu byung ba la thag pa dang /_bum pa dang /_'bru mar dang /_bsku mnye dang /_khrus dang zhes bya ba nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar te/_'di ni las 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]zhes bya ba yin no/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces/_theng mo zhes smras na ltung byed do/_/sgur mo dang /_mi thung mo dang /_rkang zha mo dang /_lba ba can mo dang /_lkugs ma dang /_theng mo dang /_'on pa mo dang /_rten 'phye mo dang /_rkang bam mo zhes smras na 
[\[197b.2\]]thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur te/_'di ni rtags zhes bya ba yin no/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces/_mdze can ma zhes smras na ltung byed do/_/shu ba dang /_'brum bu phra mo dang /_ngal skyen pa dang /_g.yal ba dang /_khyi rngo dang /_g.yan 
[\[197b.3\]]pa dang shu ba g.ya' ba dang /_rkang shu dang /_skyigs bu dang /_skyug bro ba dang /_rims dang /_khong skem dang /_lu ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_kha skam pa dang /_brjed byed dang /_bkres ngab dang /_skya rbab dang /_skran dang /_khrag nad dang /_mkhris 
[\[197b.4\]]nad dang /_mtshan bar rdol ma zhes de la sogs pa smras na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur te/_'di ni nad las zhes bya ba yin no/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma'i drung du song ste/_'di skad ces khyod ni phas pham par 'gyur ba dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma can yin 
[\[197b.5\]]no zhes smras na ltung byed do/_/so sor bshags pa dang /_nyes byas can yin no zhes smras na thams cad du gzhi ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma'i drung du song ste/_'di skad ces khro ba dang /_khon du 'dzin pa dang /_'chab pa dang /_'tshig 
[\[197b.6\]]pa dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna dang /_g.yo dang /_sgyu can ma zhes smras na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur te/_'di ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba yin no/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma'i drung du song ste/_spyo ba na rgya zhes bya ba dang /_mngal zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[197b.7\]]bong bu dang ldan pa dag gis spyos pa na dge slong ma spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te mang po zhig ming mthun na ltung ba med do/_/de la yang dmigs kyis bsal ba med par mi brjod kyi rgyu'i ched kyis ming nas 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]brjod par bya'o/_/las dang po la sogs pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams phra mas kun du spyod par byed de/_tshu bi las thos nas pha bi dag la 
[\[198a.2\]]rjod par byed/_pha bi las thos nas tshu bi dag la rjod par byed pa na de dag phye ste phyogs gnyis su gyur pas phan tshun sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba skyes la/_lung mnod pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba dang /_nang gi sems 
[\[198a.3\]]kyi zhi gnas kyang stong par byed cing gnas pa na don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams 
[\[198a.4\]]la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma dag khyed gcig la gcig phra mas kun du spyod par ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong ma dag sngon byung ba na nags tshang tshing zhig na seng ge mo sbrum ma zhig yod de/_de rnams kyi rang bzhin ni bdag gi phru gus nu ma la 
[\[198a.5\]]za ba'am/_ltogs par gyur na mi rung ngo zhes de nyid kha zas su bya ba'i phyir sha kho na'i tshogs byas te 'brang bar byed do zhes bya ba nas ba zhig bsad de 'brangs so/_/ba de la yang be'u zhig yod pa seng ge mo de nyid kyi nu ma la 'thung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/ji tsam 
[\[198a.6\]]na gnyis ka chen por gyur nas de yang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe zhes bya ba nas/_mdza' ba 'byed pa ni mang du yod do zhes yang dag par gtams nas zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/wa zhig gis gnyis ka phye nas zhes bya ba nas/_de gnyis kyang gcig gis gcig srog dang phral 
[\[198a.7\]]lo zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/ji tsam na lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_skye bo sdig can 'grogs pa las/_/mi yis bzang po mthong mi 'gyur/_/seng ge khyu mchog mdza' ba las/_/wa yis tha dad phye la ltos/_/dge slong ma dag re zhig dud 'gro'i skye 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]gnas su song ba'i srog chags de dag kyang phra mas kun du spyad pa na ji tsam na gcig la gcig gsod par byed na bud med lhag par khro ba lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes sngon gyi sbyor ba 'di rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/gzhan yang sngon gyi sbyor ba ni dge slong ma dag sngon 
[\[198b.2\]]byung ba seng ge phru gu btsas nas ring po ma lon pa zhig ma spyod yul du song ba dang ltogs shing 'phyan pa na/_de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na stag mo zhig 'brangs so/_/de 'phyan pa na stag mo zhig dang phrad nas nu ma bsnun par brtsams so zhes bya ba nas/_gnas 
[\[198b.3\]]gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de la yang seng ge'i ming ni mche [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya'o/_/stag gi ming ni dpung [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya'o zhes bya ba nas/_de gnyis la yang wa zhig gis dbyen bya bar brtsams so zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/ji tsam na seng ges tshigs 
[\[198b.4\]]su bcad de smras pa/_chu zheng phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/rtsal dang shugs dang ldan pa yi/_/mche [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la ni rgol byed pa/_/dpung [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de ni legs pa min/_/dpung [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_chu zheng phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/rtsal dang shugs dang ldan 
[\[198b.5\]]pa yi/_/dpung [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la ni rgol byed pa/_/mche [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de ni legs pa min/_/de gnyis kyis gcig la gcig dris nas zhes bya ba nas wa bsad do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/ji tsam na lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gzhan gyi tshig gis grogs po mi 
[\[198b.6\]]spang ste/_/gzhan gyis smras pa dag ni brtag par bya/_/dbye bar 'dod pa rnams ni glags tshol byed/_/de bas skye bo phra ma yid mi rton/_/grogs po 'byed pa'i phra ma can/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba'i wa skyes po/_/grong rgyun skyes te ro 'di ni/_/bsad nas bde 
[\[198b.7\]]bas dga' bar byed/_/dge slong ma dag re zhig dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags de dag kyang gcig la gcig phra mas kun du spyad pa na/_sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba mang po gnas par byed na/_bud med lhag par khro ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]dge slong ma dag de lta bas na phra mas kun du spyad par mi bya'o/_/kun du spyod na ltung byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_dge slong mas phra ma smras na ltung byed do/_/
[\[199a.2\]]phra ma'i bsam pa can gyi gang zhes bya ba nas ngag dang /_tshig dang zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni ltung bar byed ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas bram ze las rab tu byung ba'i 
[\[199a.3\]]drung du song ste 'di skad ces 'phags ma khyod la dge slong ma che ge mo zhig 'di skad ces khyod la dge sbyong gi tshul dang /_tshangs pa'i tshul gyis ci zhig bya/_khyod ni bram ze las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes zer ro zhes smra zhing rigs sgrogs par byed na nyes byas so/_/
[\[199a.4\]]rus sgrogs par byed na yang nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du rgyal rigs las rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba nas/_nyes byas so zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba nas/_ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du dmangs rigs 
[\[199a.5\]]las rab tu byung ba la zhes bya ba nas/_ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar te/_'di ni rigs zhes bya ba yin no/_/dge slong mas bram ze las rab tu byung ba'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces 'phags ma khyod la dge slong ma che ge mo zhig 'di skad ces khyod la dge sbyong gi tshul 
[\[199a.6\]]dang /_tshangs pa'i tshul gyis ci zhig bya/_khyod ni bram ze las rab tu byung ba yin pas khyod ni rang gi gzhung lugs la bslab dgos so zhes zer ro zhes smras shing bzo sgrogs par byed na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du rgyal rigs las rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba nas 
[\[199a.7\]]nyes byas so zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba la zhes bya ba nas/_ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du dmangs rigs las rab tu byung ba la zhes bya ba nas/_ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar te/_de ltar bar sdom de ji ltar 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]gong du bshad pa bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/de la skud ris mkhan dang bzang mkhan dang /_/lcags mgar dang ni lham mkhan dang /_/rdza mkhan 'dreg mkhan shing mkhan dang /_/smig ma mkhan dang bran mo'o/_/'di ni bzo zhes bya ba yin no/_/dge 
[\[199b.2\]]slong mas bram ze las rab tu byung ba'i dge slong ma'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces/_'phags ma khyod la dge slong ma che ge mo zhig 'di skad ces khyod la dge sbyong gi tshul dang /_tshangs pa'i tshul gyis ci zhig bya/_khyod ni bram ze las rab tu byung ba yin pas khyod 
[\[199b.3\]]kyis rang gi gzhung lugs kyi las bya dgos so zhes zer ro zhes smras shing /_las sgrogs par byed na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du rgyal rigs las rab tu byung ba la zhes bya ba nas/_nyes byas so zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba 
[\[199b.4\]]la zhes bya ba nas/_ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du dmangs rigs las rab tu byung ba la zhes bya ba nas/_ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar te/_ji ltar gong du bshad pa bzhin bar sdom de rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/rigs dang bzo dang las dang ni/_/
[\[199b.5\]]rtags dang nad ni lnga pa yin/_/ltung ba dang ni nye nyon mongs/_/spyo bar byed pa tha ma yin/_/ltung byed gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar byas pa rnams rtsod pa 'di ni shad kyis ma byang 
[\[199b.6\]]ste/_yang shad kyis sbyang bar bya'o/_/rtsod pa 'di ni nges par ma brtags te yang nges par brtag par bya'o/_/rtsod pa 'di ni legs par gtan la ma phab ste yang legs par gtan la dbab par bya'o/_/rtsod pa 'di ni nye bar zhi bar ma byas te yang nye bar zhi bar bya'o 
[\[199b.7\]]zhes yang dang yang du skyo sngogs byed do/_/de nas dge slong ma de rnams 'thab mo dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa byung zhing mtshang 'dru bar gyur pas gnas shing lung mnod pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la byed pa dang /_nang gi 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]sems kyi zhi gnas gtong bar byed pa na/_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge 
[\[200a.2\]]slong ma gang dge 'dun mthun pas chos bzhin du rtsod pa sbyangs par shes bzhin du yang las kyi skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so/_/chos bzhin du zhes bya ba ni 
[\[200a.3\]]'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin dang ston pa'i bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du'o/_/rtsod pa zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa bzhi po 'thab pa'i phyir rtsod pa dang /_mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod pa dang /_ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa dang /_bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa'o/_/chos bzhin du sbyangs pa las zhes bya ba ni 
[\[200a.4\]]gsol ba dang /_bzhi'i las kyis so/_/yang las kyi skyo sngogs byed na zhes bya ba ni yang byed 'dod pa'i phyir ro/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas 'thab pa'i phyir rtsod pa la rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes 
[\[200a.5\]]shing yang las kyi skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyi skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed do/_/yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/
[\[200a.6\]]dge slong mas shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes na nyes byas so/_/yid gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/dge slong mas 'thab pa'i phyir rtsod pa la mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing /_yang las kyi skyo 
[\[200a.7\]]sngogs byed na ltung byed do/_/yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes na nyes byas so/_/yid gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/dge slong mas 'thab pa'i phyir rtsod pa la ltung ba'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]bar 'du shes shing yang las kyi skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed do/_/yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes na nyes byas so/_/yid gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/dge slong mas 'thab pa'i phyir rtsod pa la bya ba'i phyir rtsod par 'du 
[\[200b.2\]]shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyi skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed do/_/yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes na nyes byas so/_/yid gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/dge slong mas 
[\[200b.3\]]mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod pa la 'thab pa'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyi skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed do/_/shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis 
[\[200b.4\]]byang bar 'du shes na nyes byas so/_/yid gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/dge slong mas mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod pa la ltung ba'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes na ltung byed do/_/yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/shad kyis 
[\[200b.5\]]byang ba la shad kyis ma byang bar 'du shes na nyes byas so/_/yid gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod pa la bya ba'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes na ltung byed do/_/yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/shad 
[\[200b.6\]]kyis byang ba la shad kyis ma byang bar 'du shes na nyes byas so/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis ma byang bar 'du shes na nyes byas so/_/yid gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/dge slong mas ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa la 'thab pa'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang 
[\[200b.7\]]ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes na ltung byed do/_/yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis ma byang bar 'du shes na nyes byas so/_/yid gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/dge slong mas ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa la mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod par 'du 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes na ltung byed do/_/yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa la bya ba'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes na ltung byed do/_/
[\[201a.2\]]yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes na nyes byas so/_/yid gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/dge slong mas bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa la 'thab pa'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang 
[\[201a.3\]]bar 'du shes na ltung byed do/_/yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes na nyes byas so/_/yid gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/dge slong mas bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa la mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas 
[\[201a.4\]]shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes na ltung byed do/_/yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes na nyes byas so/_/yid gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/dge slong mas bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa la ltung ba'i phyir rtsod par 
[\[201a.5\]]'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes na ltung byed do/_/yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes na nyes byas so/_/yid gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/dge slong ma ni lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_
[\[201a.6\]]dge slong ma gnyug mar gnas pa dang /_las byed pa dang /_'dun pa dbul ba dang /_lta ba smra ba dang /_lnga pa ni glo bur du 'ongs pa'o/_/dge slong ma gnyug mar gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang gis rtsod pa de'i thog ma dang /_bar dang /_tha ma dag shes pa'o/_/
[\[201a.7\]]las byed pa gang zhe na/_gang gis der las byas par gyur pa'o/_/'dun pa 'bul ba gang zhe na/_gang gis der rang gis 'dun pa phul bar gyur pa'o/_/lta ba smra ba gang zhe na/_gang gis der 'di ni bdag bzod do/_/'di mi bzod do/_/'di ni bdag 'dod 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]do/_/'di ni bdag mi 'dod do zhes rang gi lta ba brjod par gyur pa'o/_/glo bur du 'ongs pa gang zhe na/_der gang gis thog ma dang /_bar dang /_tha ma dag mi shes pa'o/_/dang po'i gsum po gang yin pa gnyug mar gnas pa dang /_las byed pa dang /_
[\[201b.2\]]'dun pa 'bul ba ste/_'di dag gis chos bzhin du rtsod pa sbyangs pa las yang las kyi skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tha ma gnyis kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas so/_/gal te shad kyis nyes par sbyangs pa yin na ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed bzhi 
[\[201b.3\]]pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bcu drug pa/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mo khyim bdag gi khyim de dang de rnams su bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te bram ze dang /_khyim bdag de dag la 
[\[201b.4\]]gcig pu 'dug cing chos ston pa na des bud med rnams kyi bud med kyi gsang ba dang /_bud med kyi gsang chen gang yin pa thams cad skyes pa de dag la bstan to/_/skyes pa de dag gis kyang chung ma de dag la smras so/_/bud med ni phrag dog can yin pas de nas 
[\[201b.5\]]dge slong ma gnas brtan gnas brtan dag bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na 'jig rten la co 'dri bar byed pa khyed cag la su zhig bsod snyoms sbyin par byed par sems par 'gyur zhes kha zer ba dang /_e ma'o phu nu mo dag 'di ci nyes na gshe bar gyur/_de dag gis 'di 
[\[201b.6\]]skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma sbom dga' mos bdag cag khyim thab dag gi mdun du co dris so/_/de rnams kyis bsod snyoms ma rnyed de/_de rnams kyis bsod snyoms ma rnyed pa na smod par byed/_phyar kha gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de 
[\[201b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba de thams cad ni chos bstan pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na chos bstan par mi bya'o/_/de dag yang bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na bram ze dang /_khyim 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]bdag rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags ma dag chos shod cig_/de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkag go/_/bram ze dang /_khyim bdag de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag gi sdum pa'i 
[\[202a.2\]]bsod snyoms kyang dgag lags mod/_de rnams yang bsod snyoms kyis phongs par gyur pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na tshig lnga'i chos bstan par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[202a.3\]]tshig lnga'i chos bstan par bka' stsal pa na de rnams kyis ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gzugs ni mi rtag go/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag go zhes 
[\[202a.4\]]bya ba'o/_/gang gi tshe de rnams kyis tshig lnga'i chos bstan par brtsams pa dang /_de nas bram ze dang /_khyim bdag de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma dag ci'i slad du khyod kyis chos mang du mi bshad/_khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis de 
[\[202a.5\]]tsam zhig bca' ba mdzad do/_/'phags ma dag ci khyod sprig ka'i rin gyi chos shig bstan par rtsom mam/_de nas bram ze dang /_khyim bdag de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji ltar bdag cag la chos nyung ngu bstan pa de ltar bdag cag gis bsod snyoms 
[\[202a.6\]]kyang nyung ngu 'bul lo/_/de ltar bsod snyoms kyis phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshig drug gi chos bstan par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa na de rnams kyis 
[\[202a.7\]]ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag mig ni mi rtag go/_/khyim bdag rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni mi rtag go zhes bya ba'o/_/gang gi tshe dge slong ma de rnams kyis tshig drug gi chos bstan par brtsams pa dang /_
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]de nas bcu gnyis sde de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshig lnga gang yin pa de drug par byas 'dod cig_/tshig drug pas chang ni ma 'thungs sgog skya ni ma zos na nyes pa ci yod/_de bzhin du ched du bsams te tshig drug bya ba la tshig bdun par 'das par byed pa'i 
[\[202b.2\]]skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mi bstan to zhes bya ba nas bsod snyoms kyis phongs par gyur pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes pa la ni bud med dang bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar 
[\[202b.3\]]ro/_/bcu gnyis sde de rnams bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na khyim bdag gi khyim de dag tu khyim bdag rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag chos nyon cig_/'phags ma re zhig bud med dag grogs su dgug gis gzhes shig_/bcu gnyis sde de dag gis 
[\[202b.4\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/bya gag mo 'am/_spra mo'am/_lug ma mo'am/_byi la mo 'di dag mo ma yin nam/_zhes de rnams kyis rung bar byed pa 'dis skyes pa rnams la chos ston par byed do/_/de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang 
[\[202b.5\]]chos gos blangs nas spyod yul du zhugs te/_de khyim bdag gi khyim de dag tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /_de nas khyim bdag de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma chos bshad du gsol/_song la bud med dag grogs su khrid de shog 
[\[202b.6\]]shig_/khyim bdag des yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/bya gag mo 'di mo ma lags sam/_de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed la de lta bu'i chos ston pa de su yin/_de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcu gnyis sde dag 
[\[202b.7\]]go/_/des 'di skad ces des na kho mo cag la yang gnas skabs 'di byung ngo zhes smra ba na don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa na zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang bud med med par 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]skyes pa'i mdun du tshig lnga'am/_drug gi chos ston na rig pa'i bud med ma gtogs te ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/tshig lnga zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'o/_/tshig drug gis zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs 
[\[203a.2\]]pa'o/_/rig pa'i bud med ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i bud med bzhag ste'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_yang dge slong ma gang zhig ched du bsams te skyes pa la tshig lnga'i chos ston pa na tshig 
[\[203a.3\]]drug par thal bar byed na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du steng gi sar bshad nas zhes bya ba nas khyim du zhes bya ba'i bar te thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du ched du bsams te tshig drug gi chos ston pa na tshig bdun par thal bar byed na ltung byed do/_/
[\[203a.4\]]gal te dri ba 'dri na ltung ba med do/_/las dang po la sogs pa la yang ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed lnga pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe bcu gnyis sde rnams bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'i bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u 
[\[203a.5\]]dang /_bu mo la sogs pa la kha bstams te chos 'don du 'jug go/_/de nas dbyar khang de na dper na rtsis sa na rtsis kyi slob dpon rnams kyis bzhin du sgra mthon po dang /_sgra chen po byung ba na don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[203a.6\]]'das kyis zhes bya ba nas bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa rnams la kha bstams te chos 'don du 'jug na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/gang zag 
[\[203a.7\]]bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bya ba la/_bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni gnyis te/_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma'o/_/lhag ma rnams ni bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'o/_/kha bstams te zhes bya ba ni tshig mnyam pa dang /_tshig lhag pa dang /_yi ge mnyam pa dang /_
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]yi ge lhag par ro/_/de la tshig mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni ji srid du sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste zhes smra ba de srid du de yang sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste zhes smra ba ste/_'di ni tshig mnyam pa zhes bya'o/_/tshig lhag pa zhes bya ba ni ji srid du sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste 
[\[203b.2\]]zhes ma smras pa de srid du de dge ba phun sum tshogs par bya'o zhes smra ba ste/_'di ni tshig lhag pa zhes bya'o/_/yi ge mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni ji srid du a zhes smra ba de srid du de yang a zhes smra ba ste/_'di ni yi ge mnyam pa zhes bya'o/_/yi ge lhag pa zhes bya ba ni ji srid du 
[\[203b.3\]]a zhes ma smras pa de srid du de yang a zhes smra ba'o/_/chos 'don du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'am/_nyan thos kyis smras pa'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad 
[\[203b.4\]]gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la kha bstams te chos 'don du 'jug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te ldab ldib can dang /_smra myur ba dang /_dran par bya ba dang /_'dri ba gsol ba la sbyin pa la ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed drug pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[203b.5\]]gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ma spangs pa'i phyir dang /_mi shes pa'i phyir ltung ba dag byung zhing sngon gyi ltung ba dag 'chags par byed pas de rnams bkur sti bya ba spyod de/_de rnams nang par sngar langs shing sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 
[\[203b.6\]]'dun la bsnyen bkur byed/_chag chag dang /_phyag dar dang /_phyi bdar byed do/_/bcu gnyis sde de dag ni sems las chung ngur 'dug cing 'khod do/_/der yang khyim bdag lhags te de rnams kyis de dag mthong nas 'di snyam du dge slong ma rgan mo 'di dag 
[\[203b.7\]]ni rin po che shes shing rin po che sogs par byed do/_/bcu gnyis sde 'di dag ni rin po che mi shes shing rin po che sogs par mi byed do snyam sems so/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag gis khyim bdag las thos nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed 'di lta bu rin po che 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]sogs shig_/de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci'i phyir 'di dag sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la sogs pa la mchod pa'i don du brtson par byed/_de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/ltung ba 'di dang 'di dag byung ngo /_/
[\[204a.2\]]de dag gis thos nas gang la rgan mo rnams kyang 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su gyur na gzhon nu ma rnams la ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/_zhes yid la gcags par gyur to/_/bcu gnyis sde dag gis don de rtogs par byas nas de dag gis dge tshul gzhon nu ma rnams 
[\[204a.3\]]la dris pa/_khyed kyi mkhan mo dang /_slob dpon dag ci byed/_de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/bsod nams bgyid do/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod bsod nams 'di 'dra ba byos shig_/dge tshul ma de rnams 
[\[204a.4\]]kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/de ci lags/_de nas bcu gnyis sde dag gis de dag gi dge tshul ma rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci khyed kyi snying lam na khyed kyi mkhan mo dang /_slob dpon 'di dag 'di la chos bzang ngo zhes sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun 
[\[204a.5\]]la sogs pa la bsnyen bkur byed snyam mam/_de lta mod kyi ltung ba 'di dang 'di dag byung ngo /_/gang gi tshe dge slong ma de dag ltung ba de las langs par gyur pa de'i tshe de dag gi dge tshul gzhon nu ma de dag la dge tshul ma dag las dag gyis shig ces bsgo ba na/_de dag 
[\[204a.6\]]gis smras pa/_khyed cag ci'i phyir mi mdzad/_gnas brtan mo de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho mo cag gis mi rung ngo /_/dge tshul ma rnams kyis yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/kha cig rung na kha cig mi rung ngam/_dge slong ma de rnams kyis 'di 
[\[204a.7\]]skad ces smras so/_/khyed la sus smras/_de dag gis 'di skad ces bcu gnyis sde dag gis so zhes smras pa na don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]brjod par mi bya'o zhes de ltar dgag pa mdzad do/_/de nas dge slong ma drang mo zhes bya ba ci nas kyang skye bo'i tshogs chen po ma dad pa rig par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim rnams su spyod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[204b.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_khyim du so sor go bar byed pa'i dge slong ma bsko bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma chos lnga dang ldan pa khyim du so sor go bar byed pa bsko bar bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_
[\[204b.3\]]'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_so sor go bar bya ba dang /_so sor go bar ma byas pa'i khyim shes pa'o/_/bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams pa byas 
[\[204b.4\]]la zhes bya ba nas/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun phu nu mo dag bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma drang mo 'di gang gis na skye bo'i tshogs chen po ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim rnams su spyod par bgyid de/_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim 
[\[204b.5\]]rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par spro na/_gal te 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa 'di dge slong ma drang mo'i slad du khyim du so sor go bar bgyid 
[\[204b.6\]]par bsko bar bgyi ste/_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gang lags pas dge slong ma drang mo'i slad du khyim rnams su phu nu mo dag khyed cag dge slong ma drang mo sa bon tshig pa lta bu/_sa bon nyams pa lta bu 'dis bstan pa la tshod ma 'dzin cig_/'phags ma skye 
[\[204b.7\]]dgu'i bdag mo chen mos bstan pa'i tshad zung shig_/gau ta mI skem mo dang /_ut+pa la'i mdog dang /_chos sbyin dang /_'phags ma tshul ldan gyis tshad zung shig_/ces so sor go bar bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]bya ste/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun phu nu mo dag bdag la gsan du gsol zhes bya ba nas/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de nas dge slong ma 
[\[205a.2\]]drang mos khyod kyi phyir khyim du so sor go bar byed pa'i dge slong ma spro bar byas so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang dge slong ma drang mo khyim du so sor go bar byed pa'i dge slong ma gang na ba der song ste phyin nas dge slong ma de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/phu nu mo khyod 
[\[205a.3\]]dge 'dun gyis kho mo'i phyir khyim du so sor go bar byed pa bskos sam/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/de yin no/_/phu nu mo khyod kyis kho mo 'di ltar khyim rnams su ma dad pa mang du byas par yid ches sam/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/yid ches so/_/drang 
[\[205a.4\]]mos 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji ltar gcig la yid ches pa ltar cig shos la yang de dang 'dra bas kho mos khyod kyi lto dral la rgyu mas dbyar khang 'khor bar bskor ro/_/dge slong ma de skrag nas skabs de dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la rgyas par smras so/_/dge slong ma 
[\[205a.5\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma rnams kyis gsol ba 'ba' zhig pa bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol ba 'ba' zhig pa bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[205a.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas mal bshams pa byas nas zhes bya ba nas/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun phu nu mo dag bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma drang mo 'di ci nas kyang skye bo'i tshogs chen po ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim rnams su 
[\[205a.7\]]spyod par bgyid de/_gal te 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_gsol ba 'ba' zhig pa bgyis nas dge slong ma drang mo ji ltar snang ba dang /_gang du de snang ba de kho nar 'di 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]skad ces phu nu mo dag khyed dge slong ma sdig can sa bon tshig pa bzhin du skye ba'i mthu med pa 'dis bstan pa la tshod ma 'dzin cig_/de lta mod kyi dge slong ma gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gis bstan pa 'di la tshad zung shig ces bsgo bar bgyi ste 'di ni gsol ba'o/_/
[\[205b.2\]]de ltar gsol ba 'ba' zhig pa byas nas dge slong ma de rnams kyis gang du skye bo'i tshogs chen po yod pa der so sor go bar bya'o/_/gang du ma dad par byas pa der brjod par bya'i ltogs pa kho nas shi bar gyur na mi rung bas gzhan du ni brjod par mi bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[205b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa rnams la gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba brjod na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te ltung byed do/_/yang dge 
[\[205b.4\]]slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/brjod na zhes bya ba ni smra na'o/_/dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyis gnang ba bzhag ste'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas 
[\[205b.5\]]dge slong ma la mthar 'gyur ba'i ltung ba mthong la des ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i 'du shes kyis brjod na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du ma rig pa la yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma la mthar 'gyur ba'i ltung ba mthong ba la des rig pa la ma 
[\[205b.6\]]rig par 'du shes na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du rig pa la yid gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/ras la ri mor bris pa ltar ji ltar bdag gis shes pa de bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad kyis shes pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed bdun pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[205b.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mu ge mi bzad pa dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung ngo /_/de nas dge slong ma rab tu mang po ljongs shig tu dong ba dang /_bsod 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]snyoms kyis phongs par gyur to/_/de nas de rnams phan tshun du bgros pa/_ci'i phyir bdag cag gi yon tan bsgrags par mi bya/_de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci yang dag pas sam/_yang dag pa ma yin pas de dag gis 
[\[206a.2\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/yang dag pas so/_/de dag gis phan tshun du yon tan yang dag pas bsgrags pa byas pa dang /_'jig rten ni yon tan la dga' ba yin pas de rnams kyis de dag bsod snyoms kyis ma phongs par byas so/_/gang gi tshe dge slong ma de dag 
[\[206a.3\]]ljongs rgyu zhing dong nas yangs pa can du phyin no/_/de nas gnas pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong ma rnams kyis mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/sangs rgyas ldan/_chos ldan/_dge 'dun ldan dag 'ongs pa legs so/_/'ongs pa legs so/_/ji ga 
[\[206a.4\]]legs par spyad dam/_de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/legs par spyad do/_/tshe dang ldan ma dag bsod snyoms kyis phongs par ma gyur grang /_de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/ma gyur to/_/gnas brtan gnas brtan 'di dag ni bsod snyoms kyis 
[\[206a.5\]]phongs par gyur na khyod kyis thabs ci zhig byas na ma gyur/_de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/phan tshun yon tan bsgrags pa byas pas so/_/khyed mi'i chos bla ma brjod du rung ngam/_de dag gis 'di skad ces bdag cag gis brjod do zhes smras pa na don nyung ba'i 
[\[206a.6\]]dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la mi'i chos bla ma bden pa brjod na 
[\[206a.7\]]ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la zhes bya ba la bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni gnyis so/_/lhag ma rnams ni bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'o/_/bden pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag par yod pa'o/_/ltung byed do zhes 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na//_//bar sdom la/_mthong dang 'du shes dgon pa dang /_/khyim rnams su ni stan bkra dang /_/rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin byed dang /_/bdag nyid nye bar ston pa'o/_/dge slong mas 'du shes dang /_
[\[206b.2\]]bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces lha mthong ngo zhes zer la/_bden pa yin na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du gnod sbyin rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye 
[\[206b.3\]]chen po rnams dang /_grul bum rnams dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams dang /_sha za rnams dang /_srul po rnams kyang bden na ltung byed do/_/tha na phyag dar khrod kyi sha za yang bden na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du lha rnams la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o zhes bya ba nas 
[\[206b.4\]]lus srul po rnams la zhes bya ba'i bar te bden na ltung byed do/_/tha na phyag dar khrod kyi sha za yang bden na nyes byas so/_/kho mo'i drung du lha la sogs pa nye bar 'ong ba bden na ltung byed do/_/tha na phyag dar khrod kyi sha za yang bden na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du lha la 
[\[206b.5\]]sogs pa'i sgra thos pa bden na ltung byed do/_/tha na phyag dar khrod kyi sha za yang bden na nyes byas so/_/lha rnams dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_rnam par gtan la 'bebs par byed pa bden na ltung byed do/_/tha na phyag dar khrod kyi sha za yang bden na nyes 
[\[206b.6\]]byas so/_/de bzhin du lha yang kho mo dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_rnam par gtan la 'bebs par byed pa bden na ltung byed do/_/tha na phyag dar khrod kyi sha za yang bden na nyes byas so/_/dge slong mas 'du shes dang /_bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo 
[\[206b.7\]]gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces mi rtag pa'i 'du shes thob bo zhes zer la bden pa yin na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_zas la mi mthun 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]pa'i 'du shes dang 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang /_nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes dang /_spong ba'i 'du shes dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang /_'gog pa'i 'du shes dang /_'chi ba'i 'du 
[\[207a.2\]]shes dang /_mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par rul ba'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par zhigs pa'i 'du shes dang /_
[\[207a.3\]]rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /_rus pa'i 'du shes dang /_stong pa nyid du so sor rtogs pa'i 'du shes dang /_kho mos bsam gtan dang po dang /_gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa zhes bya ba nas/_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi bsam gtan kho mos thob 
[\[207a.4\]]bo zhes zer la bden na ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas 'du shes ma bsgyur ba zhes bya ba nas/_'di skad ces bya ba'i bar te/_dge slong ma rab tu mang po dgon pa na gnas na de dag las mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rnam par mi 'tshe na kho mo yang de na gnas na rnam par mi 
[\[207a.5\]]'tshe'o/_/zhes smras la bden na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du khyim rnams su stan bkra zhing bkra ba rnams la yang brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong mas 'du shes ma bsgyur bar zhes bya ba nas/_'di skad ces bya ba'i bar te/_dge slong ma gang gis rang gi mtshan nyid 
[\[207a.6\]]'dzin pa zhi gnas kyi mtshan ma la brten nas/_'jig rten pa'i yid la byed pas nyon mongs pa dag rnam par mnan pas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems la sogs pa kun du mi spyod pa de yod de zhes bya ba nas/_kho mos kyang zhes bya ba'i bar du 
[\[207a.7\]]zer na ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas 'du shes dang /_bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces dge slong ma lha mthong ba gang yin pa de yod do zhes smras kyis kho mos so zhes de skad ma smras na nyes byas so/_/
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]de bzhin du gnod sbyin rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /_grul bum rnams dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams dang /_sha za rnams dang /_lus srul po rnams bdag gis so zhes de skad ma smras 
[\[207b.2\]]na nyes byas so/_/tha na phyag dar khrod kyi sha za la yang bdag gis so zhes ma smras na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du rim pa 'dis sdom gyi tshig bcad 'di brjod par bya'o/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhig 'du shes ma bsgyur bar zhes bya ba nas/_'di skad ces bya ba'i bar te/_
[\[207b.3\]]dge slong ma rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa zhi gnas kyi mtshan ma la brten nas 'jig rten pa'i yid la byed pas nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par mnan nas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems la sogs pa kun du mi spyod pa gang yin pa de yod do zhes zer gyi kho mo yin 
[\[207b.4\]]no zhes de skad ma smras na nyes byas so/_/ltung byed brgyad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe chos sbyin pho nyas bsnyen par rdzogs pa thob cing bden pa rnams mthong ba de'i tshe de rang gi dbyar khang na dge slong ma rnams kyi chos dang ldan 
[\[207b.5\]]pa'i zhal ta byed pa la brtson par byed do/_/de dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can yin pas 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas sam/_chos sam/_dge 'dun nam/_dge slong ma bshes pa rnams la mi 'bul ba'am/_yongs su mi gtang ba ci yang 
[\[207b.6\]]med do/_/de de ltar phul zhing de ltar yongs su btang bas chos gos rnyings shing snam sbyar yang dengs par gyur to/_/de nas dge slong ma'i dge 'dun 'di snyam du dge slong ma chos sbyin 'di ni dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can yin pas bsam gtan dang /_
[\[207b.7\]]rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa spangs nas dge slong ma rnams kyi chos dang ldan pa'i zhal ta byed pa la brtson par byed la/_de mi 'bul ba'am/_yongs su mi gtang ba ci yang med do zhes bya ba nas/_snam sbyar dengs par gyur gyis zhes 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]bya ba'i bar ro/_/bdag cag gis ras yug chen zhig grub pa dang /_de bdag cag gis chos sbyin la sbyin no/_/snyam du sems so/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na ras yug chen zhig rnyed nas de rnams kyis chos sbyin la byin no/_/des skabs de bcom 
[\[208a.2\]]ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gsol ba byas te sbyin no/_/'di ltar byas te/_gnas mal bshams pa byas la zhes bya ba nas/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun phu nu mo dag bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma chos sbyin 
[\[208a.3\]]'di dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can lags pas 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas sam/_chos sam/_dge 'dun nam/_dge slong ma bshes pa rnams la mi 'bul ba'am/_yongs su mi gtang ba ci yang ma mchis so/_/de de ltar yongs su btang bas chos 
[\[208a.4\]]gos lnga rnyings shing snam sbyar yang dengs par gyur lags kyis/_gal te 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_'di ltar 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis chos sbyin la ras yug chen stsol bar mdzad 
[\[208a.5\]]do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/gang gi tshe de dag gis gsol ba byas te chos sbyin la ras yug chen byin pa de'i tshe sbom dga' mos bcu gnyis sde lhag ma rnams la/_kye phu nu mo dag gang du dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa bshes ngor sngo bar byed par dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi 
[\[208a.6\]]rnyed pa 'grub par ga la 'gyur zhes smras pa na don nyung ba'i dge slong ma rnams smod par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang sngar legs par rung bar byas nas de'i 'og 
[\[208a.7\]]tu dge slong ma rnams la 'di skad ces phu nu mo dag dge slong ma rnams kyis bshes ngor byas te dge 'dun gyi rnyed par bsngos pa gang zag gir sngo bar byed do zhes zer na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/sngar legs par rung bar byas 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]nas zhes bya ba ni blo gros mthun par byas pa'o/_/de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan na'o/_/'di skad ces zer na zhes bya ba ni smra na'o/_/dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos ma'i dge 'dun gyi'o/_/rnyed pa zhes bya ba la rnyed pa ni gnyis 
[\[208b.2\]]te/_zang zing gi rnyed pa dang /_gos kyi rnyed pa ste/_don 'di la ni gos kyi rnyed pa yin par dgongs so/_/bshes ngor zhes bya ba la gang gi bshes gang yin zhe na/_lhan cig gnas pa'i bshes pa ni mkhan mo yin la/_mkhan mo'i ni lhan cig gnas pa 
[\[208b.3\]]yin no/_/nye gnas kyi ni slob dpon yin la/_slob dpon gyi yang nye gnas yin no/_/'grogs bshes kyi yang 'grogs bshes yin no/_/smos 'drin gyi yang smos 'drin yin no/_/gnas gcig pa'i yang gnas gcig pa yin no/_/sngon zhes bya ba ni sgyur na'o/_/
[\[208b.4\]]gang zag la zhes bya ba ni gang zag la sbyin na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_de dge slong mas ji tsam du sngar legs par rung bar byas nas de'i 'og tu dge slong ma rnams la 'di skad ces dge slong mas bshes 
[\[208b.5\]]ngor dge 'dun gyi rnyed par bsngos pa gang zag gir sgyur bar byed do/_/zhes zer na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te bden pa kho na yin na ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed dgu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe dge slong ma 
[\[208b.6\]]bcu gnyis sde rnams so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa na 'di skad ces phu nu mo dag ji tsam gyis dge slong ma rnams 'gyod pa dang /_yid la gcags pa dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_gnod pa dang /_gdung bar 'gyur ba'i bslab pa'i gzhi phran tshegs rab tu phra ba gang 
[\[208b.7\]]la gzhi yang mngon la/_gang zag dang /_grong dang /_zhing yang mngon pa de dag zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa las bton pas ci zhig bya zhes smras pa na don nyung ba'i dge slong ma rnams smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa na 'di skad ces 'phags ma dag ji tsam dge slong ma rnams 'gyod pa 
[\[209a.2\]]dang /_yid la gcags pa dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_gnod pa dang /_gdung bar 'gyur ba'i bslab pa'i gzhi phran tshegs rab tu phra ba 'di dag zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa las bton pas ci zhig bya zhes zer na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma 
[\[209a.3\]]gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/zla ba phyed phyed cing zhes bya ba ni zla ba phyed phyed cing ngo /_/so sor thar pa zhes bya ba ni phas pham par 'gyur ba brgyad dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma nyi shu dang zhes bya ba nas/_ltung byed brgya brgyad bcu dang /_so sor bshags pa bya ba bcu 
[\[209a.4\]]gcig dang /_bslab pa mang po dang /_rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa bdun dang /_'dul ba gzhi bcu bdun dang /_phran tshegs dang /_sil bu dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_'dul ba ma mo dang /_'dul ba gcig las 'phros pa dang /_'dul ba lnga pa dang /_'dul ba bcu drug pa 
[\[209a.5\]]dang /_nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa las 'byung ba'o/_/mdo zhes bya ba ni legs par sbyar ba'o/_/gdon pa zhes bya ba ni rab tu ston pa'o/_/'di skad zer na zhes bya ba ni smra na'o/_/phu nu mo dag 'di dag ci dgos zhes bya ba ni gang la gang zag mngon zhing grong dang /_zhing 
[\[209a.6\]]dang /_gzhi yang mngon pa ji tsam gyi dge slong ma rnams 'gyod pa dang /_yid la gcags pa dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_gnod pa dang /_gdung ba'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung 
[\[209a.7\]]zad zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa na dge slong ma rnams la 'di skad ces phu nu mo ji tsam gyis dge slong ma rnams 'gyod par 'gyur ba'i bslab pa'i gzhi phran tshegs rab tu phra ba 'di dag ci dgos zhes bya ba'i bar du zer na ltung byed do/_/yid la 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]gcags pa dang /_yid mi bde ba zhes zer na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du gdung ba dang /_kun du gdung ba dang /_yongs su gdung ba dang /_de bzhin du bslab pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa'i mdo 'don pa na khyad du gsod na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du bslab pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa'i 
[\[209b.2\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'don pa na khyad du gsod na thams cad du nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/gal te nyams pa yin pa dang /_gal te dge slong ma'i dge 'dun na bar gyur na ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed dang po'i tshigs su bcad pa'i sdom rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sdom ni/_rnga zhing 
[\[209b.3\]]rngar 'jug 'phya ba dang /_/rna la gzon dang gnas mal dang /_/gding ba dag ni lnga pa yin/_/yang thog khri rtsa 'byung ba dang /_/rtswa dag dang ni khang chen dang /_/gnas gcig de bzhin 'khod pa'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon 
[\[209b.4\]]gyi shing mkhan byed byed pa'i dge slong las brten nas sa bon gyi tshogs dang /_'byung po'i gnas 'jig pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do/_/de'i tshe dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams rang gi lag gis rtswa sngon po rnga zhing rngar 'jug par byed pa dang /_de rnams la rang 
[\[209b.5\]]bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa/_phu nu mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di lta bu'i bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad kyis khyed rtswa sngon po ma gcod gcod du ma gzhug cig_/de nas bcu gnyis sde de rnams kyis dge slong ma de dag la 'di skad ces bslab 
[\[209b.6\]]pa'i gzhi 'di dge slong rnams kyi yin gyi/_dge slong ma rnams kyi ni ma yin no zhes smras pa dang /_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong

[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]zhes bya ba la sa bon ni lnga ste/_rtsa ba'i sa bon dang /_sdong bu'i sa bon dang /_thor to'i sa bon dang /_'gas pa'i sa bon dang /_sa bon gyi sa bon ni lnga pa'o/_/de la rtsa ba'i sa bon ni gla sgang dang /_shu dag dang /_yungs dang /_sge'u gsher dang /_bong

[\[211a\]]

[\[212a.1\]]so/_/'gas pa'i sa bon gyis rtsa ba'i sa bon la yang de bzhin sbyar ro/_/'gas pa'i sa bon gyis sdong bu'i sa bon la yang de bzhin sbyar ro/_/'gas pa'i sa bon gyis thor to'i sa bon la yang de bzhin sbyar ro/_/'gas pa'i sa bon gyis sa

[\[212a.3\]]shes nas gcod dam/_gcod du 'jug na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du yid gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/sa bon gyi sa bon gyis rtsa ba'i sa bon la yang de bzhin sbyar ro/_/sa bon gyi sa bon gyis sdong bu'i sa bon la yang de bzhin sbyar ro/_/sa bon gyi sa bon gyis 
[\[212a.4\]]thor to'i sa bon la yang de bzhin sbyar ro/_/sa bon gyi sa bon gyis 'gas pa'i sa bon la yang de bzhin sbyar ro//_//dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bcu bdun pa/_bar sdom la/_rtsa ba'i sa bon lnga dag dang /_/ljon shing rtswa gcod de 
[\[212a.5\]]bzhin du/_/'chag dar rtswa rgyun nya lcibs dang /_/chu dreg me tog rgyas pa'o/_/dge slong mas sa bon rnams nyams par gyur cig snyam pa'i bsam pas/_sa bon gyi rigs lnga gtun skyur blugs nas gtun mgos rdung zhing sa bon nyams par gyur cig_/rnam 
[\[212a.6\]]par nyams par gyur cig ces drag tu brdungs pa las sa bon nyams na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sa bon ma nyams shing sa bon rnam par ma nyams na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du me dang /_tha ba dang /_zhugs ling dang /_sla nga dang /_me thab dang /_me dong dang /_
[\[212a.7\]]me dong chen po dang /_sa dang /_thug pa dang /_khu tshan dang /_'bras khur ldugs pa dang /_de bzhin du sa bon nyams par gyur cig_/rab tu nyams par gyur cig ces mtsho chen po dang /_'bab chu chen po dang zhes bya ba nas chu nyung ngu dang /_lci ba dang /_tsha rgo dang /_
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]'gyur byed dang /_sa dang lhan cig bsres pa las de yang nyams na ltung byed do/_/ma nyams na nyes byas so zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/dge slong mas sbyor ba gcig gis shing ljon pa gcig gcod dam/_gcod du 'jug na nyes byas gcig dang /_ltung byed 
[\[212b.2\]]gcig go/_/de bzhin du sbyor ba gnyis kyis shing ljon pa gcig gcod na de la nyes byas gnyis dang /_ltung byed gcig go/_/de bzhin du sbyor ba mang pos shing ljon pa gcig gcod na de la nyes byas mang po dang /_ltung byed gcig go/_/dge slong mas sbyor ba

[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]slong mas shing ljon pa'i rtswa rgyun 'byin na nyes byas so/_/phyi shun 'chu na nyes byas so/_/phri 'chu na nyes byas so/_/nang shun 'chu na nyes byas so/_/snying po 'byin na ltung byed do/_/lo ma skya bo na nyes byas so/_/lo ma rlon na ltung byed do/_/me tog 
[\[213a.2\]]kha bye na nyes byas so/_/kha ma phye na ltung byed do/_/'bras bu smin na nyes byas so/_/'bras bu ma smin na ltung byed do/_/rtswa nyams par gyur cig_/rtswa rab tu nyams par gyur cig ces rtswa sngon po'i steng du 'chag par byed na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du khu tshan la sogs 
[\[213a.3\]]pa la yang ltung byed do/_/nyams par gyur cig_/rab tu nyams par gyur cig ces shing ngam/_yal ga 'dren na ltung byed do/_/'dren pa'i bsam pa dang /_'chag pa'i bsam pa yin na ltung ba med do/_/chu dreg nyams par gyur cig ces 'chag na nyes byas so/_/
[\[213a.4\]]khu tshan dang /_shing la sogs pa la yang ngo /_/'chag pa'i bsam pas yin na ltung ba med do/_/nya lcibs chu nas ji srid ma bton pa de srid du nyes byas so/_/bton na ltung byed do/_/rtsa ba med pa'i sa bon gyi khams 'byin na nyes byas so/_/nya tshang dang /_pha ba lgo lgo dang /_
[\[213a.5\]]sha mo 'byin na nyes byas so/_/bum pa'i 'dam skya bo 'phyi na nyes byas so/_/kha zas 'dam skya bo za na nyes byas so/_/gal te rung ba byas pa yin na ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed gnyis pa'i dang po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na'o/_/
[\[213a.6\]]gang gi tshe mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes kyis drug sde rnams kyi mdun du tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la 'phya bar byed pa na de bzhin du dge slong ma mdza' mo zhes bya ba yang bcu gnyis sde rnams kyi mdun du gyad bu nor la 'phya bar byed do/_/de nas dge slong ma gnas 
[\[213a.7\]]brtan gnas brtan dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/mdza' mo 'khor gyi gtso bo la ma 'phya zhig_/de la de skad du bsgo ba na 'on kyang 'phya bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]pa/_dge slong ma dag dge slong ma mdza' mo ngor 'phya ba'i grangs su chug shig_/grangs su gzhug pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams pa byas nas zhes bya ba nas/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun phu nu mo dag bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma 
[\[213b.2\]]mdza' mo 'di tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la ngor 'phya lags kyis/_gal te 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge slong ma mdza' mo ngor 'phya ba'i grangs su stsal to/_/'di ni gsol 
[\[213b.3\]]ba'o/_/de bzhin du las kyang brjod par bya'o/_/'on kyang gzhogs 'phyas kyis 'phya bar byed pa nas zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma dag dge slong ma mdza' mo gzhogs 'phyas byed pa'i grangs su chug shig ces bya 
[\[213b.4\]]ba'i bar te/_'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las kyang brjod par bya'o/_/phyi nas gzhogs 'phyas dang /_ngor 'phya ba gnyis ka byed na zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma mdza' mo gnyi gar 'phya ba'i grangs su chug shig ces bya 
[\[213b.5\]]ba'i bar te/_gsol ba dang /_las kyang brjod par bya'o/_/de de ltar bsgo yang 'phya bar byed pa na don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_zhes bya ba nas bslab 
[\[213b.6\]]pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_'phya'am gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed do/_/'phya'am zhes bya ba ni 'phya ba'i bsam pa can gyi gang ngag dang tshig dang /_brjod pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong ma grangs 
[\[213b.7\]]su bcug par gyur pas yang dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i dge slong ma bcu gnyis po sbyor ba ma btang ba rnams la 'phya na ltung byed do/_/gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed do/_/'phya ba dang gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed do/_/dge slong ma grangs su bcug par gyur 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]pas yang dge 'dun gyis ma bskos pa'i dge slong ma bcu gnyis po sbyor ba ma btang ba rnams la 'phya na ltung byed do/_/gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed do/_/'phya ba dang gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed do/_/dge slong ma grangs su bcug par 
[\[214a.2\]]gyur pas yang dge 'dun gyis ma bskos pa'i dge slong ma bcu gnyis po sbyor ba ma btang ba rnams la 'phya na ltung byed do/_/gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed do/_/'phya ba dang gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed do/_/dge slong ma grangs su bcug par gyur pas yang dge 'dun 
[\[214a.3\]]gyis ma bskos pa'i dge slong ma bcu gnyis po sbyor ba btang ba rnams la 'phya na ltung byed do/_/gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed do/_/'phya ba dang gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed do/_/dge slong ma grangs su bcug par ma gyur pas kyang dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i 
[\[214a.4\]]dge slong ma bcu gnyis sbyor ba ma btang ba rnams la 'phya na nyes byas so/_/gzhogs 'phyas byed na nyes byas so/_/'phya ba dang gzhogs 'phyas byed na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du mu gzhan gsum rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/ltung byed gnyis pa'i gnyis pa rdzogs 
[\[214a.5\]{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni kau shAm+bI na'o/_/de na dge slong ma 'dun ma la ltung ba byung ba dang /_de la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa don 'dod pa/_phan par 'dod pa/_bde bar 'dod pa/_reg par 'dod pa/_grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa rnams kyis smras pa/_phu nu 
[\[214a.6\]]mo khyod la ltung ba byung gis de shogs shig_/de dge slong ma de rnams kyi bsgo ba bcag pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma dag dge slong ma 'dun ma bsgo ba gcog pa'i 
[\[214a.7\]]grangs su chug shig grangs su gzhug pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams pa byas nas zhes bya ba nas/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun phu nu mo dag bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma 'dun ma 'di ltung ba byung nas de la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa don 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]'tshal ba/_sman par 'tshal ba/_bde bar 'tshal ba/_reg par 'tshal ba/_grub pa dang bde bar 'tshal ba rnams kyis smras pa/_'dun ma khyod la ltung ba byung gis de shogs shig ces bgyis na/_de dge slong ma de rnams kyi bsgo ba gcog par bgyid 
[\[214b.2\]]lags kyis/_gal te 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na 'di ltar 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge slong ma 'dun ma bsgo ba gcog pa'i grangs su stsal to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de kho na bzhin las kyang bya'o/_/de 
[\[214b.3\]]'di snyam du ma la bdag gis kha rog pa'am/_bdag gis ma smras par gyur na bdag grangs su bcug par mi 'gyur ba zhig ste/_'di ltar la las kyang /_skyes bu mkhas par ldan pa yis/_/ngag rnams bzhi po bsrung bya ste/_/nags kyi nang na gong ma sreg_/
[\[214b.4\]]sgra 'byin pas ni zin la ltos/_/zhes smras so snyam du bsams nas de cang mi smra bas dge slong ma rnams kyi bsgo ba gcog go zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnyi gas gcog pa'i grangs su gzhug par bya ste/_gsol ba dang las bya'o/_/de 
[\[214b.5\]]la bsgo ba na 'on kyang gcog par byed pa nas don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_
[\[214b.6\]]bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_bsgo ba gcog na ltung byed do/_/bsgo ba gcog pa zhes bya ba ni bsgo ba gcog pa'i bsam pa can gyi gang ngag dang /_tshig dang /_brjod pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la 
[\[214b.7\]]ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong ma dge slong ma'i drung du song nas 'di skad ces khyod kyi dge slong ma skra bregs nas ring po ma lon pa/_snam sbyar dmar ser can lhung bzed zha nye'i dbyar 'dab can/_mar gyis lhung bzed bkang ba'am/_sbrang rtsis lhung bzed bkang 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]ba'am/_'o mas lhung bzed bkang bas 'gro ba zhig mthong ngam/_zhes zer ba de la des 'di skad ces dge slong ma rkang gis 'gro ba zhig mthong ngo zhes zer te gzhan dris na lan gzhan ldon par byed cing bsgo ba gcog pa'i bsam pas yin na 
[\[215a.2\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma dge slong ma'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces khyod kyis dge slong ma skra bregs nas ring po ma lon pa/_snam sbyar dmar ser can lhung bzed zha nye'i dbyar 'dab can 'khar gsil lcags kyis dkris pas byung ba zhig mthong ngam zhes zer ba 
[\[215a.3\]]na zhes bya ba nas gzhan thams cad brjod de bsgo ba gcog pa'i bsam pas yin na ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong ma'i drung du song ste khyod kyis lam 'di nas khyim pa bu ram shing gi khur ram/_'dam bu'am/_smyig ma'am/_mda'i 
[\[215a.4\]]khur ram/_mar gyi bum pa'am/_'bru mar ram/_sbrang rtsi'am/_bu ram gyi dbu ba'i bum pas 'gro ba mthong ngam/_zhes zer ba na de 'di skad ces kho mos khyim pa rkang pas 'ong ba zhig mthong gi rgyu gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no zhes zer te/_gzhan dris na lan 
[\[215a.5\]]ldon par byed cing bsgo ba gcog pa'i bsam pas yin na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma dge slong ma'i drung du song nas 'di skad ces khyod kyis lam 'di nas khyim pa mo thams cad sngo ba'am/_thams cad ser ba'am/_thams cad dmar ba'am/_thams cad 
[\[215a.6\]]dkar ba bgos pas 'gro ba mthong ngam zhes 'dri ba na de 'di skad ces kho mos khyim pa mo rkang gis 'gro ba zhig mthong ngo zhes zer te/_gzhan dris na lan gzhan ldon par byed cing bsgo ba gcog pa'i bsam pas yin na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te gshed ma'i 
[\[215a.7\]]drung nas bros pa zhig gshed mas rjes thogs la de dge slong ma'i drung du song nas 'di skad ces 'phags ma khyod kyis lam 'di nas gsad pa zhig bros pa gzigs sam zhes dris na des de la gsod pa'i gshed ma la rigs pas brjod par bya ste/_gal te tsha ba'i dus 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]yin na bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]re zhig yud tsam zhig ngal so shig_/re zhig chu grang mo dag 'thung shig ces bsil yab dag gis g.yab par bya'o/_/gal te grang ba'i dus yin na/_'di skad ces bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]re zhig bsro gang du zhugs shig_/yud tsam zhig gnas 
[\[215b.2\]]dron por ngal so zhig ces brjod par bya'o/_/gal te gshed ma de 'di skad ces bdag [{]rings kyis [,]ring gis [}]thong shig ces zer na de la 'di skad ces nam mkha' la bltas te/_nam mkha' mthong ngo zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de bzhin du sen mo la bltas te sen mo mthong ngo zhes 
[\[215b.3\]]brjod par bya'o/_/gal te gshed ma zin po zhig ste/_'di skad ces bdag rnam pa 'di dag mi 'dri'o/_/bdag ni gsad pa 'dri'o zhes zer na dge slong ma des 'du byed thams cad stong pa nyid du lhag par mos par byas la cung zad kyang mthong ba med do zhes brjod 
[\[215b.4\]]par bya'o/_/dge slong ma dge slong ma'i drung du song ste de skad ces 'dri ba la gal te dge slong mas cang mi smra bas gcog na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te na ba'i sman khar bcug par gyur pa'am/_kha'i nad kyis thebs pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed gnyis 
[\[215b.5\]]pa'i gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis bla gab med pa'i gnas mal rab tu mang po gzigs nas bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa dang /_de na rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong 
[\[215b.6\]]ma gang dag yin pa de dag ni bslab pa'i gzhi de'i rjes su sgrub par byed do/_/de nas dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis bla gab med pa'i gnas mal rnams ma brtul bar mtshams kyi phyi rol du dong ngo /_/de nas dge slong ma gnas brtan gnas brtan de dag gis 
[\[215b.7\]]bcu gnyis sde de rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye phu nu mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi ma bcas sam/_de dag gis 'di skad ces bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de ni dge slong rnams kyi yin gyi/_dge slong ma rnams kyi ni ma yin no/_/
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]zhes smras pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de ni gnyi ga'i thun 
[\[216a.2\]]mong yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar bla gab med par gnas mal gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bca' ba mdzad pa dang /_de nas dus gzhan zhig na dge slong ma rnams don mthun dang lhan cig 'grogs te ri 'or zhig tu phyin pa dang /_de rnams kyis gtsug 
[\[216a.3\]]lag khang der gnas mal rnyed nas phyi de nyin par gnas mal gtong ba na don mthun dang yang bral nas/_de dag 'ba' zhig dong ba las chom rkun pa rnams kyis btogs pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[216a.4\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_bcol te 'dong bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te gtsug lag khang na gnas na dge slong la bcol bar bya'o/_/dbyar khang na gnas na dge slong ma la bcol bar bya'o/_/
[\[216a.5\]]de dag de rnams la 'chol ba na yang thogs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas mal bcol ba ni lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_gtsug lag khang 'de re zhes bya ba dang /_gtsug lag khang ltos shig ces bya ba dang /_gnas mal 'de re zhes bya 
[\[216a.6\]]ba dang /_gnas mal ltos shig ces bya ba dang /_sgo lcags gzhug pa nyid ni lnga pa yin te/_de ltar byas nas de'i 'og tu 'dong bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa'i bsngags pa 
[\[216a.7\]]brjod nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/yang dge slong ma gang shes bzhin du dge 'dun gyi khri'am/_khri'u'am/_stan nang tshangs can nam/_la ba'am/_sngas sam/_gor bu bting ba ma bsdus sam/_sdud du ma bcug gam/_dge slong ma yod pa la 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]ma bcol bar de'i 'og tu dong na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos ma'i dge 'dun gyi'o/_/gtsug lag khang zhes bya ba ni gang du spyod lam 
[\[216b.2\]]bzhi shong ba'o/_/khri zhes bya ba ni nyal ba'i'o/_/khri'u zhes bya ba ni 'dug pa'i'o/_/stan nang tshangs can zhes bya ba ni shing bal can no/_/la ba zhes bya ba ni la ba'o/_/sngas zhes bya ba ni sngas su gzhug pa'o/_/gor bu zhes bya ba ni gru bzhi'o/_/bla gab med 
[\[216b.3\]]par zhes bya ba ni bar snang ngo /_/bting ba zhes bya ba ni rang nyid kyis so/_/'ding du bcug pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan no/_/ma bsdus sam zhes bya ba ni rang gis so/_/sdud du ma bcug par zhes bya ba ni gzhan no/_/de'i 'og tu dong na zhes bya ba ni nyen kor spangs nas 
[\[216b.4\]]so/_/gnas mal gyi nyen kor gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'o/_/phan phun du gyur na ltung byed do/_/phan phun du ma gyur na nyes byas so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis 
[\[216b.5\]]zhus pa/_btsun pa gnas mal phan phun du 'gyur ba du mchis/_nye ba 'khor gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_char gyis phan phun du 'gyur ba dang /_rlung gis phan phun du 'gyur ba'o/_/char gyis phan phun du 'gyur ba gang zhe na/_nye ba 'khor gal te char 
[\[216b.6\]]gyi chus gnas mal rim pa gnyis brlan par gyur na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ma brlan na nyes byas te 'di ni char gyis phan phun du 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/_/gal te rlung gis rim pa gnyis bzlog par gyur na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ma bzlog na nyes byas so/_/gal te 
[\[216b.7\]]lam du zhugs pa na dran na des sems bskyed par bya zhing tshig tu yang bdag gis gnas 'di 'dra ba zhig tu gnas mal bzhag pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis brtul grang zhes brjod par bya la/_ltung ba de yang slar chos bzhin bya'o/_/lam du dge slong ma 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]mthong na tha na bta' bar bya zhing gar son yang tha na bta' bar bya la/_ltung ba de yang slar chos bzhin du bya'o/_/dge slong ma yod pa la ma bcol bar zhes bya ba ni de na yod pa'i dge slong ma gang yin pa'o/_/de lta bu ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni de'i srog gi bar 
[\[217a.2\]]chad du 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du dge 'dun gyi khri dang /_khri'u dang /_stan nang tshangs can dang zhes bya ba nas/_gnas mal bla 
[\[217a.3\]]gab med par bting ngam/_'ding du bcug pa ma bsdus sam/_sdud du ma bcug par song na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du gnas mal bla gab med par bting ngam/_'ding du bcug la/_gtsug lag khang du zhugs
