[\[217a.4\]]nas dran pa nye bar ma bzhag pa nye bar gzhag pa'am/_sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa mnyam par gzhag pa'am/_sems rnam par ma grol ba rnam par grol bar bya'o zhes nang du yang dag bzhag la thun dang po phyed khor na byung ba na phan phun du gyur na ltung byed do/_/
[\[217a.5\]]phan phun du ma gyur na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du thun dang po la byung ba na phan phun du gyur na ltung byed do/_/phan phun du ma gyur na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du thun dbu ma phyed khor na byung ba na phan phun du gyur na ltung byed do/_/phan phun du ma gyur na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin 
[\[217a.6\]]du thun dbu ma la byung ba na phan phun du gyur na ltung byed do/_/phan phun du ma gyur na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du thun tha ma phyed khor na byung ba na phan phun du gyur na ltung byed do/_/phan phun du ma gyur na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du thun tha ma la byung ba na phan phun du gyur na ltung 
[\[217a.7\]]byed do/_/phan phun du ma gyur na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du skya rengs shar ka'i dus kyi tshe byung ba na phan phun du gyur na ltung byed do/_/phan phun du ma gyur na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du skya rengs tha ma dang /_de bzhin du glang po che 'don pa'i dus kyi tshe dang /_de bzhin du 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]glang po che bton pa dang /_de bzhin du nam phan phun dang /_de bzhin du nam nangs pa dang /_de bzhin du nyi ma 'char ka'i dus kyi tshe dang /_de bzhin du nyi ma rtse dang /_de bzhin du dros bu chung dang /_de bzhin du dros chen dang /_de bzhin du phyed yol na byung ba na phan phun du 
[\[217b.2\]]gyur na ltung byed do/_/phan phun du ma gyur na nyes byas so/_/dge slong mas dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang zhes bya ba nas/_sems rnam par ma grol ba rnam par grol bar bya'o zhes nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir zhugs nas zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/dung 'bud pa 
[\[217b.3\]]gsum pa la byung nas zhes bya ba nas nyi ma nub ka na byung nas zhes bya ba'i bar te phan phun du gyur na ltung byed do/_/phan phun du ma gyur na nyes byas so//_//gzhung bla ma'i bsdus pa'i sdom ni/_chos mnyan pa dang de bzhin du/_/zan za ba dang de bzhin grong /_/gtsug 
[\[217b.4\]]lag khang du bcol ba dang /_/nad pa dang ni gnas mal dang /_/lnga la bcol bar mi bya dang /_/khri gcig la ni gnyis 'dug pa'o/_/de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po dge slong ma'i dbyar khang du lhags pa dang /_dge slong ma de rnams kyi lhan 
[\[217b.5\]]cig 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma dag 'du 'dzi'i gtam smra ba ni 'tsham pa ma yin no/_/de lta mod kyi chos shod cig_/de dag langs te gus shing mdun du 'dug nas chos 'chad par byed 
[\[217b.6\]]pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dug la chos bshad par bya ste/_khyim pa mo de rnams la yang stan bstab par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dug la chos bshad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de nas dge 
[\[217b.7\]]slong ma de rnams kyis gral [{]rings su [,]ring du [}]shom par byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stan rnam pa gnyis po zla gam lta bu'am/_gru bzhir gding bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa na de dag gis 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]gang gis bshad pa ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_spobs pa'i mthu dang ldan par gyur pa gang yin pa des bshad par bya'o/_/de nas rgan rims mthu dang ldan pa ma yin par gyur nas/_'og ma gzhon rims dag 'chad par 
[\[218a.2\]]byed pa na de dag rgan rims nas gzhon rims su dong nas nyan par byed pas rgan rims de dag mi brjed par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos smra ba'i seng ge'i khri bsham par bya zhing seng ge'i khri las smra bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[218a.3\]]seng ge'i khri las smra bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa de'i tshe mdo ring po dag rgyas par smra bar byed pa na khyim pa mo rnams skyo bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_cha gsum pa dang /_lnga pa nas cha gsum pa dang /_ston pa yongs su bsgrags pa la tshar bsrang 
[\[218a.4\]]ste smra bar gnang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag mo rnams zas dag g.yo bar byed pa na de rnams snod spyad dag rnyen par byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnyos shig_/stan dag rnyen par byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[218a.5\]]pa/_rnyos shig_/de nas de dag grong du mgron du 'bod nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_der yang dong la longs spyad par bya'o/_/de nas khyim bdag mo rnams kyis de dag la 'di skad ces 'phags ma dag khyed cag ci'i slad du chab snod dag snoms te ma 
[\[218a.6\]]byon zhes zer nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_der yang bum pa dang /_ril ba dang /_stan dang /_seng ge'i khri dag bkur bar bya'o/_/ji tsam na dge slong ma nad pa zhig yod pa des 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye phu nu mo dag 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[218a.7\]]de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci ste/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho mo nad pa la 'dri ba 'ga' yang med do zhes byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nad pa la blta bar bya'o/_/lta bar mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gang 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis nad pa la blta bar bya'o/_/zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de phyin chad gaN+DI brdungs te dge 'dun thams cad nad pa la blta ba'i phyir 'dong ba na/_de nas nad pas mthong nas gang gi phyir dge 'dun thams cad lhags pa las na/_bdag ni 'chi 
[\[218b.2\]]bar 'gyur gor ma chag go snyam nas skrag par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gcig gam/_gnyis 'gro bar bya'o/_/der dong ba na stan dag med nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nad 'dri ba'i ched du stan dag gding 
[\[218b.3\]]bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bting ba de'i tshe de dag 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das kyis bla gab med par gnas mal dor bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs so snyam du sems shing /_de de dag de nyid na srung zhing 'khod pa na de dag gi sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dang /_
[\[218b.4\]]mkhan po dang /_slob dpon gyi bya ba gang yin pa de des nyams par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bcol la 'dong bar bya'o/_/de dag nad pa la 'chol bar byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba nas/_rkyen lngas 
[\[218b.5\]]gnas mal bla gab med par bor te 'dong bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/lnga po de dag gang zhe na zhes bya ba nas rgas pa dang /_ngo tsha ba med pa dang /_bar chad dang bcas pa dang /_'gyod pa med pa dang /_bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar te/_de 
[\[218b.6\]]dag rkyen du byas nas dor bar mi bya'o/_/byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gnyis khri gcig la 'dug na gang gis khri brtul bar bya/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhon pas so/_/gnyis ka gzhon par gyur na gal te bzod na gcig 
[\[218b.7\]]gis so/_/ltung byed gnyis pa'i bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lho lam nas 'ongs pa'i dge slong zhig la brten nas rtswa'i gding ba'i bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de'i tshe rang bzhin du gnas 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]pa'i dge slong ma de rnams kyis ni thos nas rjes su sgrub par byed do/_/bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis ni rtswa'i gding ba dag bting zhing 'ding du bcug nas/_mi sdud cing sdud du ma bcug go/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde rnams la dge slong ma de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras 
[\[219a.2\]]so/_/kye phu nu mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba ma mdzad dam/_ci'i phyir rtswa'i gding ba dag mi rtul/_de dag gis 'di skad ces bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de ni dge slong rnams kyi yin gyi/_dge slong ma rnams kyi ni ma yin no zhes smras pa dang /_
[\[219a.3\]]don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_
[\[219a.4\]]yang dge slong ma gang dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du rtswa'i gding ba'am/_lo ma'i gding ba bting ngam/_'ding du bcug nas ma bsdus sam/_sdud du ma bcug gam/_dge slong ma yod pa la ma bcol bar de nas song na de lta bu'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed 
[\[219a.5\]]do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/rtswa'i gding ba zhes bya ba la/_rtswa zhes bya ba ni rtswa nyid do/_/lo ma zhes bya ba ni lo ma dag nyid do/_/bting ngam zhes bya ba ni rang nyid kyis so/_/'ding du bcug pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis so/_/ma bsdus 
[\[219a.6\]]sam zhes bya ba ni rang gis so/_/sdud du ma bcug gam zhes bya ba ni gzhan no/_/de nas song na zhes bya ba ni nyen kor spangs na'o/_/gding ba'i nyen kor gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu ste/_phan phun du gyur 
[\[219a.7\]]na ltung byed do/_/phan phun du ma gyur na nyes byas so/_/nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_gding ba la phan phun du gyur pa du mchis/_nye ba 'khor gnyis te/_rlung gis phan phun du gyur pa dang /_sril gyis phan phun du 'gyur ba'o/_/rlung gis phan phun du 'gyur 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]ba gang zhe na/_rlung gis gding ba rim gnyis bzlog par gyur pa ste ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ma bzlog na nyes byas te 'di ni rlung gis phan phun du gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/sril gyis phan phun du gyur pa gang zhe na/_gal te sril rnams kyis gding ba rim gnyis 
[\[219b.2\]]glongs par gyur pa ste glongs na ltung byed do/_/ma glongs na nyes byas so/_/lam du dong ba na dran na nyes byas zhes bya ba nas/_gnas mal la ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_
[\[219b.3\]]gang yang dge slong mas dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du rtswa'i gding ba'am/_lo ma'i gding ba bting ngam/_'ding du bcug nas ma bsdus sam/_sdud du ma bcug par de ji srid du nyen kor spangs na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/yang dge slong ma gang 
[\[219b.4\]]zhig dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du rtswa'i gding ba'am/_lo ma'i gding ba bla gab med par bting ngam/_'ding du bcug nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te dran pa nye bar ma bzhag pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa mnyam par gzhag 
[\[219b.5\]]pa dang /_sems rnam par ma grol ba rnam par grol bar bya'o zhes nang du yang dag par bzhag la thun dang po phyed khor na byung la phan phun du gyur na ltung byed do/_/phan phun du ma gyur na nyes byas so/_/nyi ma nub ka na zhes bya ba nas phan phun du gyur na ltung byed 
[\[219b.6\]]do/_/phan phun du ma gyur na nyes byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gnas mal la ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o/_/lam kar gnas mal bting ba la nyal ba de dag 'gyod par gyur pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_glong bar bya'o/_/glong 
[\[219b.7\]]bar mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyis dbyar khang du tshon rtsi'i las dag byed pa na dge slong ma rnams kyis rtswa dag bkram par gyur pa dang /_bslab pa 'dod pa de dag gis rtswa de dag bsdus nas dbyar khang gi phyi rol du bor ba dang /_gzhan 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]dag phongs par gyur pa nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te 'ga' zhig sems las chung bar gyis shig ces zer na mi dor ro/_/ltung byed gnyis pa'i lnga pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe 
[\[220a.2\]]sbom dga' mos dbyar gyi thal nas rgyu zhing song ba dang /_de nas dge slong ma gzhon nu rnams kyis mkhan mo dang slob dpon mo dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma dag bdag cag kyang rgyu zhing mchi lags so/_/de dag gis dris pa su dang lhan cig_/de 
[\[220a.3\]]rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma sbom dga' mo dang ngo /_/de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/ma 'deng shig_/ci'i slad du/_de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/sbom dga' mo ni gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa yin no/_/zhes de dag gis de 
[\[220a.4\]]ltar bzlog kyang de dang lhan cig rgyu zhing dong ste/_de dag rgyu zhing dong ba na ri 'or zhig tu phyin to/_/de nas gzhon nu de rnams kyis rtswa dag bslangs te gding ba bshams nas de dag nyal ba dang /_sbom dga' mos dbus su mchongs nas gnod par byas shing phul te go 
[\[220a.5\]]bshugs nas 'di skad ces su la gnod par 'gyur ba de dag 'dong bar 'gyur grang zhes smras so/_/de nas dge slong ma de rnams phyi de nyin par slar log pa dang /_de nas dge slong ma sbom dga' mos de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho mos khyed la nad kyi sman 
[\[220a.6\]]la sogs pa sbyar bar bya'o/_/zhes bya ba nas/_gzhon nu ma de dag gis skabs de mkhan mo dang /_slob dpon mo dag la rgyas par smras so/_/zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/
[\[220a.7\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang dge slong ma rnams snga nas 'khod par shes bzhin du de'i 'og tu 'ongs nas su la gnod par 'gyur ba de 'gro bar 'gyur ba de nyid rkyen du byas 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]te phyis gnon byas nas stan la 'dug par byed na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam gzhan gyis smras par gyur pa'o/_/snga nas 'khod par zhes bya ba ni snga nas 'dug par ro/_/
[\[220b.2\]]phyis gnon byas nas zhes bya ba ni 'phral du mthus so/_/stan la zhes bya ba ni gding ba la'o/_/'dug par byed na zhes bya ba ni 'dug par byed pa'am/_lus snyol bar byed pa'o/_/su la gnod par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni go mi 'tshugs pa gang yin pa'o/_/de 'gro 
[\[220b.3\]]bar 'gyur grang zhes bya ba ni de langs te 'gro ba'o/_/de nyid rkyen du byas te zhes bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'o/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad dge slong ma dag snga nas 'khod par shes bzhin du su la gnod par 'gyur ba de 'gro 
[\[220b.4\]]bar 'gyur grang zhes phyis gnon byas nas stan la 'dug par byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te nad pa yin na ltung ba med do/_/gal te skrag pa yin na ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed gnyis pa'i drug pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod 
[\[220b.5\]]na'o/_/de'i tshe sbom dga' mo 'khor dang bcas te ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na mnyan yod du phyin to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dge slong dang /_dge slong ma rnams gnas mal 'ged par byed pa 'di ni lugs yin pas de nas dge slong ma'i dbyar khang gi 
[\[220b.6\]]gnas mal 'ged pa na sbom dga' mo'i skal bar steng gi yang thog cig bab pa las de shes bzhin dang mi ldan par gnas mal de la 'dug ste/_de 'dug pa na khri'i rkang pas khang thog rdol bar byas te/_khri'i rkang pa ltung bas de'i 'og na dge slong ma zhig yod 
[\[220b.7\]]pa'i mgo bo brtol ba dang /_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang steng gi yang thog tu khri'am/_khri'u rtsa ba 'byung ba la ljid kyis mnan te nyal lam 'dug na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni 
[\[221a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos ma'i dge 'dun gyi'o/_/gtsug lag khang zhes bya ba ni gang du spyod lam bzhi shong ba'o/_/steng gi zhes bya ba ni khang thog gi steng ngo /_/yang thog ces bya ba ni gnas khang ngo /_/rtsa ba 'byung ba la zhes bya ba ni rkang pa 'byung ba'o/_/
[\[221a.3\]]'dug gam zhes bya ba ni 'dug par byed pa'o/_/nyal lam zhes bya ba ni lus snyol bar byed pa'o/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad steng gi khang thog gi yang thog tu khri'am/_khri'u'i rtsa ba 'byung ba la 'dug gam nyal na thams 
[\[221a.4\]]cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te so phag gis g.yogs pa'am/_spang leb kyis g.yogs pa'am/_dral bu'am/_shing leb bam/_shing leb chung ngus g.yogs pa'am/_zhal zhal byas pa'am/_rkang rten bcug pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed 
[\[221a.5\]]gnyis pa'i bdun pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe sbom dga' mo srog chags dang bcas pa'i chus rtswa la 'debs par byed sa dang lci ba la yang 'debs par byed nas/_de la dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa/_phu nu mo srog chags dang 
[\[221a.6\]]bcas pa'i chus rtswa'am lci ba la ma 'debs shig_/des 'di skad ces ci kho mo la bgrangs te gtad dam/_shar gyi rgya mtsho chen por 'dong na ci nyes/_lho dang nub kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'dong na ci nyes zhes smras pa dang /_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i 
[\[221a.7\]]skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang srog chags dang bcas pa'i chus rtswa'am/_lci ba'am/_sa la 'debs sam/_'debs su 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]'jug na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/srog chags dang bcas pa'i zhes bya ba la srog chags ni gnyis te/_gang dag mig lam du snang bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag chu tshags kyis zin par 'gyur ba'o/_/chus zhes bya ba 
[\[221b.2\]]ni chus rtswa'am/_sa'am/_'ji ba'am/_lci ba'am/_lud la'o/_/'debs sam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so/_/'debs su bcug na zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag go/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_srog 
[\[221b.3\]]chags dang bcas pa'i chu la srog chags dang bcas par 'du shes te 'debs sam/_'debs su 'jug na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas srog chags med pa'i chu la srog chags dang bcas par 'du shes nas 'debs sam/_'debs 
[\[221b.4\]]su 'jug na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du yid gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/dge slong mas yur ba 'dren par byed na der srog chags ji snyed shi ba de snyed kyi ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ji snyed ma shi ba de snyed kyi nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rgyun gcod par byed pa 
[\[221b.5\]]dang /_zhing gi dka' gcod pa dang /_'gog cing gtong ba ste/_thams cad du gzhi ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed gnyis pa'i brgyad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_gleng gzhi ni 
[\[221b.6\]]mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/_bsod nams dag ni bya ba ste/_/bsod nams ma byas sdug bsngal 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/_/bsod nams byas pa dga' bar 'gyur zhes bka' stsal pa de'i tshe/_dge slong ma de dag 
[\[221b.7\]]gis gnas khang dang /_ra ba dang /_sgo khang la sogs pa bya bar brtsams so/_/de nas sbom dga' mos bsams pa/_bdag gis 'di lta bu'i bsod nams kyi phung po las yongs su nyams so snyam du bsams nas snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]dang /_chos gos blangs te/_tshong dpon gyi chung ma zhig gi drung du song nas son pa dang 'di skad ces smras so/_/mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma nad med par gyur cig_/de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma des sbom dga' mo'i phyir stan bting ngo /_/de nas sbom dga' 
[\[222a.2\]]mo stan bting ba la 'dug go/_/'dug nas rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun gyi mdo rgyas par rnam par phye bas khyim bdag gi chung ma de dad par byas nas skabs 'byed du bcug go zhes bya ba nas des smras pa/_gtsug lag khang gi rgyu cung zad cig 
[\[222a.3\]]byin cig ces bya ba'i bar ro/_/de nas sbom dga' mos dbyar khang de la stor khung yang med/_chu khung yang med pa/_sbyang gi dbyibs lta bu zhig brtsig par brtsams pa dang /_de nas dge slong ma de rnams kyis sbom dga' mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags 
[\[222a.4\]]ma bcom ldan 'das kyi sgo khang dang /_gtan pa'i gnas ji srid par 'ji ba'i rim pa gnyis sam gsum brtsig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa ma yin nam/_des 'di skad ces dge slong rnams la bka' stsal gyi dge slong ma rnams la ni ma yin no/_/de lta mod kyi bu 
[\[222a.5\]]zan gyi bu mo dag_/kye kho mo sde snod gsum pa yin pas gtsug lag khang ci 'dra bar brtsigs par shes so zhes smras pa dang /_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma rnams smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis 
[\[222a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_dge slong mas gtsug lag khang chen po zhig rtsig tu 'jug na sgo khang dang /_gtan pa dang /_snang ba'i gnas ji tsam pa'i 
[\[222a.7\]]'du shes kyis sa brtag pa nas bzung ste 'ji ba'i rim pa gnyis sam gsum brtsig par bya'o/_/de las lhag par rtsig na ltung byed do/_/chen po zhes bya ba la chen po ni gnyis te/_sbyin par bya ba las dang /_tshad las te/_don 'di la ni sbyin par bya ba las yin par 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]dgongs so/_/gtsug lag khang zhes bya ba ni gang du spyod lam bzhi shong ba'o/_/rtsig tu 'jug na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid dam gzhan no/_/sgo khang dang /_gtan pa'i gnas zhes bya ba ni sgo khang dang /_skar khung gi 'du shes dang /_chu khung gi 'du shes so/_/'ji 
[\[222b.2\]]ba'i rim pa gnyis sam gsum zhes bya la/_'ji ba zhes bya ba ni 'jim pa'o/_/rim pa zhes bya ba ni rtseg ma'o/_/brtsig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bslang bar bya ba'o/_/de las lhag par zhes bya ba ni de las gong du'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de 
[\[222b.3\]]la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad 'ji ba'i rim pa gnyis sam gsum las lhag par rtsig na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te gtsug lag khang rdo ba'i rgyu las rtsig gam/_gtsug lag khang gi bdag po [{]rings [,]ring [}]na ltung ba med do/_/
[\[222b.4\]]ltung byed gnyis pa'i dgu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gcer bu pa'i 'dug gnas su 'dug nas khyim bdag chung ma dang /_'khor dang bcas pa rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bzhag go/_/de 
[\[222b.5\]]nyid la rab tu brten nas srog chags khri nyis stong bden pa mthong bar byas pa na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu las brten te legs par brtags nas bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de'i tshe bcu gnyis sde rnams 'dug gnas gcig tu nyal bar byed/_'dug gnas 
[\[222b.6\]]gcig tu zos nas bsod snyoms phyi ma shos kyang za bar byed pa dang /_rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong ma rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye phu nu mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dug gnas kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba ma mdzad dam/_de dag gis 'di skad 
[\[222b.7\]]ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bcas pa de ni dge slong rnams kyi yin gyi/_dge slong ma rnams kyi ma yin no zhes smras pa dang /_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma rnams smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad do/_/dge slong ma gang mi na bar 'dug gnas gcig na 'dug pas bsod snyoms lan gcig bza' bar bya ste/_de las 
[\[223a.2\]]lhag par za na ltung byed do/_/'dug gnas gcig tu nyal na zhes bya ba ni mu stegs can gyi gnas su nyal na'o/_/dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/mi na bar zhes bya ba ni na ba ma gtogs pa'o/_/bsod snyoms lan gcig bza' bar bya ste zhes 
[\[223a.3\]]bya ba ni phyi ma shos ma yin pa'o/_/de las lhag par zhes bya ba ni de las 'das par ro/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad 'dug gnas su gnas sam/_'dug gnas su za ba na gnas 
[\[223a.4\]]pa na de la nyes byas so/_/za na ltung byed do/_/'dug gnas su gnas shing gzhan du za na 'dug gnas su gnas pa na de la nyes byas so/_/gzhan du za na ltung ba med do/_/'dug gnas su za la gzhan du gnas par byed na 'dug gnas su za bar byed na de la ltung 
[\[223a.5\]]byed do/_/gzhan du gnas par byed pa la ltung ba med do/_/gzhan du gnas par byed cing gzhan du za na gnyi ga la ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed gnyis pa'i bcu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sdom ni/_khur ba 'dus dang dus min dang /_/sogs 'jog ma byin lnga pa 
[\[223a.6\]]yin/_/srog chags bcas pa dag dang ni/_/nyal po byed par shom pa gnyis/_/gcer bu dmag la zhag gnyis lhag_/tshogs la lta bar byed pa'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag cig gis rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de chung 
[\[223a.7\]]ma de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/_ji tsam na bu mo g.yas zhar ma zhig btsas te zhes bya ba nas/_chung ma gsod pa zhes bya bas bslangs te zhag dus btab bo zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/ji tsam na de'i ched du 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]phal mo che dag sta gon byed do/_/ji tsam na khyim der dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs nas de gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma bsod snyoms byin cig_/des 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag glo ba brel ba zhig mchis so/_/
[\[223b.2\]]de gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod ci zhig brel/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/g.yas zhar ma rdzong ba la bab lags so/_/de gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/de ring kho bo cag gi sring mo rdzong na kho bo cag gis de ring kho na bsod snyoms mi rnyed dam/_de 
[\[223b.3\]]dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis bsod snyoms mang du byin no/_/de gnyis kyis bsod snyoms blangs nas dong ngo /_/de'i 'og tu sbom dga' mo dang /_gtsug dga' mo 'ongs nas de gnyis kyis kyang bsod snyoms blangs te dong ngo /_/ji tsam na 
[\[223b.4\]]rgyal dang /_nye rgyal gyis sbom dga' mo dang /_gtsug dga' mo lag pa gang zhing lhung bzed gang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/phu nu mo dag g.yas zhar ma de ring rdzong ba la bab kyis deng shig_/de nas rgyal dang /_nye rgyal yang bsod 
[\[223b.5\]]snyoms kyi phyir de nyid du dong ngo /_/de bzhin du rgyal grogs ma dang /_rgyal skyong ma dang /_de bzhin du bzang mo dang /_shin tu bzang mo dang /_de bzhin du mdzes dga' mo dang /_rgyal ldan ma yang dong nas khyim de na g.yas zhar ma rdzong ba'i ched du sta gon byas pa 
[\[223b.6\]]cung zad ci yod pa de thams cad bcu gnyis sde rnams la byin no/_/ji tsam na yang sta gon bya bar brtsams pa dang /_de nas chung ma gsod pa de'i ne'u zla zhig yod pa des smras pa/_g.yas zhar ma ni skyon mang po can yin te/_rgya skyegs shing gi so shing dang /_
[\[223b.7\]]nub tu sngas bstan nyal ba dang /_/dgongs ka'i zho 'thung g.yas zhar len/_/zhi ba yang ni gnas nas 'pho/_/zhes smras te/_de ltar g.yas zhar ma de len pa'i bar chad byas par gyur to/_/bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams dge sbyong gi shAkya'i 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]sras rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul dang /_tshangs pa'i tshul ni tshig pa yin te/_gang gi phyir bu mo len pa'i bar chad byed do zhes smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung 
[\[224a.2\]]ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma rab tu mang po khyim rnams su dong ba na de dag la gal te bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can rnams skyo ma'am/_snum khur dag gis shin tu stobs par byed la/_'dod na dge slong 
[\[224a.3\]]ma des lhung bzed do'am/_gsum blang bar bya'o/_/de las lhag par len na ltung byed do/_/lhung bzed do'am/_gsum blangs nas khyim gyi phyi rol kun dga'i ra bar song la dge slong ma 'khod pa rnams dang bgo bar bya ste/_de la cho ga ni de yin no/_/yang dge 
[\[224a.4\]]slong ma zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/khyim rnams su dong ba na zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su'o/_/de dag la gal te bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag ces bya ba la/_dad pa can zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas la mngon par dad 
[\[224a.5\]]pa dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa zhes bya ba nas/_'bras bu thob pa zhes bya ba'i bar gang yin pa'o/_/shin tu zhes bya ba ni chog par ro/_/stobs par byed na zhes bya ba ni mgron du gnyer na'o/_/skyo ma zhes bya ba ni phye'i'o/_/snum khur 
[\[224a.6\]]zhes bya ba ni khur ba'o/_/'dod na zhes bya ba ni don du gnyer na'o/_/do'am gsum zhes bya ba la do zhes bya ba ni chen po'i'o/_/gsum zhes bya ba ni chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_chen po'i'o/_/de la chen po ni yul ma ga d+hA'i bre'u chung gang ngo /_/chung ngu ni bre'u 
[\[224a.7\]]chung phyed do/_/de'i bar ma ni bar ma'o/_/blangs nas khyim gyi phyi rol kun dga' ra bar song nas gtsug lag khang na dge slong ma 'khod pa rnams dang bgo bar bya ste zhes bya ba ni de na yod pa'i dge slong ma dag dang ngo /_/de las lhag par zhes bya ba ni de las 'das par ro/_/
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas lhung bzed chen po gsum blangs na ltung byed do/_/chen po gnyis dang /_bar ma gcig blangs na ltung byed do/_/bar ma gnyis dang /_chen po gcig len na ltung 
[\[224b.2\]]byed do/_/dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad bre'u chung do las lhag par len na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed gsum pa'i dang po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha sbyin las brten te tshogs 
[\[224b.3\]]shing za ba bkag pa dang /_de nas dge slong ma de dag gis gnyi ga'i thun mong yin no zhes rjes su sgrub par byed do/_/de nas phyis na ba dag tu gyur te zas gcig gis 'tsho bar ma nus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_na ba dus yin no zhes byas te 
[\[224b.4\]]bza' bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du lam du zhugs pa bkres nas dge ba'i phyogs byed mi nus par gyur nas zhes bya ba nas/_bza' bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de bzhin du las byed pa dang /_de bzhin du grur zhugs pas kyang bza' bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du 
[\[224b.5\]]mang po 'dus pa'i dus su rnyed pa byung ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bza' bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du kun du rgyu'am/_kun du rgyu mo sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed pa de las kyang bza' bar bya ste/_dge slong ma dag kun du rgyu sangs 
[\[224b.6\]]rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed pa ni dkon pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dus ma 
[\[224b.7\]]gtogs te 'dus shing za na ltung byed do/_/de la dus ni 'di yin te/_na ba dus dang las dus dang /_lam dus dang /_grur zhugs pa dang /_'dus pa chen po dang /_dge sbyong gi zas dus so/_/'dus shing za ba zhes bya ba ni mi mthun zhing za ba'o/_/dus ma 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]gtogs te zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar yang na ba dag tu gyur la/_zas gcig gis 'tsho bar mi nus pa lta bu'o/_/lam dus zhes bya ba ni lam du zhugs pa la sbyin bdag gis byin pa'o/_/grur zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni grur 'jug pa na sbyin bdag gis 
[\[225a.2\]]bsod snyoms byin pa'o/_/'dus pa chen po zhes bya ba ni mang po 'dus pa'i zas so/_/dge sbyong gi zas dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di las phyi rol pa'i rab tu byung ba la dge sbyong zhes bya'o/_/de la dus ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba ni de la de ni mthun pa'i chos yin pa'o/_/de la 
[\[225a.3\]]ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong ma mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes pas 'dus shing zas za na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/dge slong ma mtshams kyi phyi rol la mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes pas 'dus shing zas za na nyes byas 
[\[225a.4\]]so/_/yid gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/dge slong ma'i dbyar khang gi khyams dag yod la/_gal te dge slong ma kha cig dbyar khang du za la/_kha cig khyams dag tu za na/_de la ni g.yar khang na za ba gang yin pa de dag gis ji ga kha zas kyis bsrul tam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/
[\[225a.5\]]ma dris par za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/khyams rnams la ni nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gnas khang dang /_sgo khang la sogs pa la yang brjod par bya'o/_/gal te kha zas kyis bsrul na chung ngu na ril ba'i chu'am/_lan tshwa kha gzar gang tsam 
[\[225a.6\]]yang bsrul na ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed gsum pa'i gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bcu bdun sde rnams las brten te dus ma yin pa'i zas kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de'i tshe bcu 
[\[225a.7\]]gnyis sde rnams dus su yang za bar byed/_dus ma yin par yang za bar byed pa dang /_dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ma yin pa'i zas kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba ma mdzad dam/_de dag gis 'di skad ces dge slong rnams la bca' 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]ba mdzad kyi dge slong ma rnams la ni ma yin no zhes smras pa dang /_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma rnams smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_
[\[225b.2\]]yang dge slong ma gang dus ma yin par bza' ba dang /_bca' ba 'chos sam zos na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/dus ma yin pa zhes bya ba la dus ma yin pa ni gnyis te/_dus ma yin pa phyed yol ba dang /_dus ma yin pa 
[\[225b.3\]]skya rengs ma shar ba'o/_/bca' ba dang /_bza' ba zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga dang /_bza' ba lnga po dag go/_/'chos sam/_zos na zhes bya ba ni lkog mar mid na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas 
[\[225b.4\]]dus ma yin pa la dus ma yin par 'du shes nas 'chos sam/_zos na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas dus la dus ma yin par 'du shes nas 'chos sam/_zos na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du yid gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/
[\[225b.5\]]ltung byed gsum pa'i gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis nag po 'char ka las brten te gsog 'jog byas pa'i zas kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de'i tshe bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis bsod snyoms 
[\[225b.6\]]la brgyus nas 'bras chan skam po yang logs shig tu len par byed/_'bras chan gsher ba yang logs shig tu len par byed cing /_ji snyed longs spyad pa'i lhag ma de dag skems par byed de/_de dag bskams nas 'jog par byed do/_/gang gi tshe rlung 
[\[225b.7\]]langs par gyur pa'am/_yul ngan byung ba de'i tshe de dag chus sbangs nas mes btsos te longs spyod par byed pa dang /_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang gsog 'jog byas pa'i bca' ba dang /_bza' ba 'chos sam/_zos na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/gsog 
[\[226a.2\]]'jog byas pa zhes bya ba la/_gsog 'jog byas pa ni gnyis te/_snga ma'i zas byin len byas shing phyi ma'i zas gsog 'jog byas pa'am/_phyi ma'i zas byin len byed cing dus tshod las 'das par gsog 'jog byas pa'o/_/bca' ba dang /_bza' ba zhes 
[\[226a.3\]]bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas gsog 'jog byas pa la gsog 'jog byas par 'du shes na ltung byed do/_/gsog 'jog ma byas pa la gsog 'jog byas par 'du shes na 
[\[226a.4\]]nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du yid gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/gos kyi gsog 'jog byed na ltung byed do/_/lhung bzed kyi gsog 'jog byed na ltung byed do/_/bya ma bum gsog 'jog byed na ltung byed do/_/sgo lcags gsog 'jog byed na nyes byas so/_/lde mig 
[\[226a.5\]]kyog po gsog 'jog byed na nyes byas so/_/sgo lcags gze ma gsog 'jog byed na nyes byas so/_/ltung byed gsum pa'i bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dur khrod thams cad pa'i dge slong nag po 
[\[226a.6\]]chen po la brten nas byin len bya ba'i bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de'i tshe dge slong ma de dag gis byin len ji lta bu yin pa dang /_byin len du yod pa ma shes par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[226a.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byin len ni lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_lus kyis lus dang 'brel pa dang /_lus la lus kyis dang /_lus dang 'brel pa la lus dang 'brel pa dang /_lus la lus kyis 'brel pa dang /_gzhag pa'i cho ga nyid ni lnga pa yin no/_/smad 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]pa zhes bya ba'i yul yod de/_de dag ma la yang nyal bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba nas/_der sa la dkyil 'khor byas te byin len bya'o/_/'bras bu dag rnyed na de dag gis ji ltar byin len bya ba ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byin len 
[\[226b.2\]]ni lnga ste/_gzhong pa dang /_khri dang /_khri'u dang /_thu ba dang /_lhung bzed kyi snod de lag pas reg pas byin len bya'o/_/byin len byas pa de dag 'dril na gal te ma langs par zin na de nyid byin len byas pa yin no/_/gal te rgyang ring por gyur na yang byin 
[\[226b.3\]]len bya'o/_/de dag rung bar byin len bya'o/_/de dag rung bar bya dgos na rung ba du yod pa ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rung ba ni lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_mes rung ba dang /_mtshon gyis rung ba dang /_ne tsos rung ba dang /_sen mos 
[\[226b.4\]]rung ba dang /_rnyis pas rung ba nyid ni lnga pa'o/_/yang rung ba ni lnga ste/_phyung ba dang /_gshegs pa dang /_bcad pa dang /_phug pa dang /_sa bon gyi chos med pa ni lnga pa ste/_sngon po la yang de nyid kyis rung bar byas pa yin no/_/phyis de dag la bram ze dang /_
[\[226b.5\]]khyim bdag rnams 'brim par 'dod pa na ma byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbyin par bya'o/_/dge slong ma dag lam du zhugs nas dgon pa'i gnas zhig tu 'khod pa na nags kyi seng ge dang /_spre'u dang /_dom la sogs pa las byin len byas te/_
[\[226b.6\]]gang dag la 'dzin pa mngon pa/_de dag las byin len yang mngon no/_/de dag lam du zhugs pa na chu dang so shing gis phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras so/_/dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_
[\[226b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chu dang so shing ma gtogs so zhes rjes su gnang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]brjod nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/yang dge slong ma gang chu dang so shing ma gtogs te ma byin par kha'i sgo nas mid pa'i zas za na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa dag go/_/ma byin par zhes bya ba ni de la sus kyang ma 
[\[227a.2\]]byin par gyur pa'o/_/kha'i sgo nas zhes bya ba ni khar za ba'o/_/bca' ba zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/_/chu dang so shing ma gtogs par zhes bya ba ni chu dang so shing bzhag ste'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong 
[\[227a.3\]]mas byin len ma byas pa la byin len byas par 'du shes nas 'chos sam zos na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas byin len byas pa la byin len ma byas par 'du shes nas zos sam 'chos na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du 
[\[227a.4\]]yid gnyis za na nyes byas so//_//bar sdom la/_byin len lnga dang 'bras bu dang /_/de bzhin rung ba lnga dang ni/_/seng ge spre'u dom dag gi/_/de bzhin gshegs pas rjes gnang ste/_/bar gyi sdom du bsdus pa yin/_/ltung byed gsum pa'i lnga pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[227a.5\]]gleng gzhi ni kau shAm+bI na'o/_/de'i tshe rgyal dang nye rgyal srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod pa dang /_dge slong ma de rnams kyis smras pa/_phu nu mo dag srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod par ma byed cig_/de dag gis 'di skad ces ci kho mo cag la bgrangs te gtad 
[\[227a.6\]]dam/_shar gyi rgya mtsho chen por dong na ci nyes/_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang gi rgya mtsho chen por dong na ci nyes zhes smras pa dang /_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma rnams smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 
[\[227a.7\]]'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni rgyal dang /_nye rgyal lo/_/srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu zhes bya ba la/_
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]srog chags ni gnyis te/_gang dag mig lam du snang ba dang /_gang dag chu tshags kyis zin par 'gyur ba'o/_/spyod na zhes bya ba la spyod pa ni gnyis te/_nang dang phyi'i'o/_/phyi'i ni khrus byed pa dang /_chag chag dang /_gos la sogs pa'i bkru bshal dang /_sre ba dang /_'tshod 
[\[227b.2\]]par byed pa dang /_byed du 'jug pa ste/_'di ni phyi'i spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/so shing bca' ba dang /_btung ba yang ngo /_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la srog chags dang bcas pa'i 
[\[227b.3\]]chur 'du shes nas gnyis po gang yang rung bar spyod na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du yid gnyis za na ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas srog chags med pa'i chu la srog chags dang bcas par 'du shes nas gnyis po gang yang rung bar spyod par byed na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du yid 
[\[227b.4\]]gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_'bras bu la sogs pa la yang brjod par bya'o/_/ltung byed gsum pa'i drug pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe spos 'tshong gi khye'u chung 
[\[227b.5\]]ma blangs nas ring por ma lon pa zhig yod pa de nub mo bsrung ba'i phyir tshong khang du 'dug nas/_de nang bar gyi dus su tshong khang gi sgo bcad de khyim du chas pa de sbom dga' mo spyod yul du zhugs pas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang e ma'o khye'u de ni 'dod chags kyi sems kyis 
[\[227b.6\]]khyim du song ngo snyam du rig nas de nas de rings par song ste tshong pa'i khye'u de'i khyim du zhugs te/_stan la 'dug nas bsdad do/_/de nas tshong pa'i khye'u de khyim du 'ongs nas chung ma la blta bar brtsams pa dang /_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/rje'i sras 'phags ma 
[\[227b.7\]]sdod cing bzhugs so/_/de nas khye'u des sbom dga' mo mthong nas shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong ma rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul dang /_tshangs pa'i tshul tshig pa yin te/_gang gi phyir 'di ltar rang gi chung ma dang lhan cig dben pa na 'dug pa'i skabs kyang mi rnyed do 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]zhes 'phya bar byed pa dang /_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma 
[\[228a.2\]]gang shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du phyis gnon byas te stan la 'dug par byed na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/nyal po byed par shom pa'i zhes bya ba ni bud med ni skyes pa'i nyal po bya ba yin no/_/khyim du zhes 
[\[228a.3\]]bya ba ni khyim bdag rnams kyi khyim du'o/_/phyis gnon byas te zhes bya ba ni 'phral la'o/_/'dug par byed na zhes bya ba ni 'dug par byed na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ci tsam cung zad nyal po byed 
[\[228a.4\]]par shom pa'i khyim rnams su mthus mnan te stan la 'dug par byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed gsum pa'i bdun pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mo snga dro sham thabs bgos chos gos dang lhung bzed 
[\[228a.5\]]thogs te spyod yul du zhugs pa dang /_sbom dga' mos yang spos 'tshong gi khye'u de khyim du 'gro ba mthong ngo /_/de nas sbom dga' mos bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dug pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad kyis ma la bdag gis sgo rgyab tu 'greng la bsdad 
[\[228a.6\]]do snyam pa nas spos 'tshong gi khye'u yis mthong ste smod par byed pa nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du dben pa skyabs yod pa na 'greng na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya 
[\[228a.7\]]ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rang nyid kyis sam/_gzhan gyis smras par gyur pa'o/_/gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du dben pa skyabs yod 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]pa na 'greng na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te skrag par gyur pa'am/_bar chad yod pa yin na ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed gsum pa'i brgyad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo 
[\[228b.2\]]la brten nas gcer bu pa dang /_gcer bu ma'i bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de'i tshe bcu gnyis sde rnams rang gi lag gis bza' ba dang /_bca' ba gcer bu pa dang /_gcer bu ma rnams la sbyin par byed pa dang /_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma rnams smod par 
[\[228b.3\]]byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang rang gi lag gis bza' ba dang /_bca' ba gcer bu pa'am/_gcer bu ma 'am/_kun du 
[\[228b.4\]]rgyu 'am/_kun du rgyu mo la sbyin par byed na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/gcer bu pa zhes bya ba ni gos med pa'o/_/gcer bu ma zhes bya ba yang gos med pa'o/_/de bzhin du kun du rgyu zhes bya ba ni grangs can no/_/
[\[228b.5\]]kun du rgyu mo yang de bzhin no/_/rang gi lag gis zhes bya ba ni lag pas lag par ro/_/bza' ba dang bca' ba zhes bya ba nas/_ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad rang gi lag 
[\[228b.6\]]gis bza' ba dang /_bca' ba gcer bu pa'am zhes bya ba nas/_kun du rgyu mo'i bar la sbyin par byed na ltung byed do/_/gal te pha dang ma yin na ltung ba med do/_/gal te lta bar song ba zhig dbral bar 'dod na ltung ba med do/_/gal te slong na de la 'di skad 
[\[228b.7\]]ces slong phor sa la zhog cig ces brjod par bya'o/_/gal te bzhag na sbyin par bya'o/_/'on te ma bzhag na sbyin par mi bya'o/_/ltung byed gsum pa'i dgu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde rnams 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]la brten nas dmag shom pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa dang /_de nas bcu gnyis sde de dag dmag shom pa la blta ba'i phyir dong ba dang zhes bya ba nas/_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/
[\[229a.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang dmag shom pa la blta ba'i phyir 'gro bar byed na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/shom pa zhes bya ba ni 
[\[229a.3\]]dmag la mngon par dga' ba'o/_/dmag ces bya ba la dmag ni bzhi ste/_dmag yan lag gcig pa yang yod/_dmag yan lag gnyis pa dang /_yan lag gsum pa dang /_yan lag bzhi pa yang yod do/_/dmag yan lag gcig pa ni glang po che pa'i'o/_/
[\[229a.4\]]yan lag gnyis pa ni glang po che pa dang rta pa'i'o/_/yan lag gsum pa ni glang po che pa dang /_rta pa dang /_shing rta pa'i'o/_/yan lag bzhi pa ni glang po che pa dang /_rta pa dang /_shing rta pa dang /_dpung bu chung gi dmag go/_/blta ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni blta ba'i 
[\[229a.5\]]phyir ro/_/'gro na zhes bya ba ni 'gro bar byed na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad dmag shom pa la blta ba'i phyir 'gro na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dbyar khang lam ka na 'dug 
[\[229a.6\]]na ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed gsum pa'i bcu pa rdzogs so//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal la ri 'or pa dag log pa de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la sogs te dge bsnyen rnams kyang rgyal pos spring nas der dong 
[\[229a.7\]]ngo /_/de'i 'og tu dge 'dun la gsol ba btab nas drug sde rnams dong ngo /_/de'i tshe drug sde de rnams la zhag gnyis kyi mtha'i bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na bcu gnyis sde rnams dmag shom par zhag gnyis kyi mthar 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]gnas par byed do/_/gang gi tshe de dag mngon du lhags pa de'i tshe dge slong ma de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/dga' mo nye dga' mo/_/sbom dga' mo dag 'ongs pa legs so 'ongs pa legs so/_/khyed cag gang nas 'dir 'ongs/_gang du gnas/_de 
[\[229b.2\]]dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho mo cag dmag shom pa la chos 'chad du dong ste de nyid du gnas so/_/de nas dge slong ma de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag gnyis kyi mtha'i bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba ma mdzad dam/_de rnams kyis 'di 
[\[229b.3\]]skad ces dge slong rnams la bca' ba mdzad kyis/_dge slong ma rnams la ni ma yin no zhes smras pa dang /_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_
[\[229b.4\]]bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong mas dmag shom pa la lta dgos pa'i rkyen de lta bu byung na zhag gnyis kyi mthar dmag de'i nang du dge slong ma des gnas par bya'o/_/de las lhag par gnas na ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas zhes bya ba ni bcu 
[\[229b.5\]]gnyis sde dag go/_/de lta bu'i rkyen byung na zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i rkyen byung ba ma gtogs pa'o/_/shom pa zhes bya ba ni dmag la mngon par dga' ba'o/_/dmag ces bya ba ni zhes bya ba nas rnam pa bzhi'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/zhag gnyis kyi mthar zhes bya ba ni 
[\[229b.6\]]nyin zhag gnyis su'o/_/de las lhag par zhes bya ba ni de las 'das par ro/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad zhag gnyis las lhag par dmag gi nang du gnas na thams cad 
[\[229b.7\]]du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed gsum pa'i bcu gcig pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la springs nas zhes bya ba nas/_zhag gnyis kyi mthar thug par dmag de'i nang du 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la g.yul bshams pa dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi mchog gi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde de dag yang g.yul bshams pa dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi 
[\[230a.2\]]mchog dang /_dpung gi mchog gi nang du dong ba dang /_dge slong ma de rnams kyis smras pa/_kye phu nu mo dag bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba ma mdzad dam/_de dag gis 'di skad ces dge slong rnams la bca' ba mdzad kyi/_dge slong ma rnams la ni ma yin no zhes smras pa dang /_don 
[\[230a.3\]]nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang gal te dge slong ma dmag de'i nang du zhag gnyis gnas pa na g.yul bshams pa 
[\[230a.4\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang /_dpung gi mchog dang /_dpung bkod pa'i tshogs la lta ba so sor nyams su myong bar byed na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/bkod pa'i tshogs la lta ba zhes bya ba la/_bkod pa zhes bya ba ni 
[\[230a.5\]]shing rta'i dbyibs lta bu dang /_nam mkha' lding gi 'dab ma'i dbyibs lta bu dang /_'bru'i kha lta bu dang /_pad ma'i dbyibs lta bu dang /_zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o/_/tshogs zhes bya ba ni dpung gi mchog dag go/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/
[\[230a.6\]]de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad g.yul bshams pa'i nang du 'gro na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed gsum pa'i bcu gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sdom ni/_rdeg pa dang ni thal mo dang /_/'khru dang sbed dang bsod pa 
[\[230a.7\]]slong /_/gnas ngan len 'chab khyim dang me/_/'dun pa dang ni nub gnyis dang /_/bar chad dang ni shes bzhin dang /_/dge tshul ma gnyis kha dog sgyur/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe sbom dga' mo dge slong ma rnams dang lhan cig 'thab mo dang mtshang 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]'dru bar byed do/_/bud med ni rang bzhin gyis khro ba yin pas de rang bzhin gyis khros pas khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur nas dge slong ma rnams la ltag dbyug dang /_thal lcag gis brdegs pa dang /_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma rnams smod par byed pa'i skabs de 
[\[230b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge slong ma la rdeg na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma 
[\[230b.3\]]gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/khros zhes bya ba ni kun nas dkris pa'o/_/'khrugs rngam par gyur te zhes bya ba ni lhag par zhen nas so/_/yi ma rangs nas zhes bya ba ni yid mi bde ba skyes pa'o/_/dge slong ma la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o/_/rdeg na zhes bya 
[\[230b.4\]]ba ni sor mo lngas rdeg na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_yang dge slong ma gang khros nas dge slong ma rnams la sor mo gcig gis brdegs na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sor mo lngas brdegs na ltung byed 
[\[230b.5\]]lnga'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa dang /_mdzub mo dang /_mgo bo dang /_ltag pa dang /_lus dang /_gru mo dang /_brla dang /_byin pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_rkang pa'i mthe bos brdegs na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dbyug pa dang /_gseg 
[\[230b.6\]]ma dang /_bong ba la sogs pas brdegs na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te phyags mas brdegs na phyags ma'i nyag ma ji snyed phog pa de snyed kyi ltung byed do/_/ji snyed ma phog pa de snyed ni nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du mon sran sde'u'i spar bas brdegs 
[\[230b.7\]]na mon sran sde'u'i 'bru ji snyed lus la phog pa de snyed kyi ltung byed do/_/ji snyed ma phog pa de snyed kyi nyes byas so/_/las dang po pa la sogs pa ni ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed bzhi pa'i dang po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/byung ba snga ma de nyid la 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]khyad par ni 'di yod de/_dge slong ma de rnams kho na la zhes bya ba nas thal mo gzas pa dang /_zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/ji tsam na don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung 
[\[231a.2\]]ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge slong ma la rdeg par gzas na tha na thal mos kyang rung ste ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/gzhan 
[\[231a.3\]]ni snga ma bzhin no/_/khyad par ni 'di yod de/_gzas na zhes bya ba ni gdengs nas ma brgyab pa'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_de kho na bzhin du ltung ba'i rim pa brjod par bya ste/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad 
[\[231a.4\]]dge slong ma la gzas na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed bzhi pa'i gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bcu dgu pa/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka snga dro sham 
[\[231a.5\]]thabs bgos lhung bzed dang /_chos gos blangs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/_mnyan yod du bsod snyoms spyad nas sbed ma'i khyim gang na ba der song ba dang /_sbed mas 'char ka rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad 
[\[231a.6\]]ces smras so/_/'char ka rab tu byung na da bdag gis ci dag bgyi/_de nas 'char kas sbed ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byang chub sems dpas btsun mo drug khri spangs te rab tu byung na khyod kyis de dag gi rkang pa 'khru bar yang mi khom na de dag ci byed/_des 'di skad 
[\[231a.7\]]ces smras so/_/bdag kyang rab tu 'byung lags grang /_de nas 'char kas sbed ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim gyi bya ba dag legs par spongs shig_/des legs par spangs nas 'char ka dang rgyal po'i khab tu song ste dbyar gnas so/_/de nas sbed ma rgyal 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]byed kyi tshal du song ba dang nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]'di skad ces smras so/_/dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/_de nas sbed mas 'di skad ces smras so/_/rab tu 'byung ngo /_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]'di skad ces smras so/_/'char ka ni yul ko sa la'i spu gri rtul bas yul ma ga d+hAr spu gri'i phyir song 
[\[231b.2\]]ngo /_/de nas sbed ma de bdag rab tu yang ma byung la khyim na gnas par yang ma gyur to snyam du sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang /_dge slong ma 'chag pa gzhan zhig gis sbed ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad nas zhes bya ba nas/_rab tu phyung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar 
[\[231b.3\]]ro/_/de nas 'char ka dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /_sbed mas 'char ka 'ongs so zhes thos nas/_de nas dge slong ma sbed ma 'char ka gang na ba der song ste son pa dang gnas khang gi sgo la brdegs so/_/de nas 'char kas 
[\[231b.4\]]'di su zhig ces dris so/_/des 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag sbed ma lags so/_/de nas 'char kas 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag gi chung ma nang du zhugs shig_/des 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang ma lags te/_bdag 
[\[231b.5\]]rab tu byung ba lags so/_/des khyod sus gnang na 'di ltar khyod rab tu byung zhes spyos pa dang /_de nas sbed mas 'char ka la bzod pa gsol to/_/de nas de'i 'og tu 'char kas sbed ma la chos bshad par brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na kun du chags 
[\[231b.6\]]par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can ni skyes pa chags pa shes so zhes gsungs pa yin pas ji tsam na 'phrigs nas gci ba'i brda byas te bros so/_/'char ka yang rkang pa'i sgra la mkhas pa yin pas rig nas phyi bzhin 
[\[231b.7\]]brgyugs pa dang /_de'i brla la reg pas smad g.yogs gsher to/_/sbed mas 'dod chags dang bral bar rig nas 'char ka gang na ba der song ste phyin nas sbed mas 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa 'char ka gal te bdag gis de ltar ma 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]bgyis na nges par 'o skol gnyis ka dge sbyong gi tshul las nyams par 'gyur ro/_zhes de skad smras pa dang /_'char kas sbed ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sbed ma legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bdag bsrung ba de ni 
[\[232a.2\]]gzhan srung ba yin la gang gzhan srung ba de ni bdag srung ba yin no zhes gsungs pa ni thog tu bab ste 'di ltar yang sbed ma khyod kyis rang yang bsrungs/_kho bo yang bsrungs so/_/de nas sbed mas 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod lam gyis dub ste byon gyis gos dag 
[\[232a.3\]]bdag la gtod cig bkru'o/_/de nas byin pa dang sbed mas mthong nas 'gyod pa skyes te bdag gis ni bud med kyi mi brtan pa byas/_bdag gis ni dge sbyong gi mi brtan pa dang /_bram ze'i mi brtan pa byas te/_bdag gi lus kyi yan lag de 'di lta ste/_'char kas 
[\[232a.4\]]ma mthong ba'am/_ma reg pa'am/_sus kyang mi shes pa de gang zhig yod ces de ltar smre sngags mang du bton nas mi gtsang ba rma'i nang du blugs so/_/de nas sbed mas 'char ka'i gos dag bkrus nas dge slong ma'i dbyar khang gang na ba der song ngo /_/de nas sbed ma 
[\[232a.5\]]dus gzhan zhig na sems can dang ldan par gyur to/_/de nas dge slong ma rnams kyis sbed ma'i lus kyi gyur pa dag mthong nas zhes bya ba nas skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/
[\[232a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong ma dag dge slong nye du ma yin pa'i gos dag 'khru ba dang /_kha dog bsgyur ba dang /_'chag pa las gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab 
[\[232a.7\]]pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang dge slong nye du ma yin pa'i gos rnying pa 'khru'am/_kha dog bsgyur ram/_'chag na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbed ma'o/_/nye du ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni ma mes dang /_pha mes bdun rgyud 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]tshun chad ni nye du yin no/_/dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/rnying pa dag ces bya ba ni dus tshigs gsum po dgun dang dpyid dang /_dbyar gang yang rung ba'i dus tshigs su longs spyad par gyur pa'o/_/gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po gang yang rung ba'o/_/'khru'am 
[\[232b.2\]]zhes bya ba ni tha na chu lan gcig ldugs pa yang ngo /_/kha sgyur ram zhes bya ba ni tha na tshon gyi nang du lan gcig 'jug pa yang ngo /_/'chag na zhes bya ba ni tha na lag mthil gyis lan gcig rdebs na yang ngo /_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 
[\[232b.3\]]'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas nye du ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis dge slong nye du ma yin pa'i 'khru na ltung byed do/_/kha sgyur na ltung byed do/_/'chag na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du nye du ma yin pa la yid gnyis kyis 'khru na ltung byed do/_/kha sgyur na ltung byed do/_/'chag na ltung byed 
[\[232b.4\]]do/_/dge slong mas dge slong nye du la nye du ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis 'khru na nyes byas so/_/kha sgyur na nyes byas so/_/'chag na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du nye du la yid gnyis kyis 'khru na nyes byas so/_/kha sgyur na nyes byas so/_/'chag na nyes byas so/_/pha dang bu dang 
[\[232b.5\]]ming po dag gi la ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed bzhi pa'i gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcu bdun sde rnams la brten nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la sbed pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa dang /_de nas bcu 
[\[232b.6\]]gnyis sde rnams rgod pa'i bsam pas dge slong rnams kyi gos dag sbed par byed pa dang /_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du 
[\[232b.7\]]mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang dge slong gi'am/_dge slong ma'i 'am/_dge slob ma'i 'am/_dge tshul lam/_dge tshul ma'i lhung bzed dam/_chos gos sam/_dra ba'am/_tshwa khug gam/_ska rags sbed dam/_sbed du 'jug na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]ma gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/dge slong ngam zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/dge slong ma'am zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ma'o/_/dge slob ma zhes bya ba ni dge slob ma'i bslab pa la slob pa gang yin pa'o/_/dge tshul 
[\[233a.2\]]zhes bya ba ni gzhon nu'o/_/dge tshul ma zhes bya ba ni gzhon nu ma'o/_/lhung bzed dam zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa ste/_tha na snod cig shos kyang yin no/_/chos gos sam zhes bya ba ni bdun po gang yang rung ba'o/_/dra ba'am zhes bya ba ni dra ba 
[\[233a.3\]]nyid do/_/tshwa khug gam zhes bya ba ni lan tshwa'i snod do/_/ska rags zhes bya ba ni lcag pod dam/_rgya cang gang yang rung ba ste/_dge slong ma'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad ci gang yang rung ba sbas na rkyen de lta bu ma gtogs te ltung byed do/_/rkyen de lta bu ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni 
[\[233a.4\]]rkyen de lta bu bzhag ste'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad dge sbyong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad sbed na rkyen ma gtogs te thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed bzhi pa'i bzhi pa rdzogs 
[\[233a.5\]{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde rnams la brten nas kha zas bsod pa'i dgag pa mdzad nas nad pa la ni rjes su gnang ngo /_/de nas bcu gnyis sde de dag bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su kha zas bsod pa 
[\[233a.6\]]bslangs nas na ba yang longs spyod par byed/_mi na ba yang longs spyod par byed pa dang /_dge slong ma rnams kyis bsgo ba na de dag gis ni 'di skad ces bslab pa'i gzhi de ni dge slong rnams la mdzad kyi/_dge slong ma rnams la ni ma yin no zhes smras pa dang /_don nyung 
[\[233a.7\]]ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_dge slong ma na ba rnams la kha zas bsod pa rjes su gnang ba gang yin pa de dag ni 'di 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]lta ste/_'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar sar dang /_nya dang /_sha dang /_sha skam mo/_/yang dge slong ma gang mi na bar bdag nyid kyi ched du bca' ba dang /_bza' ba de lta bu gzhan gyi khyim dag nas bslangs te 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed do/_/gang yin pa de dag ni zhes 
[\[233b.2\]]bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis so/_/nad pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni nad kyis thebs pa rnams kyi'o/_/dge slong ma rnams zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos ma rnams so/_/bsod pa 
[\[233b.3\]]zhes bya ba ni zhim po'o/_/bca' ba dang bza' ba zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga'o/_/'o ma zhes bya ba ni 'o ma nyid do/_/zho zhes bya ba ni zho nyid do/_/mar sar zhes bya ba ni mar ro/_/sha zhes bya ba ni sha nyid do/_/nya zhes bya ba ni nya nyid do/_/sha skam zhes bya 
[\[233b.4\]]ba ni sha skams pa'o/_/'di ltar khyim dag nas slong na zhes bya ba ni rang gis so/_/slong du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni gzhan no/_/zos sam 'chos na zhes bya ba ni lkog mar kham gyis mid na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/mi na bar slong zhing mi 
[\[233b.5\]]na bar za na slong ba na de la nyes byas so/_/za ba na ltung byed do/_/mi na bar slong zhing na ba na za na slong ba na de la nyes byas so/_/za ba na ltung ba med do/_/de bzhin du na ba na bslang la mi na ba na za na slong ba de la ltung ba med do/_/za ba na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du na ba 
[\[233b.6\]]na slong zhing na ba na za na gnyi ga la ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed bzhi pa'i lnga pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde rnams gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba byung nas phan tshun 'chab par byed cing /_de dag 'thab pa dang mtshang 'dru bar 
[\[233b.7\]]byed cing phan tshun du gzhi des gleng bar byed pa de dag don nyung ba'i dge slong ma rnams kyis thos nas smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]yang dge slong ma gang shes bzhin du dge slong ma'i gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba 'chab na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/gnas ngan len zhes bya ba ni gnas ngan len gnyis te/_phas pham par gyur 
[\[234a.2\]]pas kun nas bslang ba dang /_dge 'dun lhag mas kun nas bslang ba'o/_/'chab na zhes bya ba ni gzhan la mi smra ba'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas dge slong ma la phas pham par 'gyur bas kun 
[\[234a.3\]]nas bslang ba'i ltung ba byung ba mthong la de yis de bcab par sems bskyed na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du dge 'dun lhag ma dang /_de bzhin du ltung byed dang /_so sor bshags par bya ba dang /_nyes byas la ni nyes byas so/_/gal te thab mor gyur na ltung ba med do/_/
[\[234a.4\]]ltung byed bzhi pa'i drug pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis bsams pa/_tshem bu pa lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag gis kho bo cag dge slong ma rnams kyi mdun du tho btsams na/_kho mo cag gis 'di dag la gnod 
[\[234a.5\]]pa ci zhig bya snyam mo/_/de nas sbom dga' mo dang /_gtsug dga' mos 'di skad ces smras so/_/lan du tho btsam par bya ba lta bla'o zhes de dag gis dge slong ma rgan mo rgan mo rnams srang dang /_sum mdo dang /_bzhi mdo rnams su mgron du bos nas/_ji srid kyi 
[\[234a.6\]]zan 'chad pa de srid 'khyam du bcug go/_/bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis ni gnyis shing gnyis shing gsang nas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su song ste/_bsod snyoms zos so/_/de nas dge slong ma rgan mo rgan mo de dag dbyar khang du 'ongs nas 'phres te 
[\[234a.7\]]'dug pa dang /_de dag gi lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags ma dag gal te zas gzhan gyi lags zhes te/_lto yang gzhan gyi lags sam ci/_de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/de ring sus zos pa yin grang /_de dag gis 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]'di skad ces bshos ma bkum grang zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis skabs de dge slong ma rnams la smras pa dang /_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba 
[\[234b.2\]]nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang klan ka tshol bas ci nas kyang dge slong ma 'di la klan ka btsal bar 'gyur ro snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas te/_dge slong ma la 'di skad ces 'phags ma khyod tshur khyim dag tu bzhud do/_/der 
[\[234b.3\]]khyod la bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa dag ji tsam 'dod pa sbyin du gzhug go/_zhes smras nas des de la bza' ba dang /_bca' ba bsod pa dag ji tsam 'dod par sbyin du ma bcug par de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces 'phags ma khyod dang kho mo lhan cig smra ba'am 'dug pa 
[\[234b.4\]]bde ba ma yin no/_/de lta mod kyi kho mo gcig pu smra'am 'dug na bdes/_khyod song shig ces zer na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/dge slong ma la zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ma la'o/_/'di skad ces 
[\[234b.5\]]zer na zhes bya ba ni smra na'o/_/tshur khyim dag tu bzhud dang zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su'o/_/der khyod la bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa dag sbyin du gzhug go zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga dang /_bza' ba lnga'o/_/ji tsam 'dod par zhes 
[\[234b.6\]]bya ba ni ji tsam za 'dod pa'o/_/des de la sbyin du ma bcug par 'di skad ces khyod dang kho mo lhan cig bde ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyod dang lhan cig dga' ba ma yin pa'o/_/smra'am zhes bya ba ni tshig go/_/'dug pa'am zhes bya ba ni 'khod pa'o/_/klan ka tshol ba zhes 
[\[234b.7\]]bya ba ni tho btsam pa'i glags tshol ba'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad klan ka tshol bas de skad ces smras na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te sman pa'i lung yod 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]pa'am/_de la brten nas dge 'dun gyi zan bcad par gyur na mi rung ba zhig yin na ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed bzhi pa'i bdun pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde rnams la brten te bla 
[\[235a.2\]]gab med par me 'bud pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad la/_de yang nad pa rnams la brten nas ni rjes su gnang ba de'i tshe bcu gnyis sde rnams rang gi lag gis me sbor bar byed/_sbor du 'jug par byed pa dang /_ji tsam na don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i 
[\[235a.3\]]skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang mi na bar bdag nyid kyi phyir bde bar 'dod nas me sbor ram/_sbor du 'jug na ltung byed do/_/yang dge 
[\[235a.4\]]slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/mi na bar zhes bya ba ni nad pa ma gtogs pa'o/_/bdag nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni rang gi ched du'o/_/me sbor ram zhes bya ba ni me 'bud pa'o/_/bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni rang gis so/_/sbor du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni gzhan 
[\[235a.5\]]no/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ma dag ma len tam/_dri'i ched du mes 'gengs par byed na des dus byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/byin gyis ma brlabs na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du dri dag dri'i ched du 
[\[235a.6\]]ldugs na yang sangs rgyas kyi ched yin no zhes dus byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/byin gyis ma brlabs na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du mkhan po'i phyir yang byin gyis ma brlabs na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi phyir me sbor na ci tsam dgos pa ma rdzogs kyi bar du 
[\[235a.7\]]dus ring por byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob na de lta na legs/_gal te byin gyis mi rlob na ltung byed do/_/shing re re nas 'jug na yang dus byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob na de lta na legs/_gal te byin gyis mi rlob na ltung byed do/_/de 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]bzhin du me 'thor bar byed dam spung bar byed na yang ltung byed do/_/dge slong mas mgal me blangs te mgal me'i 'khor lo skor bar byed na ltung byed do/_zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du mdag ma la ri mo 'dri bar byed na ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/dge slong mas mdag ma len 
[\[235b.2\]]na gal te dus byin gyis rlob na de lta na legs/_gal te mi byed na nyes byas so/_/gal te nad pa'i phyir bla gab med par snod du btso ba 'tshed dam/_de bzhin du tshon rtsi'i las dang /_lhung bzed kyi las byed pa ste/_thams cad du dus byin gyis brlabs na ltung ba med do/_/
[\[235b.3\]]ltung byed bzhi pa'i brgyad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bcu bdun sde rnams la brten nas dge 'dun gyi bya ba chos dang ldan pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa/_de'i tshe rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong ma rnams 
[\[235b.4\]]dge 'dun gyi bya ba chos dang ldan pas dge 'dun gyi bya ba byed do/_/de'i tshe bcu gnyis sde de rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi bya ba chos dang ldan pa la 'dun pa byin zin nas mi sbyin no/_/nyes par byin no/_/mi mthun pas byas kyi/_mthun pas ma yin no zhes smra ba na don nyung 
[\[235b.5\]]ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang dge 'dun gyi bya ba chos dang ldan pa la 'dun pa byin nas de'i 'og 
[\[235b.6\]]tu spong ba'i chos su byed cing /_dge slong ma 'dun pa phyir byin cig khyod la mi sbyin no zhes zer na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/dge 'dun gyi bya ba chos dang ldan pa la zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi chos dang ldan pa'i dge 'dun gyi 
[\[235b.7\]]bya ba gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las dag go/_/'dun pa byin nas zhes bya ba ni blo gros byin nas so/_/de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan na'o/_/spong ba'i chos su byed cing zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ces kho mos 'dun pa ma 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]byin no zhes smras pa'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad dge 'dun gyi bya ba chos dang ldan pa la 'dun pa byin nas spong ba'i chos su byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur 
[\[236a.2\]]ro/_/gal te bden pa nyid dam/_nyes par byin na ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed bzhi pa'i dgu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rgan zhugs shig la brten nas bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig 
[\[236a.3\]]thams cad du gnas par mi bya'o/_/gnas na ltung byed do/_/yang dge tshul sgra can zin la brten nas nub gnyis tshun chad rjes su gnang ngo /_/de nas bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis 'di skad ces gang du nub gnyis yin pa de la ni gsum du 'gyur 'dod cig_/gang du gsum 
[\[236a.4\]]yin pa de la ni bzhir 'gyur 'dod cig ces smra ba'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas par mi bya'o/_/gnas na ltung byed do/_/de nas dge slong ma de rnams kyis dge tshul ma dag 
[\[236a.5\]]dge tshul gyi kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol du byung ba na de dag mi sbed cing ma bsrungs par gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol du dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/de lta mod kyi 
[\[236a.6\]]gzhi spang bar bya'o/_/de ltar byas pa dang /_dge slong ma zhig gis dge tshul ma nad pa zhig yod pa de la kha zas tsam byin nas bdag gi lag pas byin len ma byas par ma gyur grang zhes slar yang reg par mi byed pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[236a.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_rang gi lag gis bsnyod par bya ste de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/de nas dge tshul ma nad pa de dag zas kyi dus su 'dug pas dub par gyur pa na dge slong ma de dag ston par mi byed pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stan gcig tu 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]'dug la brten par bya ste de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/de nas yang nub mor gyur pa na dge tshul ma de dag bor te dong ba dang /_nad pa de yang nub mo skom slong ba dang zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de kho nar lhan cig gnas par bya ste de la 'gyod 
[\[236b.2\]]par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du dge slong ma na na yang der dge tshul ma'am/_nad g.yog dag gnas par bya zhing snang ba dang bcas par yang gnas par bya ste de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la 
[\[236b.3\]]gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa gsungs nas snga ma ni bcas pa'o/_/'di ni rjes su gnang ba ste/_nyan thos ma rnams kyis yang 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong ma gang bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa 
[\[236b.4\]]dang /_lhan cig nub gnyis las lhag par gnas gcig tu nyal bar byed na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang zhes bya ba la bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni gnyis te/_dge slong dang dge slong ma'o/_/lhag 
[\[236b.5\]]ma ni bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'o/_/nub gnyis las lhag par zhes bya ba ni nub gnyis 'das par ro/_/gnas gcig tu nyal bar byed na zhes bya ba la/_gnas bzhi po dag tu nyal bar byed pa ste/_thams cad du g.yogs shing thams cad bskor ba dang /_
[\[236b.6\]]thams cad g.yogs shing phal cher ma bskor ba dang /_thams cad phal cher ma g.yogs shing phal cher ma bskor ba dang /_thams cad phal cher g.yogs shing phal cher bskor ba'o/_/thams cad g.yogs shing thams cad bskor ba ni gnas khang ngam/_
[\[236b.7\]]'khor gyi khyams sam/_khang pa brtsegs ma dag go/_/thams cad g.yogs shing phal cher ma bskor ba ni khyams zlum po'am/_rim gro'i gnas dag go/_thams cad phal cher ma g.yogs shing phal cher ma bskor ba ni khyams ngos gsum pa'o/_/phal 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]cher ma g.yogs shing phal cher ma bskor ba ni khyams ngos bzhi pa'o/_/skya rengs shar na zhes bya ba ni skya rengs gsum po skya rengs dang po'am/_bar ma'am/_tha ma gang yang rung ba shar na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la 
[\[237a.2\]]ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig nub gnyis las 'das te nub gsum par gnas gcig tu nyal bar byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed bzhi pa'i bcu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[237a.3\]]gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na'o/_/de'i tshe dge slong ma 'chi ltas la sdig pa can gyi lta bar song ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang yin pa de la so sor bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur 
[\[237a.4\]]ba de ltar kho mos bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa shes so zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma dag khyed kyis dge slong ma 'chi ltas la bzhams te sgo shig_/de la bzhams 
[\[237a.5\]]te bsgo ba na gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni gti mug go zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[237a.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma dag khyed kyis dge slong ma 'chi ltas la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o/_/bsgo ba ni 'di ltar bya ste gnas mal bshams pa byas te zhes bya ba nas/_dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o 
[\[237a.7\]]zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/bya ba ni 'di lta bu yin te/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun phu nu mo dag bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam par song ba 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang yin pa de la so sor bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar kho mos bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa shes so zhes mchi ba de la dge slong ma mang pos bzhams te bsgo ste/_de la bzhams te bsgo ba na gzhi de nyid la nan gyis 
[\[237b.2\]]mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni gti mug go zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid kyis/_gal te 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_'di 
[\[237b.3\]]ltar 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma 'chi ltas la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de bzhin du las kyang lan gsum gyi bar du bya'o/_/de la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba na 'di skad ces 'di nyid bden gyi 
[\[237b.4\]]gzhan ni gti mug go zhes smra ba'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma dag dge slong ma 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta bar song ba de gtong du mi btub pa dang /_gzhan yang de lta 
[\[237b.5\]]bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byos shig_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste gnas mal bshams pa byas la zhes bya ba nas/_dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba bya ste las bya'o/_/bya ba ni 'di lta bu yin te/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun phu nu 
[\[237b.6\]]mo dag bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam par song ba 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang yin pa de la so sor bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ba de 
[\[237b.7\]]ltar kho mos bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa shes so mchi lags kyis gal te/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_'di ltar 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma 'chi 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]ltas sdig pa can gyi lta bar song ba de gtong du mi btub pa la gnas nas dbyung ba'i las mdzad de/_ji srid du dge slong ma 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta bar song ba de gtong du mi btub pa de srid du de la dge slong ma rnams kyis gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi/_phebs 
[\[238a.2\]]par smra bar mi bgyi/_so sor yang dag par dga' bar mi bgyi zhing dper na gdol pa'i bu mo bzhin du shin tu smad pas smad par bgyi'o/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun phu nu mo dag bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge
