[\[299b.7\]]nyi shu gcig pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i sdom rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sdom ni/_sme gab tshogs kyi sme gab dang /_/bkren pa yi rang 'jug pa dang /_/sra brkyang 'byung bar bya ba dang /_/gos dag bgo bar bya ba'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas bud med ni sngon gyi 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]las kyis 'phungs pa'i shugs yod pas dge slong ma rnams zla ba ngo re zhing zla mtshan 'dzag par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sme gab bcang bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sme gab bcang bar bya'o/_/zhes 
[\[300a.2\]]gsungs pa de'i tshe de dag bgos shing rgyu ba na lhung bar gyur nas/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_srad bus gdags par bya'o/_/yang sbom dga' mo mi thogs pas de byin pa la khrag 'dzag cing bsod snyoms la song ba bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong 
[\[300a.3\]]nas dris pa/_'phags ma byin pa la khrag 'dzag pa'o ni ci lags/_des 'di skad ces ma la dris shig_/sring mo la dris shig_/bu mo la dris shig ces smras pa na/_de dag bdag cag gi khyim thams cad kyang btsog par 'gyur ro zhes phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha 
[\[300a.4\]]zer bar byed/_smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma sme gab mi 'chang na ltung byed do/_/yang gang 
[\[300a.5\]]zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/sme gab ces bya ba ni bud med kyi mi bde ba dgab pa'o/_/mi 'chang na zhes bya ba ni rang gir mi byed na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad sme gab mi 'chang 
[\[300a.6\]]na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu gnyis pa'i dang po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas phreng ldan mas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la sme gab rjes su gnang ngo zhes thos nas de 'di snyam du kye ma'o bdag gis 
[\[300a.7\]]dge slong ma'i dge 'dun thams cad la sme gab dbul lo snyam du bsams so/_/de nas sbom dga' mo btsun mo phreng ldan ma gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_btsun mo phreng ldan ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun mo bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]sme gab rjes su gnang ngo /_/de nas btsun mo phreng ldan mas nang mi la bsgo ba dang /_de dag gis gos sna tshogs kyis sgrom dag mdun du bzhag go/_/de nas btsun mo phreng ldan mas sbom dga' mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma gos 'di dge slong ma'i 
[\[300b.2\]]tshogs thams cad la sme gab du brims shig_/de nas sbom dga' mos gos de dag thams cad rang gir byas pa dang /_dge slong ma gzhan zhig btsun mo phreng ldan ma gang na ba der song ste phyin nas btsun mo phreng ldan ma la 'di skad ces smras so btsun mo bdag la yang 
[\[300b.3\]]sme gab stsol cig_/de nas btsun mo phreng ldan mas dge slong ma de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma bdag gis dge slong ma'i tshogs thams cad kyi sme gab sbom dga' mo'i lag tu gtad lags so/_/ji tsam na sbom dga' mo la bslangs pa las ma byin 
[\[300b.4\]]pa dang /_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang sme gab can gyi tshogs kyi sme gab 
[\[300b.5\]]gang zag rang gir byed na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhig ces bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/sme gab can zhes bya ba ni bud med na ba'o/_/tshogs kyi sme gab ces bya ba ni dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang thun mong pa'o/_/gang zag ces bya ba ni gcig pu'o/_/rang gir 
[\[300b.6\]]byed na zhes bya ba ni bdag gir rnon pa'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad sme gab can gyi tshogs kyi sme gab gang zag rang gir byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu gnyis 
[\[300b.7\]]pa'i gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa zhig yod do/_/de nas sbom dga' mo khyim bdag de gang na ba der song ste phyin nas khyim bdag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]sra brkyang gi 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]dus la bab kyis sra brkyang byin cig_/des 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma bdag ni bro 'tshal ba zhig ste ci yang ma mchis so/_/de nas sbom dga' mos 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho mos khyod la bstan gyis bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]tshong khang nas skyin po long la 
[\[301a.2\]]phyis skyin pa byin cig_/de nas sbom dga' mos nyam chung ngu sra brkyang la rjes su yi rang ba byed du bcug nas blangs te dbyar khang du song ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag de dus gzhan zhig na tshong pa des bzung nas kAr ShA pa Na dag ma byin gyi bar du gar yang ma 'gro shig ces bzung ngo 
[\[301a.3\]]de nas ne'u zla dag gis khyim bdag de la smras pa/_gnas 'di na ci byed/_des 'di skad ces bu lon pa dag gis bzung ngo /_/zhes smras so/_de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod ci'i phyir bu lon pa dag gis bzung /_des skabs de rgyas par smras pa dang /_de 
[\[301a.4\]]dag 'di skad ces shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams kyis dge sbyong gi tshul dang tshangs pa'i tshul ni tshig pa yin te/_gang gi phyir nad pa la yang rjes su yi rang bar byed du 'jug go zhes kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[301a.5\]]kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang nyam chung ngu la sra brkyang 'bul du 'jug gam/_rjes su yi rang bar byed du 'jug na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/nyam chung ngu zhes bya ba 
[\[301a.6\]]ni nad pa'o/_/sra brkyang 'bul du 'jug gam zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi chos gos so/_/rjes su yi rang bar byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni skyin po len du 'jug na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam 
[\[301a.7\]]cung zad nyam chung ngu la sra brkyang rjes su yi rang bar byed du 'jug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu gnyis pa'i gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas gnas su sra brkyang bting ba las dge slong ma chom rkun 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]pas btogs pa rab tu mang po dag lhags te de dag gis 'di skad ces gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang na sra brkyang dbyung bar bya'o zhes smras pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rjes su gnang ste sra 
[\[301b.2\]]brkyang 'byung bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas mal bshams pa byas te zhes bya ba nas/_dris pa'i lan gyis dge slong ma rnams la yang dag par bsgo la de'i 'og tu dge slong ma 
[\[301b.3\]]gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun phu nu mo dag bdag la gsan du gsol/_gnas 'dir dge slong ma chom rkun pas btogs pa rab tu mang po dag mchis lags na/_gal te 'phags ma'i dge 'dun 
[\[301b.4\]]gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_'di ltar 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma chom rkun pas btogs pa rab tu mang po'i slad du sra brkyang dbyung bar mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de bzhin du 
[\[301b.5\]]las kyang rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mo sra brkyang 'byin pa nyams su myong bar mi byed pa nas dge slong ma rnams kyis skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa 
[\[301b.6\]]bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang sra brkyang 'byin pa nyams su myong bar mi byed na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/sra brkyang 'byin pa zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi chos gos so/_/'byin pa nyams su myong bar mi byed na 
[\[301b.7\]]zhes bya ba ni mthun pa mi sbyin na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad dge 'dun dang lhan cig sra brkyang 'byin pa nyams su myong bar mi byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]nyi shu gnyis pa'i bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sra brkyang phyung nas der gos kyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de bgo bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_de nas sbom dga' mo gos kyi rnyed 
[\[302a.2\]]pa 'ged pa nyams su myong bar mi byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang sra brkyang gi rnyed pa 'ged pa nyams 
[\[302a.3\]]su myong bar mi byed na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/sra brkyang gi rnyed pa 'ged pa zhes bya ba ni gos 'ged pa'o/_/nyams su myong bar mi byed na zhes bya ba ni mi 'du na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 
[\[302a.4\]]'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged pa nyams su myong bar mi byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te len 'dod pa nyid ma yin na ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed nyi shu gnyis pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i sdom rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[302a.5\]]sdom ni/_tshur shog nye bar zhi bya dang /_/bcol nas 'gro bar bya ba dang /_/rig pa mi blang mi gzhug dang /_/kha zas btsong bar mi bya ba'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas dge slong ma rnams kyi lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag phan tshun 'thab pa 
[\[302a.6\]]na sbom dga' mos de la rkyen dag nye bar bsgrubs pas/_/des na 'thab mo che thang du byung nas dge slong ma rnams kyis 'di skad ces 'phags ma tshur spyon 'thab mo nye bar zhi bar bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang /_sbom dga' mos 'di skad ces mgos mgo ci'i phyir ma 
[\[302a.7\]]btsal/_re zhig kho mo ni 'thab mo byed kyi nye bar zhi bar mi byed do zhes smras pa na/_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang 'thab mo nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i mthu yod par gyur la nye bar zhi bar mi byed na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/mthu yod par gyur la zhes bya ba ni mthu dang ldan pa'o/_/'thab mo zhes bya ba ni mtshang 'dru 
[\[302b.2\]]ba'o/_/nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba ni rab tu zhi ba'o/_/nye bar zhi bar mi byed na zhes bya ba ni mi zlog na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad 'thab mo dang mtshang 'dru ba nye bar zhi bar bya bar nus shing 
[\[302b.3\]]mthu yod par gyur la nye bar zhi bar mi byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu gsum pa'i dang po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mos dbyar khang du sgo bcad nas lde mig khyer te ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las dbyar 
[\[302b.4\]]khang der me shor te/_dge slong ma rnams kyis gsad par 'dod na sgo dbyer lde mig ma rnyed nas mes tshig par gyur pa de'i tshe don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes 
[\[302b.5\]]bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang dbyar khang ma bcol bar ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/dbyar khang zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag khang ngo /_/ma bcol bar zhes bya ba ni dge 
[\[302b.6\]]slong ma rnams la lde mig ma gtad par ro/_/ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na zhes bya ba ni mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi nang du 
[\[302b.7\]]'du shes pas dge slong ma rnams la lde mig ma gtad par mtshams kyi phyi rol du byung na ltung byed do/_/de bzhin du yid gnyis za na ltung byed do dge slong mas mtshams kyi phyi rol la mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes pas/_dge slong ma rnams la lde mig ma gtad 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]par mtshams kyi phyi rol du byung na nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du yid gnyis za na nyes byas so/_/ltung byed nyi shu gsum pa'i gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mo chags pas skyes pa 'dod nas de spos 
[\[303a.2\]]'tshong gi khye'u zhig gi drung du song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rig pa cung zad klog gam/_des 'di skad ces smras te klog go/_/sbom dga' mos 'di skad ces smras te/_thon cig dang bklag go/_/des 'di skad ces sar phu/_bi si ri phu/_si ri 
[\[303a.3\]]bi swA hA/_zhes smras so/_/sbom dga' mos 'di skad yang dang yang du brjod cig ces smras pa dang /_ji tsam na khros nas mgo reg mo ngan pa zhes spyos so/_/phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong mas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di ltar khyod kyis tshig gnyis kyang mi zin na ji ltar 
[\[303a.4\]]khyod kyis sde snod gsum bzung /_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho mos brjod pa dang po la bzung zin mod kyi tshig tsam rang gir byed do/_/phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong mas 'di skad ces 'phags ma khyod 'dod chags kyis rab tu ma 'bar ba ngo mtshar to zhes smras pa'i skabs 
[\[303a.5\]]de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang khyim pa las rig pa klog na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' 
[\[303a.6\]]mo'o/_/khyim pa las zhes bya ba ni khyim na gnas pa las so/_/rig pa zhes bya ba ni sel bar byed pa'o/_/klog na zhes bya ba ni kun chub par byed na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad khyim 
[\[303a.7\]]pa las rig pa klog na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu gsum pa'i gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mos skyes pa zhig rig pa klog tu bcug nas kye nang rje si ri phu/_bi si ri phu/_si ri bi si ri phu 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]swA hA/_zung shig ces de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du bton pa dang /_de nas mi des 'di skad ces smras so 'phags ma bdag gis kun chub par bzung lags so/_/sbom dga' mos yang dang yang du zung shig ces smras pa dang /_de nas mi de khros 
[\[303b.2\]]nas 'di skad ces mgo reg mo ngan pa khyod kyang ma mthong yang bla/_rig pa yang med du zad do zhes smras pa dang /_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong mas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma khyod ci'i phyir de ltar byed/_sbom dga' mos 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshig 
[\[303b.3\]]tsam rang gir byed do/_/phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong mas 'di skad ces 'phags ma khyod nyon mongs pas ma gos pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes smras pa'i skabs de/_dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 
[\[303b.4\]]'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang skyes pa la rig pa klog tu 'jug na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/skyes pa la zhes bya ba ni mi la'o/_/rig pa zhes bya ba ni rig pa ma yin pa la 
[\[303b.5\]]rig pa'i sgrar gsungs pa'o/_/klog tu 'jug na zhes bya ba ni 'don du 'jug pa'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad skyes pa la rig pa klog tu 'jug na thams cad du ltung byed du 
[\[303b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu gsum pa'i bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mos bsod snyoms mang du rnyed pa dang /_des bsod pa gang yin pa de ni zos phye dang 'bras chan la sogs pa ngan pa gang yin pa de ni 
[\[303b.7\]]btsongs so/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na sbom dga' mo dgos pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir phyi rol du song ba dang /_phye nyo ba zhig 'ongs pa nas de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i drung du song ste/_song nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma ji ga phye dag mnga' 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]'am skye dgu'i bdag mos 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci kho mo phye'i tshong khang gis bskor tam/_de nas mi des 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma dge slong ma dag phye 'tshong lags so/_/des 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzhin 
[\[304a.2\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]phye 'tshong ba'i dge slong ma de gang yin/_de nas mi des 'di skad ces smras so/_/sbom dga' mo lags so/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs 'di skad ces de kho nas kho mo cag la yang gnas skabs 'di byung ngo zhes smras pa dang /_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma 
[\[304a.3\]]dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang kha zas 'tshong na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/
[\[304a.4\]]kha zas zhes bya ba ni phye la sogs pa'o/_/'tshong na zhes bya ba ni rin len na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad kha zas 'tshong na ji srid du rin rang gir ma byas pa de srid du nyes byas so/_/
[\[304a.5\]]rang gir byas na ltung byed do/_/ltung byed nyi shu gsum pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i sdom rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sdom ni/_khyim gyi go re long mi bya/_/stan ni skyed du mi gzhug cing /_/skud pa'ang bkal bar mi bya ste/_/gdugs dang mchil lham mi bcang ba'o/_/gleng gzhi 
[\[304a.6\]]ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mo snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te/_khyim bdag cig gi khyim du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/_de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma bsod snyoms 
[\[304a.7\]]byin cig des 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma bdag glo ba mi dga' lags so/_/sbom dga' mos 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci de ring khyod kyi be'u thams cad 'o ma 'thungs sam/_/des 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma khyim gyi go re long bgyid 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]rngo mi thog lags mod/_sbom dga' mos yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci khyod kyang khab ji lta bar las sna gcig pa yin nam/_khyim bdag gi chung mas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma khyod 'di la byang ba cung zad mnga'am/_sbom dga' mos kyang 'di 
[\[304b.2\]]skad ces smras so/_/kho mos bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas gang la ma byang ba gang zhig yod/_de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma des sbom dga' mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma bdag gi go re long mdzod cig_/des 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho mo la 
[\[304b.3\]]sus bsod snyoms sbyin par 'gyur/_khyim bdag gi chung mas 'di skad ces smras te bya ba nas/_khang skyong la yang dbul lo zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de nas sbom dga' mos lhung bzed mtha' gcig tu bzhag nas gos dag brdzes te khyim de thams cad chag chag 
[\[304b.4\]]legs par btab/_phyag dar legs par byas nas mal bcas/_lcags kyi snod dang /_dngul gyi snod dang /_gser gyi snod dag byi dor byas nas bzhag ste/_khyim de thams cad shin tu mdzes par byas so/_/de yang bsod snyoms kyis khur bslang 
[\[304b.5\]]nas dbyar khang du song ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzang mo khyod kyis de ring khyim gyi byi dor gtsang gtsang ltar byas so/_/des 'di skad ces smras te zhes bya ba nas/_'phags ma sbom dga' mos bgyis kyi bdag gis ma 
[\[304b.6\]]bgyis so/_/des 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyis de la nyi ma re re zhing bsod snyoms byin cig dang /_khyod kyi khyim gyi go re long byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI khyim der bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_de 
[\[304b.7\]]nas khyim bdag gi chung ma des skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma bdag gi khyim gyi go re long mdzod de stsol/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/phu nu mo kho mos zas gtsang gi khyim gyi go re long yang ma byas na da rab tu byung nas 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]bya'am/_de lta mod kyi phu nu mo khyod tshul khrims dang ldan pa la mchid stsal ba ni bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bsags nas bran mor gyur pa'i sa bon skyed dam/_gzhan yang khyod kyis rab tu byung ba khyim gyi go re long byed pa mthong ba'am thos pa su 
[\[305a.2\]]yod/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/sbom dga' mo lags so/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos kyang 'di skad ces de kho nas bdag cag la yang gnas skabs 'di byung ngo zhes smras pa na/_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de/_bcom ldan 
[\[305a.3\]]'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang khyim gyi go re long byed na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/khyim gyi go re long zhes bya ba ni 
[\[305a.4\]]rang gi khyim gyi bya ba byed pa'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad khyim gyi go re long byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu bzhi pa'i dang po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng 
[\[305a.5\]]gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mo dge slong ma rnams la lung klog tu 'jug pa na de'i phyi bzhin dge slong ma rnams stan skyed du bcug cing 'di skad ces khyer la gnas ga ge mo zhig tu thong shig ces sgo bar byed pa dang /_dge slong ma rnams kyis khyed dge slong ma 
[\[305a.6\]]rnams stan skyed du bcug cing nyams su myong bar byed pa na bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed do/_/zhes smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' 
[\[305a.7\]]ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang dge slong ma rnams las stan skyed pa nyams su myong bar byed na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/dge slong ma rnams zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o las zhes bya ba ni las so/_/stan zhes bya ba ni khri'u dag go/_/
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]stan skyed du bcug cing zhes bya ba ni phyi bzhin khyer du bcug cing ngo /_/nyams su myong bar byed ces bya ba ni rang gir byed na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad dge slong ma rnams las stan skyed pa 
[\[305b.2\]]nyams su myong bar byed na thams cad ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te rgas pa sbyor mi bzod pa'am/_nad pa zhig chos 'chad pa yin na ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed nyi shu bzhi pa'i gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas gtsug 
[\[305b.3\]]dga' mos snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te khyim bdag cig gi khyim du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas khyim bdag gi chung ma de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma bsod snyoms byin cig_/des 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags 
[\[305b.4\]]ma bdag skud pa 'khal bas glo ba brel lo/_/gtsug dga' mos 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod song la bsod snyoms khyer te shog shig dang /_kho mos bkal lo zhes bsod snyoms kyi phyir bkal to de nas dus gzhan zhig na skye dgu'i bdag mo khyim der bsod snyoms 
[\[305b.5\]]la zhugs te 'di skad ces smras so/_/phu nu mo bsod snyoms byin cig_/khyim bdag gi chung mas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma skud pa cig khol mdzod cig dang /_de'i bar du bsod snyoms 'tshal te mchi'o/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos 'di skad ces 
[\[305b.6\]]smras so/_/phu nu mo kho mo khyim par gyur pa na yang 'khal ma myong na/_da rab tu byung nas 'khal lam de lta mod kyi zhes bya ba dang /_byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang skud pa 'khal na ltung byed do/_/
[\[305b.7\]]yang gang zhes bya ba ni gtsug dga' mo'o/_/skud pa zhes bya ba ni bdun po gang yang rung ba'o/_/'khal na zhes bya ba ni phung bur byed na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad skud pa 'khal 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te so so'i gnas dben par shur bu dang /_lcag phod dang rgya cang gi phyir ni ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed nyi shu bzhi pa'i gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas gtsug dga' 
[\[306a.2\]]mos mchil lham bgos/_gdugs thogs te bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na de skye bo mang po dgod cing bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i 
[\[306a.3\]]bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang gdugs dang /_mchil lham thogs na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni gtsug dga' mo'o/_/gdugs zhes bya ba ni tsha ba'i skyabs so/_/mchil lham zhes bya ba ni lham mo/_/thogs na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid do/_/ltung 
[\[306a.4\]]byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad gdugs dang mchil lham thogs na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dbyar khang du gnas mal bsrung ba'i phyir mchil lham 'chang ba la ltung ba med 
[\[306a.5\]]do/_/ltung byed nyi shu bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i sdom rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sdom ni/_dpung par phol mig byung ba dang /_/smad 'tshong ma yi dge slong ma/_/dge slong ma dang dge slob ma/_/dge tshul ma yis mnye mi bya/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas gtsug 
[\[306a.6\]]dga' mo'i dpung par phol mig byung nas de sman pas bcings te/_de ltar bcings zin pa dang /_de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcing ba ha cang dam ches so zhes smras so/_/lhod par byas pa dang /_ha cang lhod ches so zhes de ltar 'ching du 'jug cing 
[\[306a.7\]]'grol du 'jug pa dang /_de nas sman pa des 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod 'on kyang ma mthong yang bla/_phol mig kyang ma sos su zad mod ces smras nas song ngo /_/de la dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags ma ci'i phyir khyod de ltar byed/_des 'di skad ces 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]smras so/_/kho mos dam pa dang lhod pa shes mod kyi reg pa tsam rang gir bya'o/_/dge slong ma rnams kyis 'di skad ces gang gi phyir gnas skabs der yang khyod 'dod chags kyi blo skyes na/_khyod shing skam ji lta ba bzhin du 'dod chags kyis rab tu mi 'bar ba ngo mtshar 
[\[306b.2\]]che'o zhes smras pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang dpung par phol mig byung ba skyes pa yang dang yang 
[\[306b.3\]]du 'ching zhing 'grol du 'jug na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni gtsug dga' mo'o/_/dpung par phol mig byung ba zhes bya ba ni rma zhig go/_/yang dang yang du zhes bya ba ni lan du mar ro/_/skyes pas 'ching zhing 'grol du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni khyim pas 
[\[306b.4\]]so/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad rma byung ba skyes pa 'ching du 'jug gam/_'grol du 'jug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te rma nyid yin te bu'am/_ming 
[\[306b.5\]]po'am pha'i dran pa bzhag ste 'ching na ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed nyi shu lnga pa'i dang po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mos bud med smad 'tshong ma zhig rab tu phyung ngo /_/de nas g.yon can dang /_nal phrug dang /_rgyan 
[\[306b.6\]]po dag smad 'tshong ma de tshol ba na/_de dag gis sbom dga' mos rab tu phyung ngo zhes thos nas de dag gis blo skyes pa/_da ni legs pa zhig byas kyis bdag cag gis de'i zan dang gos sbyin mi dgos te/_de lta mod kyi dga' mgur ni spyad par bya'o snyam nas de 
[\[306b.7\]]dag gnas der dong zhing cha ma yin pa'i tshig dag 'byin pa na/_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang shes bzhin du bud med smad 'tshong ma rab tu 'byin na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rang gis sam/_gzhan gyis smras par gyur pa'o/_/bud med smad 'tshong 
[\[307a.2\]]ma zhes bya ba ni kun gyis spyad par bya ba'o/_/rab tu 'byin na zhes bya ba ni chos 'dul ba 'di la'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad bud med smad 'tshong ma zhes rab tu 'byin na thams cad du ltung 
[\[307a.3\]]byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te yul gzhan du bkar nas rab tu 'byin na ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed nyi shu lnga pa'i gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mos rang la dge slong ma dag mnyed du bcug pa dang /_de la dge slong ma 
[\[307a.4\]]rnams kyis smras pa/_dur khrod sten pa 'di mnyes te ci zhig bya/_des 'di skad ces pags pa'i mdog 'di 'tsher zhing gsal bar byed byas pa dang /_rgyan po pa dang nal phrug rnams kyi snying 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du smras pa'i skabs de dge slong ma 
[\[307a.5\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang rang la dge slong ma dag mnyed du 'jug na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' 
[\[307a.6\]]mo'o/_/dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/rang la mnyed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni lus mnyed du 'jug na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad rang la mnyed du 'jug na thams cad 
[\[307a.7\]]du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu lnga pa'i gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mos bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dag gis mnye bar mi bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pas ma la bdag gis dge slong 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]ma mnyed du gzhug go snyam nas de rang la dge slob ma mnyed du bcug pa dang /_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du 
[\[307b.2\]]mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang dge slong ma mnyed du 'jug na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/dge slob ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'dul ba 'di la dge slob mar 'gyur ba'i bslab pa la slob par 'gyur ba'o/_/rang la mnyed du 'jug na zhes bya 
[\[307b.3\]]ba ni lus mnyed du 'jug na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad rang la dge slob ma mnyed du 'jug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu lnga pa'i bzhi pa rdzogs 
[\[307b.4\]{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de bzhin du gzhon nu ma la yang rgyas par brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang rang la gzhon nu ma mnyed du 'jug na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni 
[\[307b.5\]]sbom dga' mo'o/_/gzhon nu ma zhes bya ba ni dge tshul ma'o/_/rang la mnyed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni lus mnyed du 'jug na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad rang 
[\[307b.6\]]la dge tshul ma mnyed du 'jug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu lnga pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i sdom rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sdom ni/_khyim pa mo yang mnyed mi gzhug_/kun du rgyu mo'ang de bzhin no/_/dri dang til gyi tshigs ma 
[\[307b.7\]]dang /_/gnig pa'i rdzas kyis phyi ba'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mos bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu ma'i bar gyis mnyed du gzhug pa bkag gis/_ma la bdag gis khyim pa mo mnyed du gzhug go snyam nas des 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]khyim pa mo mnyed du bcug pa dang /_zhes bya ba nas/_skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang 
[\[308a.2\]]khyim pa mo mnyed du 'jug na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/khyim pa mo zhes bya ba ni khyim na gnas pa'o/_/mnyed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni bsku mnye byed du 'jug na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_
[\[308a.3\]]dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad khyim pa mo mnyed du 'jug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa'am/_ma'am/_bu'am/_bu mo'am/_ming pos mnyed na ltung ba med do/_/ltung byed nyi shu drug pa'i dang po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng 
[\[308a.4\]]gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de bzhin du kun du rgyu mo la yang rgyas par brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang rang la kun du rgyu mo mnyed du 'jug na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/kun du 
[\[308a.5\]]rgyu mo zhes bya ba ni grangs can gyi rab tu byung ba'o/_/rang la mnyed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni lus mnyed du 'jug na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad rang la kun du rgyu mo mnyed du 'jug na thams 
[\[308a.6\]]cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu drug pa'i gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mo dris skud par byed pa dang /_dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags ma 'di ci bya/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/lus dri 
[\[308a.7\]]zhim par bya'o/_/de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/rang bzhin gyis dri mi zhim pa'i lus 'di khyod su'i ched du dri zhim par byed ces bya ba nas/_'dod chags can gyis mthong na 'dod chags kyis gos par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du smras pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang dris skud na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/dris skud na zhes bya ba ni tsan dan 
[\[308b.2\]]dang /_tu ru ska la sogs te dri zhim pos so/_/skud na zhes bya ba ni rang ngam gzhan skud du 'jug na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad dris skud dam/_skud du 'jug na thams cad du 
[\[308b.3\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu drug pa'i gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dris skud pa bkag pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_de bzhin du til gyi tshigs mas 'phyi ba la yang brjod par bya ste zhes bya 
[\[308b.4\]]ba nas bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang til gyi tshigs mas 'phyir 'jug na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/til gyi tshigs mas 'phyi bar byed na thams cad du zhes bya ba ni til mar phyung ba'i tshigs mas lus 
[\[308b.5\]]'phyir 'jug na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad til gyi tshigs mas 'phyir 'jug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu drug pa'i bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[308b.6\]]gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag gnig pa'i rdzas kyis lus kyi dri ma 'phyi ba na de nyid nyes dmigs su gyur nas/_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de 
[\[308b.7\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang gnig pa'i rdzas kyis 'phyir 'jug na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/gnig pa'i rdzas zhes bya ba ni lus 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]kyi dri ma 'phyi zhing gnig par byed pa'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad gnig pa'i rdzas kyis 'phyir 'jug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu drug pa'i tshigs su 
[\[309a.2\]]bcad pa'i sdom rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po nyi shu bdun pa/_sdom ni/_skabs ma phye bar 'dri ba dang /_/khyim pa'i rgyan ni thogs pa dang /_/sbrel cing khrus ni byed pa dang /_/gar dang glu dang rol mo min/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan 
[\[309a.3\]]yod na'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mo gtsug lag khang du song nas dge slong la skabs ma phye bar dri ba dris pa dang /_dge slong des dri ba des dgrol bar ma nus nas zhum zhum por gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[309a.4\]]'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang dge slong la skabs ma phye bar dri ba 'dri na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/dge slong la zhes bya ba ni 'khor gyi gtso bo la'o/_/skabs ma phye 
[\[309a.5\]]bar zhes bya ba ni gsol ba ma byas par ro/_/dri ba 'dri na zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'am/_nyan thos kyis smras pa'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad dge slong la skabs ma phye 
[\[309a.6\]]bar dri ba 'dri na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu bdun pa'i dang po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mos snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te phyug po zhig gi khyim du bsod snyoms la zhugs 
[\[309a.7\]]pa dang /_de dag gi lus kyi rgyan gyi snod sprog ma dag tu rgyan rnams bzhag nas skra'i byi dor byed pa yin pas de nas sbom dga' mos mgul gdub dang /_gdu bu rgyan can dang /_dpung rgyan la sogs mthong nas blangs te thogs pa dang /_bud med de dag gis smras pa/_
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]'phags ma 'di ci mdzad/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho mo'i lus rgyan gyis mdzes sam ci blta mod/_de dag gis smras pa/_mgo reg tshul gzhan du khas blangs pa khyod la mdzes su ci yod ces bud med de dag de ltar kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong 
[\[309b.2\]]ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang khyim pa'i rgyan thogs na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/khyim 
[\[309b.3\]]pa'i rgyan ces bya ba ni mgul gdub dang /_gdu bu rgyan can dang /_dpung rgyan la sogs pa'o/_/thogs na zhes bya ba ni brgyan par byed na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad khyim 
[\[309b.4\]]pa'i rgyan thogs na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu bdun pa'i gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po dang lag pa sbrel nas 
[\[309b.5\]]'bab chu a dzi ra ba tir lus khrus byed pa na de dag gcig la gcig mdzub mo 'dzugs shing de dag dga' bar byed dga' bar byed du 'jug_/rtse bar byed/_rtser 'jug par byed cing dgod pa dang /_'phyar g.yeng dang /_lus kyi rtsab hral byed pa nye bar ston par byed pa na 
[\[309b.6\]]don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang lag pa sbrel nas khrus byed na ltung byed do/_/yang 
[\[309b.7\]]gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/lag pa sbrel nas zhes bya ba ni lag pa sbrel te'o/_/khrus byed na zhes bya ba la khrus ni gnyis te/_dbang bskur ba'i khrus dang /_'jug pa'i khrus las don 'di la ni 'jug pa'i khrus la bya bar dgongs so/_/ltung byed do zhes bya 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad 'jug pa'i khrus la lag pa sbrel nas lus khrus byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu bdun pa'i gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod 
[\[310a.2\]]na'o/_/de'i tshe mnyan yod na dga' sde'i tshogs gnyis po gcig ni rgyal rigs kyi dga' sde'o/_/cig shos ni bram ze'i dga' sde'o/_/de la rgyal rigs kyi dga' sde ni g.yul la byang ba yin no/_/bram ze'i dga' sde ni gar la byang ba yin no/_/gang gi tshe dga' sde'i tshogs 
[\[310a.3\]]gnyis las g.yul 'gyed pas 'gran pa de'i tshe rgyal rigs kyi dga' sde rgyal bar 'gyur la/_gang gi tshe gar gyi tshe ni bram ze'i dga' sde rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal rigs kyi dga' sde rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_/bdag cag gis su zhig la gar bslab snyam 
[\[310a.4\]]pa las de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_'phags ma sbom dga' mo 'di ni shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba bzo'i gnas thams cad dang /_las kyi gnas thams cad la byang ba yin no snyam du bsam nas/_sbom dga' mo gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_sbom dga' 
[\[310a.5\]]mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma khyod gar la byang ba cung zad mnga'am/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho mos bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas gang la ma byang ba de gang zhig yod/_de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/re zhig bdag cag gis glar 
[\[310a.6\]]bca' ba sbyin gyis bdag cag la gar slobs shig_/des smras pa/_'di ltar lag pa sgyur cig_/'di ltar rked pa sgyur cig_/'di ltar rkang pa zhog shig ces bya ba nas/_rgyal rigs kyi dga' sde rnams gar slob tu bcug go zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de nas rgyal rigs 
[\[310a.7\]]kyi dga' sde de dag gis bram ze'i dga' sde rnams gar gyis pham par byas so/_/de nas bram ze'i dga' sde rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed cag la sus bslabs/_de dag gis 'di skad ces sbom dga' mos so zhes smras pa na/_de dag shAkya'i sras kyi dge 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul dang /_tshangs pa'i tshul ni tshig pa yin te/_gang gi phyir 'di ltar gar yang slob tu 'jug go zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom 
[\[310b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang gar slob tu 'jug na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/gar zhes bya ba ni lag pa dang /_rkang pa sgyur ba'o/_/slob tu 'jug na zhes bya ba ni 
[\[310b.3\]]ston par byed na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad gar slob tu 'jug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu bdun pa'i bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod 
[\[310b.4\]]na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gar slob tu gzhug par mi bya'o/_/zhes dgag pa mdzad pa dang /_de'i 'og tu sbom dga' mo dga' sde'i drung du song nas gar ston par byed do zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang gar 
[\[310b.5\]]ston na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/de bzhin du gar ston na zhes bya ba ni nye bar ston na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad gar ston na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur 
[\[310b.6\]]ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu bdun pa'i lnga pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de bzhin du gar la ltar 'gro ba'i bar du bya ste zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang gar la ltar 'gro na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' 
[\[310b.7\]]mo'o/_/gar la ltar 'gro na zhes bya ba ni ltad mo 'dod de 'gro na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad gar la ltar 'gro na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu bdun pa'i drug pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe dga' sde gnyis las glengs nas de nas bram ze'i dga' sde rnams glu'i ched du sbom dga' mo gang na ba der dong ste zhes bya ba nas/_'phags ma bdag cag la yang glu slobs shig ces bya ba'i bar ro/_/de yang drug ldan dang 
[\[311a.2\]]zhes bya ba nas/_shes gsal zhes bya ba dang /_kai shi ke zhes bya ba dang /_sa 'dzin pa dag gi bar de lta bu rol mo'i dbyangs bdun rgyas par bslabs pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang glu slob tu 'jug na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes 
[\[311a.3\]]bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/glu zhes bya ba ni khar 'byin pa'o/_/slob tu 'jug na zhes bya ba ni ston par byed na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad glu slob tu 'jug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung 
[\[311a.4\]]byed nyi shu bdun pa'i bdun pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de bzhin du glu ston pa zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang glu ston na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/ltung ba'i rim pa ni gong ma ji lta ba de 
[\[311a.5\]]bzhin du rjes su mthun par bya'o/_/ltung byed nyi shu bdun pa'i brgyad pa'o//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de bzhin du glu la ltar 'gro ba zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang glu la ltar 'gro na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom 
[\[311a.6\]]dga' mo'o/_/ltung ba'i rim pa ni gong ma ji lta ba de bzhin du rjes su mthun par bya'o/_/ltung byed nyi shu bdun pa'i dgu pa'o//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/zhes bya ba nas rgyal rigs kyi dga' sde dag rol mo'i ched du sbom dga' mo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad 
[\[311a.7\]]ces smras so/_/'phags ma bdag cag la rol mo dag slobs shig des pi bang dang /_gling bu dang /_rdza rnga dang /_pi bang rgyud gcig pa dang /_ba b+hi sa ke dang /_lcags kyi sil krol dang /_shin tu dbyangs snyan la sogs pa dbyangs bdun po dag bslabs nas/_zhes bya ba 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang rol mo slob tu 'jug na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/slob tu 'jug na zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i sgra la'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung 
[\[311b.2\]]bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad rol mo slob tu 'jug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu bdun pa'i bcu pa'o//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de bzhin du rol mo ston pa zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang 
[\[311b.3\]]dge slong ma gang rol mo ston na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/ltung ba'i rim pa ni gong ma ji lta ba de bzhin du rjes su mthun par bya'o/_/ltung byed nyi shu bdun pa'i bcu gcig pa'o//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de bzhin du rol mo la ltar 'gro ba zhes bya 
[\[311b.4\]]ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang rol mo la ltar 'gro na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/ltung ba'i rim pa ni gong ma ji lta ba de bzhin du rjes su mthun par bya'o/_/ltung byed nyi shu bdun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i sdom rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[311b.5\]]sdom ni/_dge slong bcas pa'i gnas dag nas/_/'ba' zhig bshang bar 'gro mi bya/_/pu shel tse dang so [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang /_/rtswa thum skra brnyan bcang mi bya/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas gtsug dga' mos skyes pa zhig la 'di skad ces tshur shog 'di dang 'di dag bya'o/_/zhes smras te/_
[\[311b.6\]]ji tsam na dbyar khang du shog shig pa'i brda byas so/_/de nas skyes pa de nub mo dbyar khang du 'ongs pa dang /_des de chab kung sar bzhag nas bya ba mang po dang /_sgrub pa mang po gang yin pa de dag byas nas/_chab kung sar song ste son nas skyes pa de la 'di skad ces smras so gnas 'di ni mi 
[\[311b.7\]]gtsang gis gnas gzhan du dong ngo /_/des 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang du gtsug dga' mos 'di skad ces smras te/_khyod kyi khyim du'o/_/de nas skyes pa des 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji ltar 'dong gtsug dga' mos 'di skad ces smras te/_kye re zhig kho mo'i phrag pa la zhon cig 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]ces des skyes pa da phrag pa la zhon pa dang /_de nas gtsug dga' mos 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag dge slong ma rnams kyi sna la 'gro ba gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad ni tshul khrims tsam gyis yin na/_gal te bdag dge slong ma'i dngos po zhig par gyur na bdag gis 
[\[312a.2\]]tshig tsam yang smra bar ga la nus te ji skad du/_gtsang mas 'jig rten zil gnon te/_/btsog pas 'jig rten zil mi gnon/_/ces zer ba lta bu'o snyam du bsams nas/_gtsug dga' mos khros te 'phags ma chom rkun pas khrid do zhes smras pa dang /_skyes pa des phrag pa 
[\[312a.3\]]las sa la mchongs te/_'di skad ces mgo reg mo ngan pa rang gis brda byas la 'di skad ces chom rkun pas khrid do zhes smra'am zhes smras pa na don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang 
[\[312a.4\]]zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang gcig pu chab kung sar 'gro na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni gtsug dga' mo'o/_/gcig pu zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa shos med par ro/_/chab kung sar 'gro na zhes bya ba ni bshang ba'i sar 
[\[312a.5\]]ro/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad gcig pu chab kung sar 'gro na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu brgyad pa'i dang po'o//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag pu 
[\[312a.6\]]shel tses skra 'chos shing mnyam par 'chang ba na dge slong ma rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/phu nu mo dag 'di ci byed/_de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/skra ma 'dzings par bskyed mod/_dge slong ma rnams kyis 'di skad ces khyed cag de ltar byed pa ni skra ma yin gyi nyon mongs 
[\[312a.7\]]pa bskyed do/_/zhes smras pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong mas gang pu shel tses skra byi dor byed na ltung byed do/_/yang gang 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/pu shel tses zhes bya ba ni bi ra Na'i rtsa bas so/_/skra'i byi dor byed na zhes bya ba ni mgo'i skra 'chos na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad pu shel tses skra'i byi dor byed na 
[\[312b.2\]]thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu brgyad pa'i gnyis pa'o//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis pu shel tses skra'i byi dor mi bya'o/_/zhes dgag pa mdzad pa de'i tshe so [{]mangs kyis [,]mang gis [}]byi dor byed pa dang /_zhes bya ba ni bslab pa bca' ba'i 
[\[312b.3\]]bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang so [{]mangs kyis [,]mang gis [}]skra'i byi dor byed na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/so [{]mangs kyis [,]mang gis [}]zhes bya ba ni so [{]mangs kyis [,]mang gis [}]so/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_zhes bya ba'i bar 
[\[312b.4\]]gong nas 'byung ba bzhin no/_/ltung byed nyi shu brgyad pa'i gsum pa'o//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/yang rtswa'i thum pos skra'i byi dor byed pa dang /_zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_
[\[312b.5\]]bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang rtswa'i thum pos skra'i byi dor byed na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/rtswa'i thum pos zhes bya ba ni sdong bu gshibs pas so/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_
[\[312b.6\]]zhes bya ba'i bar gong nas 'byung ba bzhin no/_/ltung byed nyi shu brgyad pa'i bzhi pa'o//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/yang so [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang /_rtswa'i thum pos skra'i byi dor byed pa'i bar du bya ste zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang so 
[\[312b.7\]{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang rtswa'i thum pos skra'i byi dor byed na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/so [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang rtswa'i thum pos zhes bya ba ni gnyi gas so/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_zhes bya ba'i bar du gong nas 'byung ba 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]bzhin no/_/ltung byed nyi shu brgyad pa'i lnga pa'o//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mos bsams pa/_bdag gis byas so cog thams cad ni phul phyin par byas kyis ma la re zhig bdag gis skra brnyan yang thogs par bya'o/_/snyam du 
[\[313a.2\]]bsam nas/_rol mo mkhan gyi rgyan dang /_rol mo mkhan gyi gos dang /_rol mo mkhan gyi lham zung gcig brnyas/_gar mkhan zhig las skra brnyan brnyas te/_de nas sbom dga' mos rgyan thams cad bgos nas smad 'tshong ma yod pa'i rtags btsugs te gnas gcig tu bsdad pa 
[\[313a.3\]]dang /_de nas skyes pa zhig 'ongs nas des dris pa dang /_nyi ma gcig la gla ci tsam/_des 'di skad ces smras te/_kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya'o skyes pa des 'di skad ces smras so/_/ha cang mang ches so/_/des 'di skad ces re zhig gzugs bzang ba la ltos shig_/gang gi tshe byed tshul 
[\[313a.4\]]dag mthong nas mgu bar gyur nas lhag par gzhal dgos pa'i gnas 'di yod ces smras pa dang /_de nas skyes pa des kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin no/_/des smras pa nang du zhugs shig de nas sbom dga' mos bsams pa/_bdag dge slong ma'i sna la 'gro ba gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad 
[\[313a.5\]]ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs tsam gyis yin na/_gal te bdag dge slong ma'i dngos po zhig na tshul khrims ral pa yin no zhes byas nas snod chag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bdag la su zhig 'dri bar 'gyur snyam du bsams nas/_sbom dga' mos rol mo mkhan gyi rgyan phud nas bros so/_/
[\[313a.6\]]skyes pa des kyang 'phrigs nas sbom dga' mo gang na ba der brgyugs te des skra brnyan nas bzung ba dang /_skra brnyan phud nas skra brnyan de yang skyes pa'i lag tu 'ongs nas 'di skad ces mgo reg mo ngan pa mo zhes smras so/_/de nas sbom dga' mos skyes pa de la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[313a.7\]]so/_/bu zan mo'i bu rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dge slong ma rnams btsun mo'i thabs su gnang bar khyod kyis mi shes sam/_gal te kho mo la lag pas reg par gyur na lag pa mkhrig ma'i drung du gcod du gzhug go/_/des 'di skad mgo reg mo ngan pa mo khyod 'dra ba ni gnang ba ma 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]yin te/_gnang ba ni skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo dang /_gau ta mI skem mo dang /_ut+pa la'i mdog dang /_chos sbyin dang /_bzang ldan ma dang /_ser skya mo dag yin gyis mgo reg mo khyod 'dra ba ni ma yin no zhes smras pa na/_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs 
[\[313b.2\]]de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang skra brnyan thogs na ltung byed do/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/skra brnyan thogs na zhes bya ba ni 
[\[313b.3\]]gar mkhan gyi skra brnyan no/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad skra brnyan thogs na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ltung byed nyi shu brgyad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i sdom rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[313b.4\]]dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa las ltung byed rnams rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//da ni so sor bshags par bya ba rnams smra bar bya ste/_de la so sor bshags par bya ba rnams kyi sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa ni 'di yin te/_sdom la/_'o ma zho dang mar dang ni/_/zhun 
[\[313b.5\]]mar 'bru mar hwags dag dang /_/sbrang rtsi nya sha sha dag dang /_/sha skam slob pa bskos pa'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe bcu gnyis sde dag bud med kyi brkam chags kyis gzhan gyi khyim dag nas 'o ma bslangs shing longs spyod par byed do/_/de dag 'o ma 
[\[313b.6\]]tshol ba'i rgyus lung nod pa dang /_klog pa dang kha ton byed pa dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la byed pa dang /_nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas shor ba dang zhes bya ba nas/_don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_
[\[313b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bslang bar mi bya'o/_/phyis nyo bar byed pa na nyes pa de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyo bar mi bya'o/_/nye du dag las slong ba na nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]stsal pa bslang bar mi bya'o/_/ji tsam na dge slong ma nad pa zhig yod pa de la sman pas 'o ma sten cig ces bstan pa dang /_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho mo shi zin no/_/sman pas smras pa/_ci'i phyir/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[314a.2\]]'das kyis bkag go/_/sman pas smras pa/_khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman pas bstan na nad kyi sman du longs 
[\[314a.3\]]spyad par bya'o/_/de nas sbom dga' mo na yang rung mi na yang rung gzhan gyi khyim dag nas 'o ma bslangs nas longs spyod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang 
[\[314a.4\]]dge slong ma gang mi na bar rang gi don du/_khyim dag tu 'o ma bslangs nas 'cha' 'am za na dge slong ma des dbyar khang du song nas dge slong ma rnams la 'phags ma smad pa'i gnas mi rigs pa so sor bshags par bya ba byung gis chos de so sor 'chags so zhes so sor bshags par 
[\[314a.5\]]bya ste/_chos 'di ni so sor bshags par bya ba'o/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/rang gi don du zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus kyi'o/_/mi na bar zhes bya ba ni nad kyis ma thebs par ro/_/khyim dag tu zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu'o/_/'o ma zhes bya ba la 
[\[314a.6\]]'o ma ni lnga ste/_ba'i 'o ma dang /_ma he'i 'o ma dang /_rnga rmo'i 'o ma dang /_ra'i 'o ma dang /_lnga pa ni lug gi 'o ma'o/_/bslangs nas zhes bya ba ni gsol ba btab nas so/_/'cha' 'am za na zhes bya ba ni lkog mar kham gyis mid pa'o/_/dge slong ma des zhes bya ba ni gang yin 
[\[314a.7\]]pa'i dge slong ma des so/_/dbyar khang du song nas zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag khang du'o/_/dge slong ma rnams la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa dag la'o/_/so sor bshags par bya'o zhes bya ba ni mthol bar bya ba'o/_/'phags ma smad pa'i gnas zhes bya ba ni dge slong mas de bya ba ma yin 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]pa'o/_/mi rigs pa zhes bya ba ni chags par 'gyur ba'o/_/so sor bshags par bya ba byung gis chos de so sor 'chags so/_/zhes bya ba ni nges par mthol ba'o/_/chos 'di ni so sor bshags par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za bar mthol bar bya ba'o/_/de la ltung bar ji 
[\[314b.2\]]ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad 'o ma slong na thams cad du nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/thob na nyes byas so/_/longs spyad na so sor bshags par 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor bas nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/
[\[314b.3\]]dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa las/_/so sor bshags par bya ba dang po'o//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la 'o ma dgag pa mdzad pa dang /_de nas zho slong ba dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i 
[\[314b.4\]]bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang mi na bar rang gi don du khyim dag tu zho bslangs nas 'cha' 'am za na dge slong ma des dbyar khang du song nas/_dge slong ma rnams la 'phags ma smad pa'i gnas mi rigs pa so sor bshags par bya ba byung gis chos de so sor 'chags 
[\[314b.5\]]so zhes so sor bshags par bya ste/_'di ni so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos yin no/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/ltung ba'i rim pa gzhan ni gong ma ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun par bya ste/_der 'o ma lnga zhes 'byung ba ni 'dir zho lnga zhes rgyas par 
[\[314b.6\]]brjod par bya'o/_/so sor bshags par bya ba gnyis pa'o//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de bzhin du mar sar slong ba dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang mi na bar rang gi don du khyim dag tu mar sar 
[\[314b.7\]]bslangs nas/_'cha' 'am za na dge slong ma des dbyar khang du song nas/_dge slong ma rnams la 'phags ma smad pa'i gnas mi rigs pa so sor bshags par bya ba byung gis chos de so sor 'chags so zhes so sor bshags par bya ste/_'di ni so sor bshags par bya 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]ba'i chos yin no/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/zhes bya ba nas mar sar ni lnga'o/_/zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/ltung ba'i rim pa lhag ma ni gong ma ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun par bya'o/_/so sor bshags par bya ba gsum pa'o//_//gleng gzhi ni 
[\[315a.2\]]mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas zhun mar slong ba dang zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang mi na bar rang gi don du khyim dag tu zhun mar bslangs nas 'cha' 'am za na dge slong ma des dbyar khang du song nas dge slong ma rnams la 'phags ma smad pa'i 
[\[315a.3\]]gnas mi rigs pa so sor bshags par bya ba byung gis chos de so sor 'chags so/_/zhes so sor bshags par bya ste/_'di ni so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos yin no/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o zhes bya ba nas/_zhun mar zhes bya ba ni mar lnga'o zhes bya ba'i 
[\[315a.4\]]bar ro/_/ltung ba'i rim pa lhag ma ni gong ma ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun par bya'o/_/so sor bshags par bya ba bzhi pa'o//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas til mar slong ba dang zhes bya ba nas bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang mi na bar 
[\[315a.5\]]rang gi don du khyim dag tu til mar bslangs nas 'cha' 'am za na dge slong ma des dbyar khang du song nas dge slong ma rnams la 'phags ma smad pa'i gnas mi rigs pa so sor bshags par bya ba byung gis chos de so sor 'chags so zhes so sor bshags par bya ste/_'di ni so sor 
[\[315a.6\]]bshags par bya ba'i chos yin no/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o zhes bya ba nas til mar zhes bya ba ni til 'bru'i snying khu'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/ltung ba'i rim pa lhag ma gzhan ni gong ma ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun par bya'o/_/so sor bshags par bya ba lnga 
[\[315a.7\]]pa'o//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas bu ram gyi dbu ba slong ba dang zhes bya ba nas bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang mi na bar rang gi don du khyim dag tu bu ram gyi dbu ba bslangs nas 'cha' 'am za na/_/dge slong ma des dbyar khang du 
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]song nas dge slong ma rnams la 'phags ma smad pa'i gnas mi rigs pa so sor bshags par bya ba byung gis chos de so sor 'chags so zhes so sor bshags par bya ste/_/'di ni so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos yin no/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o zhes bya ba nas 
[\[315b.2\]]bu ram gyi dbu ba zhes bya ba ni bu ram gyi'o/_/zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/ltung ba'i rim pa gzhan ni gong ma ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun par bya'o/_/so sor bshags par bya ba drug pa'o//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas sbrang rtsi slong ba dang zhes bya ba nas bslab pa bca' 
[\[315b.3\]]ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang mi na bar rang gi don du khyim dag tu sbrang rtsi bslangs nas 'cha' 'am za na dge slong ma des dbyar khang du song nas dge slong ma rnams la 'phags ma smad pa'i gnas mi rigs pa so sor bshags par bya ba byung gis chos de so sor 'chags 
[\[315b.4\]]so/_/zhes so sor bshags par bya ste/_'di ni so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos yin no/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/zhes bya ba nas sbrang rtsi zhes bya ba ni sbrang bu'i 'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/ltung ba'i rim pa gzhan ni gong ma ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun par 
[\[315b.5\]]bya'o/_/so sor bshags par bya ba bdun pa'o//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas nya sha dag slong ba dang zhes bya ba nas bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang mi na bar rang gi don du khyim dag tu nya sha bslangs nas 'cha' 'am za na/_dge slong 
[\[315b.6\]]ma des dbyar khang du song nas dge slong ma rnams la 'phags ma smad pa'i gnas mi rigs pa so sor bshags par bya ba byung gis chos de so sor 'chags so zhes so sor bshags par bya ba ste/_'di ni so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos yin no/_/yang gang zhes 
[\[315b.7\]]bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o zhes bya ba nas nya sha zhes bya ba ni chu na rgyu ba la sogs pa'i 'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/ltung ba'i rim pa gzhan ni gong ma ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun par bya'o/_/so sor bshags par bya ba brgyad pa'o//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]yod na'o/_/de nas sha slong ba dang zhes bya ba nas bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang mi na bar rang gi don du khyim dag tu sha bslangs nas 'cha' 'am za na dge slong ma des dbyar khang du song nas dge slong ma rnams la 
[\[316a.2\]]'phags ma smad pa'i gnas mi rigs pa so sor bshags par bya ba byung gis chos de so sor 'chags so/_/zhes so sor bshags par bya ste/_'di ni so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos yin no/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/zhes bya ba nas sha zhes 
[\[316a.3\]]bya ba ni phyugs la sogs pa'i 'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/ltung ba'i rim pa gzhan ni gong ma ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun par bya'o/_/so sor bshags par bya ba dgu pa'o//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas sha skam slong ba dang zhes bya ba nas bslab pa bca' ba'i 
[\[316a.4\]]bar du mdzad de/_yang dge slong ma gang mi na bar rang gi don du khyim dag tu sha skam bslangs nas 'cha' 'am za na dge slong ma des dbyar khang du song nas dge slong ma rnams la 'phags ma smad pa'i gnas mi rigs pa so sor bshags par bya ba byung gis chos de so sor 'chags 
[\[316a.5\]]so/_/zhes so sor bshags par bya ste/_'di ni so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos yin no/_/yang gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o/_/zhes bya ba nas sha skam zhes bya ba ni sha skam po'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/ltung ba'i rim pa gzhan ni gong ma ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun 
[\[316a.6\]]par bya ba'o/_/so sor bshags par bya ba bcu pa'o//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe sde dpon seng ges bden pa rnams mthong ba dang zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas/_dge 'dun gyis bslab pa'i sdom pa byin pa dang zhes bya ba'i 
[\[316a.7\]]bar ro/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag khyim der zhugs nas bsod snyoms blangs pa dang /_de nas de dag la dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa/_phu nu mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim der bslab pa'i sdom pa ma byin nam/_de dag gis 'di skad ces dge slong rnams la byin 
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]gyi dge slong ma rnams la ni ma yin no/_/zhes smras pa na don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de/_dge slong ma dag dge 'dun gyi 
[\[316b.2\]]bslab pa bcas pa'i khyim gang dag yin pa ni bslab pa'i sdom pa bcas pa yin te/_yang dge slong ma gang slob par grags pa'i khyim bslab pa'i sdom pa bcas pa de lta bu dag tu sngar ma bos bzhin du song nas/_rang gi lag gis bca' ba dang bza' ba blangs te 
[\[316b.3\]]'cha' 'am za na dge slong ma des dbyar khang du song nas dge slong ma rnams la 'phags ma smad pa'i gnas mi rigs pa so sor bshags par bya ba byung gis/_chos de so sor 'chags so zhes so sor bshags par bya ste/_'di ni so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos yin no/_/
[\[316b.4\]]yang gang zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde dag go/_/dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o/_/slob par grags pa'i khyim gang dag yin pa zhes bya ba ni bden pa mthong ba dag gi'o/_/bslab pa'i sdom pa bcas pa zhes bya ba ni 
[\[316b.5\]]gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis so/_/sngar ma bos bzhin du zhes bya ba ni mgron du ma gnyer bar ro/_/song ste zhes bya ba ni song nas so/_/rang gi lag gis zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so/_/bca' ba dang bza' ba zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga dang bza' 
[\[316b.6\]]ba lnga'o/_/blangs te 'cha'am za na zhes bya ba ni lkog mar kham gyis mid pa'o/_/dge slong ma des zhes bya ba ni gang yin pa'i dge slong ma des so/_/dbyar khang du zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag khang du'o/_/dge slong ma rnams la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa dag la'o/_/
[\[316b.7\]]so sor bshags par bya'o zhes bya ba ni mthol bar bya ba'o/_/'phags ma smad pa'i gnas zhes bya ba ni dge slong mas de bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/mi rigs pa zhes bya ba ni chags par 'gyur ba'o/_/so sor bshags par bya ba byung gis chos de so sor 'chags so zhes 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]bya ba ni nges par mthol ba'o/_/chos 'di ni so sor bshags par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za bar mthol bar bya ba'o/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong mas ji tsam cung zad slob par grags pa'i khyim bslab pa'i sdom pa bcas pa dag tu sngar 
[\[317a.2\]]ma bor bzhin du zhes bya ba nas/_'chos sam zos na thams cad du so sor bshags par bya bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/gal te thog ma nyid nas bos pa'am/_bslab pa'i sdom pa bag yangs su gnang ba byin pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/so sor bshags par bya ba bcu 
[\[317a.3\]]gcig pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa las so sor bshags par bya ba rnams rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//da ni bslab pa rnams smra bar bya ste/_de la bslab pa rnams kyi sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di yin te/_sdom la/_chos gos legs bgo mgo mi g.yog_/
[\[317a.4\]]mchong dang lus ni sgyur ba dang /_/'dug pa dang ni rkang pa dag_/tshogs su yang dag bsdus pa yin/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sgra can gyi drang srong kun 'dzi ka'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs so/_/de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI shAkya mo skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig bgos 
[\[317a.5\]]pa lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig sgra can gang na ba der rgyu zhing dong ste/_rim gyis rgyu zhing dong ba na sgra can gyi drang srong kun 'dzi ka'i 'dug gnas su lhags so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la brten nas chos 'dul ba 'di la dge slong ma rnams rab tu 'byung 
[\[317a.6\]]ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par rjes su gnang bar mdzad pa de'i tshe de dag bdag cag gis ji ltar gos dag bgo bar bya zhes ma shes pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[317a.7\]]pa/_chos gos ha cang rtsengs pa ma yin pa dang /_ha cang 'jol ba ma yin pa zlum por bgo bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos de ltar bgo bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa de'i tshe/_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs te rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong ma de rnams 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]kyis chos gos dang sham thabs bgos so/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dag sham thabs ha cang rtsengs par gyon pa dang /_de dag la dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa/_khyed cag ci'i phyir sham thabs ha cang rtsengs par gyon/_de dag 
[\[317b.2\]]gis 'di skad ces kho mo cag khyim pa na 'di ltar goms so zhes smras pa nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos gos dang sham thabs ha cang rtsengs par bgo bar mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du sham thabs ha cang 'jol bar bgo bar mi bya'o/_/zhes 
[\[317b.3\]]de ltar bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad pa dang /_de dag sham thabs gyon pa na glo dag tu ltebs par byed nas de dag la dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa/_khyed cag ci'i phyir sham thabs gyon pa na glo dag tu ltebs par byed/_de dag gis 'di skad ces smras 
[\[317b.4\]]so/_/khyim pa mo dag 'di ltar gyon no/_/de dag la dge slong ma rnams kyis ci khyed cag khyim pa mo yin nam zhes smras pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sham thabs 
[\[317b.5\]]ha cang rtsengs pa ma yin pa dang /_ha cang 'jol ba ma yin pa dang /_sham thabs dang chos gos zlum por bgo bar bslab par bya'o//_//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag chos gos glang po che'i sna ltar gyon pa dang /_de 
[\[317b.6\]]dag la dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa/_phu nu mo dag khyed ci'i phyir chos gos glang po che'i sna ltar gyon/_de dag gis 'di skad ces nor can dang /_tshong dpon dang /_ded dpon dag 'di ltar gyon no zhes smras pa nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[317b.7\]]chos gos dang sham thabs glang po che'i sna ltar ma yin pa dang /_ta la'i lo ma ltar bltab pa ma yin pa dang /_'bru'i phur ma ltar ma yin pa dang /_sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka ltar ma yin pa dang /_sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka dgu po ltar ma yin par bgo bar bya'o//_//
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag phrag pa phyung nas khyim dag tu 'dong ba na de dag la dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa/_phu nu mo dag khyed cag ci'i phyir phrag pa phyung zhing 'dong /_de dag gis 'di skad ces re zhig 
[\[318a.2\]]g.yon can dag gis mthong na de dag gi snying 'gas par 'gyur bar bya'o zhes smras pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shin tu bsdams pa dang /_legs par bgos pas khyim gyi nang du 'jug par bya'o/_/khyim dag tu 'jug pa na sgra mthon 
[\[318a.3\]]po dang /_sgra chen pos 'dong ba na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gcom skyung zhing 'jug par bya'o/_/de nas phan tshun du blta zhing 'dong ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mig mi g.yeng bar khyim gyi nang du 'jug par bya'o/_/
[\[318a.4\]]de dag mdun du mi lta bar 'dong ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shin tu bsdams pa dang /_legs par bgos pa dang /_gcom bskyungs pa dang /_mig mi g.yeng zhing gnya' shing gang tsam du lta bas khyim gyi nang du 'jug pa dang /_'dug 
[\[318a.5\]]par bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag mgo g.yogs nas 'dong ba na de dag la khyed cag ci'i phyir de ltar byed cing 'dong zhes dris pa dang /_de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho mo cag sngon dra ma dag gi mna' mar gyur pa na khyim dag na 'di ltar byed do/_/
[\[318a.6\]]de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci khyed da dung yang dra ma dag gi mna' ma yin nam/_de dag 'di skad ces mi shes pa gang yin pa de spangs par 'gyur zhing /_khyed cag kyang bslab pa la bslab par 'gyur ro/_/zhes smras pa na bcom ldan 'das 
[\[318a.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_mgo g.yogs te khyim gyi nang du 'dong bar mi bya'o//_//dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po nyi shu brgyad pa ste tha ma'o/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag lag pa gnyis kyis shing dpung chad brdzes nas 'dong ba na/_
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]de rnams kyis khyed cag ci'i phyir de ltar byed cing 'dong zhes dris pa dang /_de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/dra ma'i mna' ma dag 'dong na de ltar byed do/_/de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci khyed cag dra ma'i mna' ma yin nam/_bcu gnyis sde 
[\[318b.2\]]dag gis 'di skad ces mi shes pa gang yin pa de spangs par 'gyur zhing /_khyed cag kyang bslab pa la bslab par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi brdze bar khyim der 'jug par bya'o/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag ji ltar 
[\[318b.3\]]phyugs rdzi dag 'dong ba bzhin du chos gos dag phrag pa la gzar te 'dong ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi gzar bar khyim gyi nang du 'jug par bya'o/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag khye'u dag byis pa'i grwa gang du 'di ltar 'dong ngo zhes 
[\[318b.4\]]gnya' gong du bsnol te khyim gyi nang du 'gro zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnya' gong du mi bsnol bar khyim gyi nang du 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag phrag pa gnyis la gzar nas khyim gyi nang du 
[\[318b.5\]]'dong ba nas/_zhes bya ba nas/_'di skad ces g.yog dag 'gro ba ltar 'dong ngo zhes smras pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mgo mi g.yog pa dang /_mi brdze ba dang mi gzar ba dang /_gnya' gong du mi bsnol ba dang /_phrag pa 
[\[318b.6\]]gnyis la mi gzar bar khyim gyi nang du 'jug pa dang /_'dug par bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag g.yon can dag 'di ltar 'dong ngo zhes khyim gyi nang du gad rgyangs dag byed cing 'gro zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[318b.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag bcos ma 'di ltar 'dong ngo zhes khyim gyi nang du 'phrum zhing 'gro zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]ro/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag rkang pa'i brang ba dras pa dag 'di ltar 'dong ngo zhes khyim gyi nang du rkang pa brang bas 'dzugs shing 'gro zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/
[\[319a.2\]]de nas bcu gnyis sde dag khyim 'bigs pa dag 'di ltar 'dong ngo /_/zhes khyim gyi nang du 'phye zhing 'gro zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag nor can dang /_tshong 
[\[319a.3\]]dpon dag 'di ltar 'dong ngo zhes khyim gyi nang du dkur brten cing 'gro zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi bgad pa dang /_mi mchong ba dang /_brang bas mi gzug pa dang /_mi 'phye ba dang /_dkur mi brten par khyim gyi 
[\[319a.4\]]nang du 'jug pa dang /_'dug par bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag glang po che dag 'di ltar 'gro'o zhes lus sgyur zhing 'gro zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lus sgyur zhing khyim gyi nang du 'jug 
[\[319a.5\]]par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag nor can dang tshong dpon dag 'di ltar 'dong ngo zhes khyim gyi nang du lag pa dkyogs ka byed cing 'gro zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de 
[\[319a.6\]]nas bcu gnyis sde dag srog chags rtsangs pa dag 'di ltar 'gro'o zhes khyim gyi nang du mgo sgyur zhing 'gro zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ltar 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag g.yon can dag 'di 
[\[319a.7\]]ltar 'dong ngo zhes khyim gyi nang du lag pa sbrel te zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag shed mthun dag 'di ltar 'dong ngo zhes khyim gyi nang du phrag pa sprad cing 'gro zhes bya ba 
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lus mi sgyur ba dang /_lag pa mi dkyog pa dang /_mgo mi bsgyur ba dang /_lag pa mi sbrel ba dang /_phrag pa mi sprad par khyim gyi nang du 'jug pa dang /_'dug par bslab par bya'o zhe bya ba'i bar ro/_/
[\[319b.2\]]de nas bcu gnyis sde dag bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag gis khyim du ma bsgo bar stan dag la 'dug pa dang de dag smod par byed pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dug par mi bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'char ka la 
[\[319b.3\]]brten te stan la so sor brtags te 'dug par bya'o zhes bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa dang /_de nas yang bcu gnyis sde dag khyim gyi nang du stan la ma brtags par 'dug pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ltar 'dug par mi 
[\[319b.4\]]bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ser skya'i gzhir 'char ka la brten te lus thams cad kyi ljid kyis mnan te 'dug par mi bya'o zhes bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa dang /_de nas bcu gnyis sde dag khyim gyi nang du lus thams cad kyi 
[\[319b.5\]]ljid kyis mnan te 'dug pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ltar 'dug par mi bya'o/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag g.yon can dag 'di ltar 'dug go zhes khang pa'i nang du rkang pa bsnol nas 'dug ces bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[319b.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dug par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag nor can dang /_tshong dpon dag 'di ltar 'dug go zhes khyim gyi nang du brla bsnol te 'dug ces bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim gyi 
[\[319b.7\]]nang du ma bsgo bar stan la 'dug par mi bya ba dang /_so sor ma brtags pa ma yin pa dang /_lus thams cad kyi ljid kyis mi mnan pa dang /_rkang pa mi bsnol ba dang /_brla mi bsnol bar khyim gyi nang du 'dug par bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]de nas bcu gnyis sde dag gar la lta ba dag 'di ltar 'khod do zhes stan cig la dku dang dkur sprad nas 'dug ces bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dug par mi bya'o/_/zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde 
[\[320a.2\]]dag sems khong du chud pa dag 'di ltar 'khod do zhes long bu'i steng du long bu bzhag ste 'dug ces bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dug par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag rkang pa bkug ste 'dug pa dang /_de nas bram ze 
[\[320a.3\]]dang khyim bdag gi chung ma dag 'ongs nas rkang pa la phyag byed pa na de dag gis rkang pa phye ba dang /_de dag gis mgo bo sa la thug nas smod par byed pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rkang pa bkug ste 'dug par mi bya'o/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde 
[\[320a.4\]]dag khyim gyi nang du rkang pa gdangs nas 'dug pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung ma de dag 'ongs nas rkang pa la phyag byas pa dang /_de nas bcu gnyis sde dag gis de dag la nad med par gyur cig ces bya ba'i tshig phyed smras pa na/_'di skad ces de ci'i 
[\[320a.5\]]phyir nad med par gyur cig ces rdzogs par mi gsung zhes smras pa dang /_bcu gnyis sde dag gis 'di skad ces 'di ltar khyed kyis rkang pa ya gcig la phyag byas kyis rkang pa ya gcig la yang phyag byos shig dang bya'o zhes smras pa na smod par byed pa nas/_
[\[320a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rkang pa gdangs te 'dug par mi bya'o/_/de nas bcu gnyis sde dag khyim gyi nang du rkang pa ha cang bkug ste 'dug pa dang /_ji tsam na bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung ma dag phyag byed pa na smod par byed pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das
